Vei identifica oportunitati de business prin invatarea si intelegerea nevoilor de comunicatii si de afaceri ale clientilor
Te asiguri de dezvoltarea celor mai bune solutii pentru clienti prin coordonarea eficienta a resurselor interne

Profil ideal:

Orientat catre  nevoile clientului : intelege ceea ce determina satisfactia clientului, arata flexibilitate in adaptarea planurilor de actiune cerintelor pietei
Recunoaste valoarea potentiala a diferitelor perspective si construieste bazat pe ele; anticipeaza obstacole si gandeste in perspectiva asupra posibililor pasi urmatori
Comunica asertiv: are abilitatea de a recunoaste factorii de decizie si influenta; construieste relatii eficiente, inauntrul si in afara companiei

body:
We have vacancies for experienced heatlthcare candidates who have previously worked wiht the eldelrey and other sick people as well as candidates with no experience to work in care home settings by the seaside. 

You will be working as a support worker, therefore mainly lokoing after one person at any time, often with very challenegibg needs such as Dementia , Alhtezmirs for example. They may also have other illneses where they require extra help and support.

Duties will include:
- Working in care / nursing home
- Looking after one person on a daily basis, 1-2-1 support due to their challenging needs
- Assisting with day to day living tasks such as washing and bathing, getting up in the morning and settling in to bed
- Giving medicine ( after training)
- Gaining trust with the person you care for so you can calm and relax them
- Taking out on trips , doctors appointments, assisting with activities
- Working with medical team to ensure well being of the patients

Candidate:
- Ideally experience or qualifications in care or medical or nursing
- Full training for non-experienced candidates
- Good level of English
- Hardworking and trustworthy
- Friendly and caring

On offer
- Great rates of pay , depending on experience and qualifications and also whether it’s a night / day / weekend shift , from £7ph-£9.25ph depending on experience
- Ongoing training and support, to build career 
- Uniform provided
- Overtime and extra work available
- Assistance with relocation and accommodation
- Help with initial costs to move depending on experience

Normal week will be 32 hour contract, earning £970 a month , if working 39 hours a week would be £1156 a month, 48 hours a week £1456 a month. This is a long term career with training and chance to become nurse / manager in the future. 

We re interviewing in Bucharest end of Feb 2016 and also on Skype. Please apply for more details and interview.

body:
CANDIDAT IDÉAL :

•En tant qu’employé de Webhelp Roumanie on attend de vous d’agir en permanence avec responsabilité dans la relation avec nos clients. Il faut être capable d’offrir l’assistance nécessaire à travers plusieurs canaux de communication tout en contribuant d’une manière active à l’amélioration des processus.

•On cherche des personnes qui souhaitent maîtriser l’art de la communication avec les clients et leurs collègues pour contribuer à l’amélioration de la qualité de nos services. Ces personnes doivent pouvoir obtenir les résultats quantitatifs et qualitatifs à l’aide des outilles de qualité et de management.

•Webhelp Roumanie est à la recherche d’un nombre de professionnels capable d’intégrer nos équipes, de gérer en langue française une large gamme d’activités comme la gestion de client, l’adaptation des outils de communication, la customisation des solutions et le respect de l’architecture et la culture organisationnelle.


RESPONSABILITÉS / BÉNÉFICES :

•Rejoindre nos équipes, ce n’est pas seulement un parcours professionnel, c’est un challenge personnel.

•Pour vous y aider WEBHELP Roumanie vous propose des horaires de travail adaptés à vos besoins, une ambiance de travail agréable, des locaux en plein centre-ville et un investissement continu dans votre formation.

•Tout est fait pour faire de vous un maître de l’art de la communication, tout vous proposant de réelles évolutions de carrière (100% des promotions sont issues de l’interne), une rémunération attractive avec des nombreuses primes (performance individuelle et mensuelle, parrainage, subventions, etc.), de fortes perspectives pour des contrats à durée indéterminée et même un parcours de formation au sein de l’Université Webhelp.


DESCRIPTION DE L’ENTREPRISE :

N°2 des Outsourceurs en France et N°3 en Europe, le groupe Webhelp est un opérateur international en Gestion de la Relation Clients qui a connu la plus forte croissance de son secteur entre 2002 et 2012.

Le groupe réalise près de 725 millions d'euros de chiffre d'affaires auprès de plus de 165 clients globaux. Au quotidien, 30 000 collaborateurs sont au contact des consommateurs dans 81 sites de production répartis dans 21 pays : France, Belgique, Roumanie, Portugal, Italie, Suisse, Autriche, Allemande, Pologne, République Tchèque, Pays Bas, Maroc, Algérie, Royaume-Uni, Afrique du Sud, Madagascar, Inde, Suriname et Turquie.

CDN, OTT, VOD processing)Cunoştinţe, Aptitudini & Abilităţi: •	Cunostinte referitoare la diverse arhitecturi de IPTV/OTT , arhitecturi/solutii CDN•	Cunostinte referitoare la formatele de encodare (MPEG-2/H264 SD/HD) si transport video (MPEG TS, SPTS/MPTS) .•	Cunostinte referitoare protocoalelor de retea  (DNS, DHCP, HTTP, TCP/IP, UDP/IP Unicast/Multicast, NAT, QOS, IGMP v2/3, Ethernet, VLAN)•	Cunostinte referitoare la protocoale streaming : HLS, MSS , Mpeg-DASH , RTSP , etc.•	Bune cunostinte de SQL, Linux scripting/programming.•	Adaptabilitate, flexibilitate; rezistenta la stress.•	Abilitati analitice, atentie la detalii, troubleshooting, rezolvare probleme•	Abilitate de lucru in echipa, comunicare (verbala si scrisa).•	Orientare catre client;•	Buna cunoastere a limbii engleze

body: Used by half of the Fortune 100, Netop solutions include secure remote access, live chat and classroom management, helping companies to offer better customer service, to reduce  support costs and meet the security and compliance standards. In Education domain, Netop is the world leader for classroom management software, helping teachers in more than 90 countries, in the whole process of teaching.We are also one of the first companies in Romania that have started to use the Scrum Agile methodology.As a QA Engineer you will: - Analyze requirements and create test plan; - Configure test environments on multiple platforms (in Windows, Mac and iOS environments); - Perform White & Black Box, Performance and GUI Testing for the application; - Detect, report, and track defects in the applications; - Help developers track and resolve the problems;- Create manual/ automated testing of application functionality; - Work as a member of Development Team throughout the development process and ensure that acceptance criteria and quality standards are met; Technical skills:Knowledge of client-server applications principles;Knowledge of testing methods (ISTQB);Ability to design a test plan, follow it to completion and execute it;Provide manual/automated testing support for the Education projects;Reproduce and track defects uncovered during testing;Soft skills:Good conceptual and analytical thinking, good capacity of synthesis;Ability to work independently and responsibly;Ability to cooperate and work productively in a team;Ability to adapt and learn new things quickly;Good time managementProactive and positive attitudeGood written and verbal communication skills in English and Romanian;Nice to have:Knowledge of automated test framework/harness;Knowledge of script language programming (Perl/Python/Ruby);Knowledge of TCP/IP networking;Able to select test framework for the project and contribute tests for automation;Orientation to innovation, action, and self-improvement;Good overview of the activities;If you:Enjoy being close to software engineers and partner with them to deliver quality software;Enjoy to be involved in a complex blend of technologies;Enjoy working with multiple software operating systems;Enjoy learning modern technologies;Have great ideas and want to share them with your colleagues;Enjoy working in a nice and friendly environment with a simple organizational structure;… then, Netop may be a great choice for you.     Join us for an opportunity to prove yourself as a true and inspirational team player.We offer:An attractive remuneration package;Medical subscription that can be extended to family;Meal tickets;Programs for personal development (trainings, certifications, attending to certain events etc.);Special events for employees (teambuilding, theme parties, contests etc.);An enthusiastic and successful team of professionals;Relaxed working environment.

body:
Alaturate noua daca ai experienta in vanzari, promotii sau pur si simplu esti la inceput de drum si iti doresti o cariera in strainatate.

Candidatul Ideal :
~ Orientare catre client si catre cresterea calitatii servicilor si a rezultatelor
~ Abilitatea de a comunica si capacitatea de a invata si a se adapta la schimbari
~ Obiective clare si focus pe rezultat
~ Motivat de bani si dorinta de a fi cel mai bun
~ Gandire positiva, ambitios, muncitor si perseverent
~ Cunoasterea limbii engleze la nivel conversational

Responsabitilati:
~ Realizarea targetelor privind volumul/valoarea vanzarilor
~ Promovare imaginii impusa de RSRBCOSMETICS si crearea a unei relatii puternice cu clientii

Beneficii:
~ Conditii excelente de lucru si resurse pentru a performa
~ Castiguri excelente
~ Training si dezvoltare profesionala

Despre noi:
~ Locatia de desfasurare a activitatii este in magazinele special amenajate din interiorul shopping mall'urilor din toate zonele Marei Britanie.

Ce oferim:
~ Venitul minim garantat este de 850 lire sterline pe luna pentru primele 2 luni sau comision din vanzari intre 17% - 23%, una dintre cele doua in functie de cea care este mai mare.
~ Dupa cele 2 luni salariul minim scade la 500 lire sterline care este asigurat pentru inca 4 luni.
~ Dupa 6 luni de colaborare comisionul de baza creste 2% astfel incat va incepe de la 19%, de asemenea veti fi platit doar din comisionul reprezentand intre 19% -23% in functie de vanzarile dumneavoastra.

Programul de lucru:
~ 10 -12 ore pe zi, 6 zile pe saptamama

Conditii de cazre:
~ Apartament/ casa comfortabila unde veti loncui cu alti colegi, incluzand TV, cablu precum si toate echipamentele necesare 
Ratele de inchiriere sunt de 300 lire sterline pe luna si este dedus automat din salariu.
**** Prima saptaman acomodarea este gratuita ****

Dupa un angajament de 2 luni bani pentru achizitionarea biletului de avion vor fi rambursati in totalitate.

NUMAI candidatii selectati vor fi contactati petru a participa la interviul online. Aici veti putea adresa orice intrebare sau nedumerire aveti legata de aceasta pozitie.

Va asteptam sa faceti parte din frumoasa noaastra familie,
                                                                                               Mult succes, RSRBCOSMETICS

body: Descrierea Companiei Cu o experienta de peste 18 ani, firma internationala TOP LINE este varful de lance in dezvoltarea industriei serviciilor de frumusete profesionala din Romania.Compania ofera in Romania cele mai dorite produse si servicii pentru saloanele de infrumusetare (coafor, cosmetica, medicina estetica). TOP LINE asigura clientilor si partenerilor sai posibilitatea de a lucra in conditii excelente cu marci internationale vestite ca: GUINOT, ACADEMIE, MOROCCANOIL, JOICO, OPI, ANESI-DEPILEVE, LPG, MALETTI, ULTRATONE, IONTO-COMED, BEAUTY STAR, etc.De asemenea, Top Line ofera Programe de consiliere si finantare privind dezvoltarea saloanelor, Sustinere in marketing si comunicare a saloanelor partenere (campanii personalizate in mass media si social media, materiale de vizualizare, merchandising a zonei de revanzare, brosuri, pliante, etc) Top Line dispune de resursele unui Departament educational specializat in strainatate si colaborarea cu cele mai prestigioase Academii de Frumusete din lume, seminarii internationale si prezentarea in avanpremiera a celor mai importante noutati si trenduri la nivel mondial.Ce este important sa stiti inainte de a ne cunoaste :Marketing Manager- Creaza si implementeaza strategia de marketing in concordanta cu obiectivele companiei· Redacteaza si implementeaza planul de marketing· Coordoneaza activitatea si personalul departamentului de marketing· Efectueaza studii de piata si implementeaza planuri de actiuni specifice : ajustari tactice, segmentare si resegmentare· Identifica competitorii, partenerii, tendintele pietei si oportunitatile de dezvoltare ale companiei· Implementeaza si dezvolta campanii de publicitate· Organizeaza evenimente, targuri, expozitii care au ca scop promovarea imaginii si produselor companiei· Administreaza bugetul anual alocat departamentului· Asigura actualizarea si imbunatatirea website-ului companiei si al alctivitatii de comert online· Mentine si transmite un standard de profesionalism in realizarea activitatilor departamentuluiExperiență și educație:· Cel putin 3 ani cu atributii de management in marketing- Puternice abilitati de management al echipei si de proiect- Abilitate dovedita in a construi; conduce si dezvolta echipe de marketing- Gandire strategica si analitica- Cunostinte solide de marketing direct; trade marketing si activitati promotionale;· Cunostinte solide in campanii social media: Facebook, Linkedin, Twitter, etc;· Cunostinte practice despre branding si strategii de comunicare ;· Excelente abilitati de comunicare si socializare· Creativitate, empatie, diplomatie, flexibilitate· Abilitati de prezentare· Cunostinte avansate MS Office ( Word, Excel, PowerPoint )· Cunostinte avansate de limba Engleză ( citit, scris, vorbit ) - nivel C1· Permis de conducere categoria BBeneficii:- Pachet salarial motivant- Sistem de bonusare in functie de performanta- Specializare continua - Program Permanent de Dezvoltare Profesionala si Personala, sustinut de unii dintre cei mai performati specialisti din Romania: Training, Ateliere Practice, Coaching, Coaching on the Job.  Interviu Online:1.  In conformitate cu descrierea Job-ul prezentat, cu experienta dvs. si posibilitatile de dezvoltare in plan profesional, care sunt asteptarile salariale pentru aceasta pozitie ?

body:
Make a Difference
At Mylan, each person has the ability to make a difference. From the providers who sell and market our products to the producers who develop and manufacture them and finally to our business partners who support the providers and producers, we all have a mission critical role. 

Here’s how this role will help:


• Representing the company image in the pharmaceutical market
• Ethically promoting assigned products portfolio inline with the company policies, strategy and marketing plan to general practitioners, specialist physicians and pharmacies
• Following adequately products detailed information, promotional messages and clients profiles
• Developing a trustful long term partnership with all the customers
• Monitoring rigorously promotional activity within the allocated territory 
• Timely, accurate and detailed activity reporting on a company policy basis

Here are the qualifications required for this position:


• University graduated: Medicine or Pharmacy (would be an advantage) or related life science degree (biology, chemistry, etc)
• Previous experience as Medical Representative- at least 2 years
• Good English knowledge
• Good PC knowledge- MS Office, Internet, Email.
• Clean driving license
• Availability for travel

• Drive for results
• Customer orientation
• Excellent communication skills
• Innovation and initiative
• Team work
• High organizing skills

Mylan is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All information received will be handled carefully and treated with confidentiality.

body: Postul este in departamentul SOA & Middleware/ Directia Executiva TEHNOLOGIA INFORMATIEI ROMANIA. SCOP: Arhitectul solutie IT proiecteaza solutia generala, stabilind standardele tehnice (inclusiv cele ce tin de programare), instrumentele si platformele de lucru pentru dezvoltatori astfel incat cerintele de business sa fie indeplinite. RESPONSABILITĂŢI PRINCIPALE:•	Actioneaza ca un vizionar si expert pe sistemele impactate;•	Acorda expertiza in vederea identificarii si translatarea cerintelor de sistem in documentatie de “systems design”;•	Comunica permanent cu utilizatorii, sponsorul si managementul IT pentru a determina evolutia cerintelor legate de sistemul/sistemele IT;•	Genereaza cel mai inalt nivel al cerintelor de sistem bazandu-se pe cerintele utilizatorilor si alte constrangeri, gen costuri si timpul de implementare;•	Se asigura ca cerintele de sistem sunt consistente, complete si corecte;•	Executa o analiza de tip cost-beneficiu in vederea maximizarii folosirii solutiilor comerciale si/sau a dezvoltarilor deja realizate;•	Dezvolta algoritmi de partitionare pentru a aloca cerintele prezente cat si cele estimate catre zone distincte ce interactioneaza minimal creend astfel premizele pentru dezvoltari paralele si prioritizare a cerintelor;•	Supervizeaza Solutia definita in evolutia ei prin tot ciclul de viata al proiectelor (de la initiere, analiza, proiectare, implementare);•	Documentează fiecare aplicaţie din perspectiva Enterprise Architecture şi întocmeşte recomandări;•	Se asigura că orice aplicaţie/aplicatii sunt  în conformitate cu cadrul general al arhitecturii Romtelecom;•	Asigură  modelarea şi implementarea proceselor de business end to end (E2E);•	Face recomandări in vedera imbunatatirii continue a arhitecturii;CERINTELE POSTULUI:Studii:•	Diplomă universitară în ”Automatizări şi Calculatoare”, ”Matematică - Informatică”, ”Cibernetică”, ”Electronică”, (sau arii asociate) ori o combinaţie echivalentă de studii şi experinţă din care pot fi obţinute cunoştinţe, aptitudini şi abilităţi comparabile.Experienţă în muncă:•	3-5 ani experienţă în domeniul IT;•	Experienţă pe o poziţie similară;•	Experienţă în  lucrul cu Business Process Management Notation (BPMN), Business Processs Execution Language(BPEL) şi instrumente de Modelare de Date şi Design;•	Experienţă în formalizarea documentelor de Business Process  şi de design Hardware/ Software;•	Experienţă în BPMS şi Procese de business din industria de Telecomunicaţii reprezintă un plus.Cunoştinţe, Aptitudini & Abilităţi:•	Cunostinţe de Service Oriented Architecture(SOA), Business Process Management Suite(BPMS), Enterprise Architecture;•	Cunostinţe de: procese eTom,BPMN, BPEL, BRE, BAM pentru Business Process;•	Cunostinţe solide despre Arhitectura de informaţii, soluţii şi tehnică;•	Cunostinţe de Managementul Schimbarilor;•	Bună inţelegere a SOA la nivel de IT şi de Business;•	Experienţă în lucrul cu Oracle, MS SQL RDBMS, XML, XSD, SQL, XPath, Xquery, Business Intelligence şi instrumente ETL;•	Data warehousing, Rational / UML, BI, ETL, securitatea datelor şi integrare;•	Cunostinţe despre standardele Open Systems (JMS, API, Tuxedo, JDBC, CORBA, OMG, etc);•	Bună inţelegere a standardelor şi a “best practices” de Architectura IT;•	Sisteme de operare: Solaris, HP-UX, Linux, AIX, Windows NT, Windows 2000, Windows 2003,Windows 2008;•	Cunostinţe despre standarde: New Generation Operation Support Systems (NGOSS) – enhanced Telecom Operations Map (eTom), Shared Information Data(SID), Telecom Appliation Map(TAM), Telecom Neutral Architecture(TNA) si GDM;•	Cunostinţe despre Enterprise Architecture Framework - TOGAF, Zachman, NGOSS;•	Cunostinţe despre standarde tehnologice cu privire la BPMS, EAI, ESB, Middleware;•	Abilităţi interpersonale şi de comunicare excelente, dorinţa de dezvoltare şi de dobândire de noi cunostinţe. Abilităţi analitice şi creative;•	Abilităţi de organizare, planificare şi de negociere;•	Comunicare – abilităţi persuasive - înţelegere, influentarea şi / sau ajutarea persoanelor sunt importante;•	Abilitatea de a determina modalităţi diferite de soluţionare a problemelor. Creativitate şi iniţiativă;•	Cunoştinţe avansate de limba engleza.Asteptam CV-ul tau, detaliat, pe adresa de e-mail: madalina.ionescu@telekom.ro

body: Societe Generale European Business Services délivre de la valeur ajoutée pour le Groupe Société Générale au niveau des services de finance, comptabilité, ressources humaines et IT por toutes les entités de l'Europe.La Direction des Ressources Groupe Société générale est dotée d'un département Business Solutions Center – BSC – qui a pour vocation d’être le partenaire des directions centrales et des branches pour les accompagner dans le déploiement des solutions informatiques mutualisées au sein des Filières, Finance, Risques, RH.Au sein du BSC, le Centre de Solutions Finance assure en particulier les évolutions et le bon fonctionnement des applications de production des états réglementaires de SG Métropole, du Groupe et des filiales.Votre environnementAu sein du groupe Société Générale, vous rejoindrez le Business Solution Center, qui est un centre de services partagés, intégré à la Direction des Ressources et de l'Innovation du Groupe.Sa mission : doter les Filières et Pôles du groupe de solutions informatiques performantes et innovantes.Comme éditeur et fournisseur de solutions, le Business Solution Center accompagne aussi les grands projets Groupe et la transformation de la Filière IT.Votre rôleAu sein de la Direction des Ressources du Groupe, et plus particulièrement du Business Solutions Center, le Responsable Maîtrise d’œuvre Sogefilia a pour mission de prendre en charge l’assistance de premier et second niveaux aux utilisateurs, les évolutions, les projets techniques concernant les progiciels et développements in-house servant les processus de Comptabilité Générale et de Déclarations Réglementaires des filiales françaises du Groupe Société Générale (Sogefilia – environ 400 entités) en :•	Garantissant la disponibilité, la qualité de la production par l’organisation des activités de l’équipe de support aux utilisateurs et la gestion de la relation avec l’exploitant•	Assurant la cohérence technique des évolutions imposées par l’exploitant sur l’architecture en place (Citrix, Web, spécificités des postes utilisateur final) •	Assurant la relation technique avec les éditeurs des progiciels, l’équipe de développements tactiques et l’exploitant•	Assurant le cadrage, le pilotage et la réalisation des projets techniques des différents progiciels •	Assistant le responsable de Domaine SI dans la gestion technique de son périmètre applicatif et en particulier des projets et évolutions fonctionnelles.Vous interviendrez sur des activités comme :•	Suivi et gestion applicative quotidiens de production•	Exécution des demandes utilisateurs procédurées et/ou programmées•	Gestion des habilitations et surveillance permanente•	Pilotage (budget, planning, staffing) de l’activité Maîtrise d’œuvre en relation avec le Responsable de Domaine SI afin de planifier au mieux les projets et évolutions métier•	Suivi et application des roadmaps publiées par les éditeurs des progiciels du périmètre (ex : évolutions réglementaires)•	Organisation des travaux de packaging des progiciels avec l’exploitant, l’éditeur et la maîtrise d’ouvrage•	Proposer des corrections/évolutions suite aux incidents récurrents et/ou à votre retour d’expérience•	Remonter les alertes adéquates au Responsable de domaine SIVotre profil technique :•	Niveau d’études : Bac+4 minimum avec spécialisation body:
Smartx Net Apps provides Internet development services to a group of customers that run some of the largest, most successful websites in the world. One of our main projects consists in maintaining and developing a website visited daily by 5-6'000'000 unique users (among top 300 in the world traffic-wise).Our challenges consist in maintaining high uptime availability, deliver in a fast-paced environment key features for product growth while at the same time keeping an engineering culture based on code-reviews, unit-tests and high hiring standards.
What we're looking for:In order to become our colleague, you should be a real team player, flexible and highly responsible.You will have international exposure, so you should be comfortable in English (spoken and written).Problem solving skills and attention to detail are highly appreciated as well.Required knowledge and experience:> Experience supporting Linux Systems (at least 6 years);> University degree in computer science;> Red Hat System Administration II exam RHCSA certification;> Strong experience with CentOS, RHEL or Debian;> Strong experience with Virtualization environments;>Good experience with high availability and failover clustering from different perspectives (OS, application, hardware);> Experience troubleshooting application servers (at least one from Tomcat, Jboss or Glassfish);> Experience supporting JAVA based environments;> Experience debugging network problems;> MySQL database experience would be a plus;> Good experience writing scripts in Bash, PERL, PYTHON or PHP;> Familiar with capacity planning;> Experience with system performance monitoring and tuning;> Familiar with service transition and service operation (preferable).
What you should do:> Consult on new system requirements and be part in architectural design phase;> Research and recommend technologies and tools for systems administration tasks;> Guide less experienced members of the team;> Work closely with development and testing teams to ensure the smooth launch of new code updates or additions;> Install and document new systems and application servers;> Operate, update, maintain and monitor environments on a daily basis;> Define, improve, document standard operational procedures where needed;> Troubleshoot environments and correct issues;> Perform periodic reporting of performance and tuning actions for assigned systems;> Write automation and monitoring scripts.
We compensate your achievements and commitment with:> Very competitive salary;> Private medical plan - Business Plan at MedLife Clinic;> Meal vouchers and well-stocked micro-kitchen in the office;> Performance reviews and compensation based on your results, performance based bonus structure;> Trainings and career development programs – in the country and abroad;> Company events.
We value our staff by investing in their health and good employment practices. We offer a creative workplace and a flat organization, focused on teamwork, product quality, dynamic and fun atmosphere. We have a very nice and comfortable downtown office, with a break area, outside space, fruits and different daily snacks. Flexible working hours are to support work-life balance.If this sounds appealing, join our team by submitting your CV in English to hr@smart-x.netThank you!

body: Grupul Viking este unul din liderii mondiali in furnizarea de sisteme si echipamente pentru protecția împotriva incendiilor, cu peste 7.000 de angajati in intreaga lume. Suntem un grup care oferă o gama extinsa de produse si sisteme pe bază de apă și non-apă, oferind distribuție și suport tehnic clientilor nostri.Datorită creșterii continue și dezvoltarii pieței, pentru locația noastră din Otopeni, Ilfov cautam: CUSTOMER SERVICE REPRESENTATIVEÎn acest rol variat și interesant, vei fi responsabil cu mentinerea contactului cu clienții, astfel încât e necesar să ai abilitatea de a raspunde prompt si eficient solicitarilor acestora. Tu oferi clientilor nostri suport și asistență prin telefon si gestionezi cotatiile de pret și comenzile in mod eficient până la livrarea materialelor. Vei ajuta, de asemenea, la pregatirea comenzilor clientilor în depozitul nostru (ambalarea produselor pentru transport, receptie marfa).Vei lucra în strânsă colaborare cu Directorul de Vanzari si Coordonatorul de logistică din locația noastră și cu alte departamente centrale.Responsabilitati:•	sa comunici cu clientii cu privire la termenele de livrare, informații despre produs, etc.•	sa procesezi și sa urmăresti ofertele și comenzile primite, de la alegerea produsului pana la livrarea finală.•	sa informezi clientii în caz de modificări ale termenelor de livrare.•	sa verifici confirmarile de comanda.•	să colaborezi îndeaproape cu Directorul de Vanzari pentru preturi, creanțe etc.•	sa pregătesti documentele tehnice pentru clienți•	sa ajuti, daca e necesar, la descărcarea produselor primite de la operatorii de transport.•	sa ajuti la pregatirea comenzilor clienților.Profil:•	experiență de minim 3 ani intr-un mediu comercial și servicii pentru clienți.•	disponibilitate pentru activitati fizice, precum pregatirea comenzilor și alte activități de depozitare.•	abilități administrative excelente și cunoștințe tehnice - experienta in domeniul construcții sau instalații reprezinta un avantaj.•	cunostinte excelente de Lb. română și engleză; Limba germana reprezinta un avantaj•	cunostinte de operare PC•	abilitati de comunicare verbala si scrisa, gandire pozitiva.•	persoana foarte bine organizata, care sa poata prioritiza mai multe sarcini în mod eficient si careia sa ii placa lucrul in echipa

body: Orange Romania’s IT Business and System Analysis Team is looking for a new colleague.You will grow in our team as part of the IT division which counts more than 100 software development professionals. Our Business/ System analysts constantly meet up to share their experiences from their projects. You will work to find implementation solutions for requirements from Marketing, Sales, Customer Service, Corporate departments. You will have the chance to collaborate with CRM, Billing, Data Warehouse, ERP and Online development teams.The colleagues with whom you will interact are architects, business analysts, project managers, software developers, Ops teams and product owners.Relevant Skills:• Experience of working in an IT team environment• Profound knowledge of methodologies and tools for analysis activities• Professional attitude, excellent communication skills• Excellent English: verbal and writing• Experience in working with business requirements and detailing them into System level Functional Specifications.• Analytical ability to ensure comprehensiveness and detail level articulation in analyzing and specifying of functional details.• Ability to communicate functional level details to solution developers – to support transition, translation and development.• Ability to quickly troubleshoot and establish functional issues in production, solution testing, etc.Responsibilities:- Analyzing requirements for different business divisions (Marketing, Sales, Financial, Supply Chain, Customer Service etc)- Creating functional specifications- Offering support to the development teams (CRM, Billing, Reporting, ERP, Online)- Participating in the testing phases to validate the deliveries before production- Mentoring for the new team membersKey Attributes:• Strong communication and analytic skills• High degree of accuracy and attention to detail• Able to quickly grasp new concepts• Understanding solution architecture and involvment in system design• Open minded, out of the box thinking and eager to discover Orange IT Environment• Team oriented willing to work in a fast paced, multinational environmentExperience and Education• Bachelor’s Degree from an accredited college or university with a concentration in Science or IT related discipline - (or equivalent diploma/work experience)• Proficient written and spoken English• experience as a Business Analyst• background in telecom industry is a plus• Agile Kanban experience is a plusThank you for applying!

body: Duties/Responsibilities : AXWAY is looking to expand the Engineering team in our Bucharest Office with a C Developer. He/she will be part of a software R&D team, delivering high quality software for our more than 11000 worldwide customers.As a C Multiplatform Developer you will be working at the core of B2Bi, in the transformation and routing engine. You will be responsible for:-	Developing and writing the required code for new features on the existing engine-	Collaborating with other colleagues to ensure that the feature meets the stakeholder needs-	Document code throughout the development process-	Conduct training for the new colleagues-	Maintain the product build running on all supported os (AIX, LINUX, HP, SUN, WIN)-	Writing code without security vulnerabilities-	Investigate performance bottlenecks, crashes, fix defects-	Pre-testing your code in conjunction with tester colleagues-	Participate in estimations and backlog definition sessions-	Work in an agile environment and follow team ceremoniesProject description:B2bi is enabling communications for different partners, entities and applications by electronic messages exchange.B2Bi is handling:-	the transport of messages using communication protocols (FTP, HTTP, AS2, AS4, JMS, MQ, EMAIL, …)  -	the routing and transformation using message exchange standards (EDIFACT, X12, SWIFT, HL7, standards based on XML, …). Skills/Qualifications:• Knowledge of C (UNIX and Windows):•	Data structures and algorithms•	Multi-threading and multi-process applications•	IPC mechanisms•	Socket programming•	Communication protocols•	Client - Server applications• Troubleshooting and debugging skills:•	Traces and logs•	Debugging running processes•	Analyzing core dumpsThe following additional skills will be an advantage: •        Bash scripting•        C++•        Knowledge of software security, cryptography algorithms•        Knowledge of one Database software and SQL•        University degree in Computer Science/Informatics/Engineering or equivalent Experience in software development

body:
Innovative Mobile Endeavors (IME), develops and supports massive infrastructure for mobile apps and games. We get billions of requests per month from millions of installed users, with the largest concentration on Android devices.

Our infrastructure and development teams are located in the USA, Eastern Europe and Japan, with data centers in each region.

We pay generous salaries with the possibility of advancement. We work hard and play hard, with several BBQs and team events every year and the possibility to travel.

We primarily work from home, although we can offer an office allowance, for those who work best in a more structured environment. We develop Rockstar engineers, and allow people to own and run their own projects.

---

We primarily practice a “dev-ops“ philosophy, where teams are responsible for deploying their own code, but we need a dedicated expert for things like MySQL tuning, firewall maintenance, hardware inventory management and selection, etc. You'll be the interface between data center operations and development teams. Ideally, our candidate will have some experience with PHP and programming as well as solid sysadmin skills.

Technologies:
- Linux (RHEL, CentOS and some ubuntu)
- MySQL / MariaDB
- Redis
- Automated deployment via ansible (but don't worry if you only know puppet or chef -- we'll train you on our tools)
- Elastic and Kibana
- HHVM / PHP-FPM, Java, Python
- Nginx and HAProxy
- Ceph

Skills:
- Strong skills with shell scripting and PERL or Python or PHP scripting.
- Some PHP experience preferred, to help development teams analyze performance bottlenecks in production.
- Strong focus on automated monitoring and failure detection.
- Strong focus on clustering and setting up systems with no single point of failure.
- Knowledge of low level networking (TCP/IP, DNS, BGP, Anycast, etc) a plus.  Interviu Online:1.  Please take a few minutes to tell me the pros and cons of running a particular application on bare metal vs on a cloud type environment.2.  Pros and cons of Docker vs. just using linux cgroups.3.  Why use a separate domain name for content delivery?4.  A service pings slow/down. You log into the server. If you know nothing else about the application, what are the first several things you look at?

Our challenges consist in maintaining high uptime availability, deliver in a fast-paced environment key features for product growth while at the same time keeping an engineering culture based on code-reviews, unit-tests and high hiring standards.We value our staff by investing in their health and good employment practices. We offer a creative workplace and a flat organization, focused on teamwork, product quality, dynamic and fun atmosphere. body: Honeywell International is a $37 billion diversified technology and manufacturing global leader, with more than 120,000 employees in 100 countries around the world and has a demonstrated heritage of both innovation and achievement. Honeywell Aerospace is looking for a Direct Buyer to join the Romanian office in Bucharest!Responsibilities:•	Responds to MRP (material requirements planning) messages to procure material in order to support production requirements. Responsible for maintenance of purchase orders, monthly forecasting for suppliers, maintenance of key planning parameters, and reconciliation of invoice and purchase order issues.•	Obtains the best value for material. Best value is defined as a combination of: price, delivery, quality and service. Considers total cost of acquisition when making procurement decisions. •	Manages supplier performance to ensure that Honeywell Aerospace Olomouc is working with the right strategic suppliers to support short and long term objectives. Takes assertive position with suppliers who are past due to ensure that every alternative is explored in able to improve past due delivery schedules.•	Creates commodity based sourcing strategies to ensure that Honeywell Aerospace Olomouc is working with the appropriate vendors. Buyers should be able to weigh the sourcing strategies of the commodity team in Phoenix as well as the specific needs of Honeywell Aerospace Olomouc and total cost of acquisition principles. •	Supports transition team to ensure project plans are updated and requirements on purchase of parts are defined and ordered so that support of the transition and follow-on schedules is secured. •	Procures material according to ordering policies designed to minimize inventory costs and being left with inactive, obsolete and surplus inventory. Identifies and manages measures to reduce inactive, obsolete and surplus inventory when such do exist. •	Must be able to work in a team environment and understand all purchase part issues. On a rotational basis will be responsible for reporting on all purchasing issues at the daily production meetings. •	Needs excellent organizational and planning skills. Must possess negotiation skills and be able to communicate clearly over the telephone. •	Participation in Projects 	Ensures active participation in company’s projects, company’s development, and identification of possible cost lowering measures, improves yield and productivity. •	Health, Safety, Environment	Secures observance of rules pertaining to health protection and safety at work, work safety in the factory and rules of environment protection.	Responsible for tidiness of work place and for participating in 5S activities. 	Responsible for ensuring tasks and responsibilities in the Health and Safety field duty specified for respective post in Labor Code and internal instructions.•	Interpersonal Relationships	Responsible for supporting good interpersonal relations at work, to use his/her interpersonal skills to get sound cooperation among colleagues at all levels.	Responsible for the provision of information to other employees needed for proper performance of their work, to share information and experience with other colleagues. 	Responsible for ensuring Honeywell company culture standards. •	Material master data maintenance. 	Responsible to maintain material master data for purchased parts. Required skills and experience:•	Experience in Purchasing, preferably in a production company•	Good knowledge of MS office package (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)•	Good knowledge of SAP•	Good communication skills•	English is required

body:
Webhelp Groupe recrute pour une nouvelle filiale en Roumanie, à Iasi !

Rejoindre Webhelp c’est :

Travailler pour le n°2 des Outsourceurs en France et N°3 en Europe. Le Groupe Webhelp est un opérateur international en Gestion de la Relation Clients qui a connu la plus forte croissance de son secteur entre 2002 et 2012.
Le groupe réalise près de 725 millions d'euros de chiffre d'affaires auprès de plus de 165 clients globaux. Au quotidien, 30 000 collaborateurs sont au contact des consommateurs dans 81 sites de production répartis dans 21 pays : France, Belgique, Roumanie, Portugal, Italie, Suisse, Autriche, Allemagne, Pologne, République Tchèque, Pays Bas, Maroc, Algérie, Royaume-Uni, Afrique du Sud, Madagascar, Turquie, Inde et Suriname.

Une entreprise certifiée « GREAT PLACE TO WORK » et « EUROPEAN BUSINESS AWARD », labélisée LRS qui place l’humain au cœur de la relation client.
Webhelp est un groupe dynamique, qui évolue constamment dans le respect de ses valeurs que sont l’unité, l’exemplarité, la reconnaissance, l’engagement et le Wahou.

Webhelp Romania c’est :

Le 1er employeur francophone en Roumanie, avec plus de 2000 collaborateurs sur ses six sites répartis sur 4 villes : Bucarest, Ploiesti, Iasi et Galati. En 2016, Webhelp ouvre ses portes à Iasi et de nouvelles opportunités de carrière seront ouvertes.

Si tu : 

• As un très bon niveau de français à l’oral comme à l’écrit • Aimes mettre à profit ton savoir-faire pour aider les clients dans l’utilisation des services Viens rejoindre notre groupe d’experts dans la gestion de la relation clients !

Responsabilités :

• Répondre aux demandes des clients en analysant leurs problématiques. 
• Mettre en place une solution rapide et durable à la problématique rencontrée tout en maintenant un excellent niveau de satisfaction client.
• Informer les clients sur les services et produits de l’entreprise et les accompagner dans l’utilisation de leurs services via les canaux : mail, chat et appel.

Moyens et rémunération :

Pour vous aider dans votre parcours professionnel, Webhelp Romania vous propose des formations avancées rémunérées qui vous préparent à l’atteinte des missions qui vous seront confiées.
Avec des locaux très accessibles, situés en centre-ville, nous vous proposons des horaires de travail flexibles et adaptés à vos besoins.
Nous avons mis en place des parcours professionnels, des assessments center internes vous permettant d’enrichir votre carrière professionnelle au sein de notre entreprise. 
90% des promotions sont issues de l’interne.
Rémunération locale attractive : salaire, prime de performance mensuelle et individuelle, bénéfices.

body:
System Developer, Support Tools – Timisoara

We have a challenging opportunity for an ambitious System Developer to join the Support Tools team in Visma Software. The team is responsible for delivering the “Support panel” which is a module available from all other Visma Software services and exposed to thousands of end users. The end user is to find answers to his/her questions about a Visma service via the Support panel, either self-service or by contacting Visma. The Support panel is central in Visma’s communication strategy.

The Support panel is built on the Microsoft .Net Framework stack. As a System Developer you will work with design and implementation of new features, with some maintenance and with writing automated tests. You will be working according to agile and lean principles and participate in Visma’s  exciting transition to continuous delivery on Azure.
Our products have many integrations and dependencies, so having experience with integration techniques and knowledge about how to achieve high performance and reliability is important.
We value code quality and use of patterns, and we expect that you have a conscious attention towards quality in all deliveries. The team is located in 3 countries: Norway, Sweden and Romania. The work language is English. 

Responsibilities and work tasks:
Participating in modelling and architectural analysis, design and work estimation
Implementation of new features
Writing unit tests and participate in testing of solutions
Keeping up-to-date on new technologies, methods and tools related to the development processes

We believe that you have:
Bachelor or Master’s degree in computer science
Experience as a developer working with C# and Microsoft’s web stack : ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Web API
Experience with web development: HTML5, CSS, JavaScript
Knowledge about SQL databases. 
Good knowledge of design patterns and web design frameworks.
Knowledge about unit testing, web application testing tools like Selenium WebDriver and JavaScript testing frameworks is a plus
Hands-on experience with  Test Driven Development, Continuous Delivery in Azure is a plus
Genuinely interested in technology with focus on open standards, systems integration, SaaS architectures, Web services/SOA

Personal skills:
Well-structured and quality focused attitude
Team spirit and good communication skills
Analytical mind-set and well organized with attention to details
Self-motivated and self-driven
User experience and customer satisfaction oriented
Fluent in English speaking and writing

We will offer you:
Exciting position in an international working environment 
(R&D community of 600 employees). 
You will be part of a dynamic and highly skilled team.
We offer you interesting customer segments, a creative working environment and the latest technologies and tools.
Good opportunities for career development working in different projects and in a large extensive international company. 
Company apartments in Spain and France.
Competitive terms and conditions.

Work place will be Timisoara.

body:
The British Embassy in Bucharest is looking for an A2 Corporate Services Officer (CSO) to be responsible for the day to day non technical property management and support on human resource issues. 

We are looking for a highly motivated, flexible and customer-oriented individual who can on occasion cover areas the responsibilities of the position including back-up IT Support Officer for which full training will be provided. The job holder will also be the Embassy’s Learning and Development Champion.

To Apply:

All applicants should have the right to live and work in Romania. The British Embassy does not sponsor work permits.

All applicants should submit their CV (in English, up to 3 pages) and Job Application Form available on the British Embassy website https://www.gov.uk/government/world/organisations/british-embassy-bucharest/about/recruitment completing all sections and using the ‘Supporting Statement’ box to explain clearly the motivation, skills and experience you could bring to this role. 

Applications must be sent to jobapplications.ROU@fco.gov.uk and the email subject line must be formatted as follows: ROU589

The closing date for applications is 21st February 2016.

More detailed information on job specifics of this vacancy are available on the British Embassy website.
title: A2 Corporate Services Officer (CSO)

body: Role DefinitionThe Junior Security Officer role covers security support for Global Services Center (GSC) Romania part of the Global Services Operations (GSO) organization within Business Unit Global Services (BUGS).ReportingThe Junior Security Officer will report to the Head of Security and Risk Management - GSC Romania and will work project-based under the supervision of one or more Security Officers.Key ResponsibilitiesEnsures support for Security, Privacy and Business Continuity related activities performed within GSC Romania;Follows-up with the Line Management organization in GSC Romania that appropriate security controls are implemented by the operational teams in their ways of working;Ensures support for the deployment of specific processes that drive compliancy to Ericsson Security steering documents, Ericsson Business Continuity Management framework and customer Security and Privacy requirements;Delivers security awareness presentations to GSC Romania internal stakeholders;Supports internal product/service development projects by ensuring that the applicable information security aspects are considered;Ensures support for the driver responsible for setting up GSC Romania's Crisis team (Tiger team) and enables connecting the local Crisis team in the Regional Crisis Management Task Force (CMTF) structure;Ensures support for global or Business Unit Security related initiatives upon request.Role RequirementsEducationUniversity degree.Key competenciesThe key technical qualifications required are:2 years of work experience in IT/Telecom/Security or connex fields, having hands-on past exposure to at least two of the following areas:Information Security; Physical Security; Risk Management; Crisis Management; Business Continuity Management; Data Protection and Privacy; Audits and Assessments. Preferably knowledge of ISO/IEC 27k family of standards (with focus on ISO/IEC 27001, 27002 and 27005);Preferably knowledge on Ericsson Security Policies, Directives and Guidelines;Preferably knowledge on Ericsson’s business environment;Preferably knowledge on GSC Romania’s products and services. The non-technical competencies required are:Self-driven, self-motivated and working well under pressure;Performance and results oriented;Skilled in interpersonal communication and ability to communicate effectively at various levels in the organization;Customer oriented and business minded, having a consultative approach and focusing on obtaining superior quality within established deadlines;Ability to prioritize and plan own work to meet assigned schedules and targets;Analytic with superior problem solving capability;Knowledge sharing oriented by actively contributing with own experiences and skills to create a learning culture;Good English language skills, both oral and written.

body:
Who we are

About TotalStay Group

The TotalStay Group (part of JacTravel) launched in the UK in 1999 and has steadily grown into one of the largest and most successful accommodation providers today, used by thousands of tour operators, travel agencies and technology platforms across the globe. Head office is in London with regional offices in Romania and Sweden and a team of consultants based throughout Europe, The Americas, Africa and the Middle-East. 

The company has a staff of over 240 and an annual turnover in 2014 in excess of £160m. Exclusively Hotels is the company’s established trade brand providing thousands of travel agents worldwide with an easy to use, password protected hotel booking website as well as a simple XML connection for hundreds of online travel agents, technology platforms and tour operators. Hotel Pronto is the affiliate solution and direct to customer website offering a simple booking tool available in 14 currencies and across 14 languages. The TotalStay Group product range comprises an inventory of 100,000 hotels in over 10,000 destinations worldwide. 

In recent times the company has been recognized for its financial performance by both the Sunday Times (2013 and 2015 “Profit Track 100” listing) and the London Stock Exchange (2013 “Top 1,000 companies to Inspire Britain”) as well as winning the Melia Hotels “Most Supportive Partner” award in 2014.

The position: Nightshift Spanish Call Centre Advisor in Cluj Napoca 

The duties of a Call Centre Advisor include:

• Receive non-group enquiries and booking requests on a daily basis from the agents, affiliates and sales offices via in-house computer system, telephone, email or fax
• Prioritize the work load according to deadlines, arrival dates specified service standard requirements
• Acknowledge all enquires and requests however received within specified service standard requirements
• Update the IT system with bookings and other information 
• Research appropriate suppliers including the utilization of non-contracted suppliers (hotels) wherever appropriate
• Contact suppliers according to the sales requirements either by e-mail, fax or telephone to make a reservation 
• Negotiate the best possible rates and conditions
• Provide suitable alternatives when required 
• Keep agents and affiliate customers updated on a daily basis as to the activities being undertaken in relation to the specific enquiry or booking
• Provide the customer with detailed information including prices that meet their requirement 
• Ensure that all enquiries and requests however received are managed to a successful conclusion within specified service standard requirements


Who you are

• Travel industry and/or Call Centre experience (desirable)
• Experience working in a customer facing role (required)
• Fluency in spoken and written English and Spanish (required)
• A graduate
• Strong communication, interpersonal and client relationship management skills
• Good negotiating and influencing skills
• Accuracy, research skills and attention to detail 
• Ability to anticipate and solve problems
• Team working skills
• Stamina and persistence
• A “can do” approach
• Ability to work under pressure and to tight deadlines
• Willingness and ability to take ownership for decisions
• Initiative to achieve the best result
• Computer literate 


What we offer 

In return we offer:

• Opportunity to build a long term career within a stable multinational company
• Great team spirit
• Training and coaching 
• Development and career progression 
• Professional, vibrant and growing team 
• Competitive base salary, plus nightshift bonus and language bonus 
• Meal tickets
• Active social committee 

The next step is yours!

Please send your CV in English setting out why you think you have the qualities we are looking for.  Interviu Online:1.  What interests you about working in the travel industry?2.  Are you fluent in English?3.  What is your level of Spanish?
title: Spanish Call Centre

body:
RESPONSABILITATILE PRINCIPALE ALE POSTULUI
- Stabileste obiectivele departamentului, in functie de directia strategică definita pentru acesta și supervizează atingerea acestora
- Analizează și raportează periodic indicatorii de performanta specifici activității  departamentului; implementeaza solutii de imbunătățire a valorilor acestora și de adaptare a lor la strategia de dezvoltare a departamentului
- Este responsabil de eficientizarea proceselor, fluxurilor de lucru si costurilor implicate de activitatea departamentului
- Coordonează și dezvoltă echipa din cadrul departamentului, în scopul atingerii obiectivelor de business și creării unui climat de lucru constructiv și orientat către clienți și  nevoile acestora;
- Este deschis și preocupat față de solicitările și nevoile clienților; gândește și implementează soluții care să vină în sprijinul acestora
- Coordonează și supervizează întreaga activitate operațională a departamentului
- Este responsabil de elaborarea și urmărirea bugetului departamentului

CERINTE
- Interes si disponibilitate de a lucra cu si pentru clienți
- Focus pe soluții și rezultate

body: JOB DESCRIPTION: We are looking for an experienced, forward thinking Websphere Message Broker Developer with a passion for growth and innovation. As a Websphere Message Broker Developer you will provide design direction to messaging bus to ensure high-quality solutions and consistent deliverables to support the Customer’s architecture using web services deployed in Enterprise Service Business layer and providing analysis and implementation support for customized systems. Responsibilities include, but are not limited to, the following: - Participates in all design sessions and provides technical leadership (including technical decisions, technology recommendations, defining standards, leading POCs, and mentoring developers); - Work with project sponsors during the project planning phase to understand the requirements in order to define an solution design that meets the business and technical needs; - Define the strategy and overall vision for solutions. Provide complete solution designs that consider cost, performance, scalability, reusability, and extensibility; - Document application requirements, technical specifications, use-cases, workflow processes;- Occasionally conduct research and Proofs of Concept on new technologies and applications; - Mentor and develop skills of other members of the team. Collaborate with other development and integration team members to ensure Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA) Integration technologies are properly implemented and maintainedMANDATORY SKILLS: Confirmed experience in integrations for Message broker V7 or up, and MQ V7 ; Confirmed experience with XML, web services and messaging knowledge ; Confirmed experience with Websphere suite of Service-Oriented Architecture (SOA) integration middleware.BENEFITS:• Motivating salary• Good working environment• Medical insurance• Annual team building• Trainings and certifications

body:
Java Developer for an innovative application
Come and develop solutions for Siemens in Brasov and Cluj at Siemens Convergence Creators!

Company profile:
We are a Siemens entity, providing internally to other units and externally to our direct customers solutions and services in the fields of communication networks, service and customer management, public safety and security, multimedia infotainment, as well as aerospace technology.
Based in Brasov and Cluj our company Siemens Convergence Creators SRL offers true experiences in international and local end-customer projects in the domains of: IT Process Orchestration, Voice networks, Product Configuration applications, Public Security and Space.

Project description: 
The target project consists of developing a brand new web-based CPQ – Configure, Price, and Quote – tool that has as main capabilities 1) fast offer creation, 2) dynamic contract generation and 3) rule based configuration of offer elements. An initial set of features have already been implemented and, after a very positive feedback from the international market, we have the urge to continue development and deliver a high quality product that lives up to its promises.

You will become part of the dynamic evolution of this spectacular product and have the chance to contribute substantially to it. We work agile, we focus on quality and we encourage active involvement from the team members. And we have a lot of fun. 
Come join us and make your contribution worth!

Estimated Project duration: April- September 2016

Technical skills required:
•	Expert in Java EE, Spring, JPA, Hibernate, JSP/JSF, Servlets, Web Services
•	Solid Experience with client-server based technologies and SW architecture practices
•	Good understanding of various Databases, UI frameworks, deployment environments 
•	Practitioner of Unit Testing , Continuous Integration, Build Automation and Agile Methodologies
•	Able to analyze and synthesize complex technical information
•	Experience with Vaadin is a big plus

Social skills:
•	have good interpersonal and communication skills
•	have creativity, promoter of new ideas
•	good team player
•	spoken languages: English at a very good level

Work experience: 5-7 years in SW Development

Benefits:
•	Work within both a professional and a friendly team;
•	Flexible work schedule and work from home policy;
•	Competitive remuneration; 
•	The chance to contribute substantially to an innovative product.

body: De ce sa ni te alaturi?Pentru ca tu, ca si Director Adjunct Magazin (Sales Leader), poți fi cel mai bun, în fiecare zi. In JYSK noi credem ca valorile personale stau la baza serviciilor si vanzarilor facute bine. Prin urmare, tie iti place să vinzi și întotdeauna depui eforturi pentru a îmbunătăți relatia cu clienții și serviciile oferite fiind un Bun comerciant, un Bun comunicator și un Bun coleg.Ca și Director Adjunct de Magazin vei cauta mereu solutii sa imbunatatesti vanzarile, standardul magazinului si satisfactia clientului. Ce vei face in fiecare zi?•	Responsabilitatea ta principala sunt vanzarile si trebuie sa te asiguri ca magazinul si personalul este pregatit pentru clienti. •	Optimizezi vanzarile in magazin.•	Planifici personalul si participi la dezvoltarea acestuia.•	Esti un model al valorilor noastre: ai spirit de comerciant, spirit de colegialitate si spirit corporatist.•	Participi la recrutarea, inductia, pregatirea si dezvoltarea echipei tale. Cum poti face diferenta in fiecare zi?•	Esti dispus sa participi la treaba din magazin pentru a duce lucrurile la bun sfarsit.•	Ești pasionat de optimizarea vanzarilor prin intermediul unui serviciu excelent oferit clientilor.•	Iti motivezi echipa si esti capabil sa obtii ce e mai bun de la ea.•	Te motiveaza o zi plina cu activitati diferite si iti doresti sa fii responsabil de intreg magazinul atunci cand Directorul de Magazin lipseste.•	Tu esti un angajat important. Pentru tine, o zi buna inseamna sa depasesti asteptarile clientilor si targetele de vanzari, impreuna cu echipa ta. •	Ai lucrat in retail, preferabil cu experienta in management. Esti interesat? Ti-ar placea sa faci parte dintr-o companie care se ocupa constant de pregatirea si dezvoltarea angajatilor sai, indiferent de pozitia pe care o au acestia, care iti ofera multe responsabilitati, dar si bonusuri atractive daca dai dovada de o performanta superioara?Suntem o companie care e onorata sa isi dezvolte managerii.Te rugam sa trimiti CV-ul tau.Numai candidatii selectati vor fi contactati.
title: Director Adjunct Magazin in Botosani
locations: Mihai Eminescu nr. 2, Botoșani, Județul Botoșani, România

body: The MissionData is a game-changer. It’s all around us. Implementing a uniform approach as to how we manage data throughout the bank allows us to enhance the customer experience, lower IT operational costs, and swiftly and correctly report to external regulators. Data management can help our customers and our organization unlock new potential and realize our shared vision of becoming a next generation digital bank. Your Day-to-DayContributing to lifecycle management of Data Lake implementations for different regions/ countries/ domains by: 	Analysing the environment and source of records	Building unit test mappings from source to common model based on IBM BDW	Propagating metadata to the Information Governance Catalogue and assign assets to terms	Defining Logical Data Model and Physical Data Model	Contributing to end-to-end testing	Contributing to deployment of code changes, mappings and metadata    Mentoring and guiding less experienced team membersOcassional travelling to Amsterdam, Netherlands, might be requiredWhat you bring to the teamKnowledge of database design, ETL and data analysis on large amounts of dataGood knowledge of Oracle Database, SQL, PL/SQLExperience with IBM InfoSphere DataStage and QualityStage Operations ConsoleExperience with IBM Information Governance CatalogExperience as developer of multi-tier applicationsAbility to translate functional and non-functional requirements (e.g. Security, High Availability)Experience with pair programming, release automationBasic knowledge of JavaExperience with Hadoop and knowledge of scripting on Unix systems is a plusUnderstanding of Agile - Scrum methodology is considered a plusExcellent written and spoken English skillsWhy ING ING is a frontrunner in the transformation of banking and a company that puts technology at its heart.Our mission it to empower people to stay a step ahead in life and in business and provide products services that make our customers’ life easier.What enables us to deliver best banking experience is Technology mastered by best IT specialists in the market.Hence, with up to 9,000 IT professionals worldwide, we are constantly striving for innovation, using not only top-notch technologies but also the latest methodologies in software development. In  addition to developing products and services aimed at offering best client experience, the IT experience at ING Romania goes beyond local borders. Therefore, in recognition of the high standards of IT engineers in Romania, in 2014, ING opened a Center of Excellence that develops banking software solutions for several countries in Europe.The IT community in ING Romania gathers more than 300 IT specialists and it’s expanding fast.If we caught your eye, let’s chat and see how we can build the bank of the future together!

body:
Veeam's Global Campaigns and Digital Marketing team is now hiring. We are utilizing innovative digital and offline marketing techniques for engagement creation, contextual marketing and lifecycle marketing to connect with our audience in 70+ countries.

The Web Content Specialist is responsible for keeping Veeam corporate portals and websites up to date and in perfect condition.

Responsibilities

Primarily responsible for content modifications, additions, deletions and implementing approved digital enhancements within a web-based content management system.
Continually monitor the website in a proactive manner to ensure that information is accurate, content is current and pages are free of errors.
Keep up to date on all web guidelines and standards. Work with Creative and Front-end teams to make certain that the proper guidelines are followed across all digital channels.
Perform image manipulation tasks such as creating thumbnails, image resize, file format conversion and simple image edits.
Create and maintain multimedia, including photo galleries, slideshows, and videos embedded in Web pages.
Manage all work request within a tracking system
Distribute posting notification to the appropriate stakeholders.
Verify that all content is approved through proper channels and systems prior to posting.

Qualifications

Must be able to work effectively both as a team member and independently.
Demonstrate ability to prioritize, multi-task, and work with minimal supervision in a team environment
Strong organization skills with emphasis on being conscientious and detail-oriented
Must be able to create and edit images using software tools such as Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Illustrator or Adobe InDesign.
Excellent computer skills and proficiency in Word, Excel, Outlook, Internet Explorer and PowerPoint
Be conversant in web basics.
Must possess excellent written and oral communication skills in order to effectively communicate with a wide variety of staff regarding the publication of information on the web.
Knowledge of multimedia/creative: e.g., interactive/web content, digital graphics/optimization

Additional skills

Working knowledge of computer software such as Windows, Microsoft Office, Adobe Creative Suite, as well as experience with social networking websites
Must have excellent skills in editing various types of web content ranging from general text content to specialized digital content
Ability to manage time and workload effectively, which includes planning, organizing, and prioritizing with attention to details
Knowledge and/or experience with HTML, CSS, web analytics, and content management systems is a strong plus

We offer

Modern, energetic working environment
Opportunities for professional growth and promotion
Salary ranges depending on skills and expertise
Flexible working hours

body:
JOB SUMMARY

Grow with us as HR workstream Project Assistant.

You will be part of the European HR Transformation project team, specifically the Process & Policy workstream. You will support the workstream in the coordination of HR Process & policy related activities across Europe, working in close partnership with internal Subject Matter Experts.

You will have experience in supporting the delivery of complex transformation projects in a multinational environment, in partnership with internal HR Transformation workstreams, global project teams, HR subject matter experts, etc.

WHAT WILL I BE DOING?

When joining the European HR Transformation project team, you will be a member of the Process and Policy workstream and your main tasks will be: 
Engage and partner with Kellogg Subject Matter Experts to gather and develop detailed procedure documentation and policies for HR processes across all European countries
Explore options and potential ideas to build and implement a new European policy portal 
Support internal project by managing a large amount of data and information for reporting and tracking
Support ad hoc project activities as and when required
Support the delivery of project milestones by undertaking project co-ordination activities
Be an active member of the European HR transformation team, working in partnership with the global project team

WHAT DO I NEED TO DEMONSTRATE?

Required:
Bachelor/Master Degree or equivalent plus relevant business qualification 
Experience in Human Resources, ideally HR shared services
Project Management experience ideally linked to HR processes
Experience in working across multiple countries and cultures
Ability to monitor, prioritize and resolve issues
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Proactive and follow through attitude
Excellent knowledge of Microsoft (Excel, PowerPoint, Visio , etc)
Ideally good knowledge of HR systems i.e. SAP, Taleo, Success Factors
Highly motivated and able to work in a fast changing, dynamic environment
Able to work in a multi-cultural and multi-disciplined team
Excellent team player 
WHAT ELSE DO I NEED TO KNOW?

Significant amount of travel across Europe will be required for the role.

This role is 6 to 9 months Fixed-term contract.

Fluency in English is required. Another European language is a plus.

Please note that we will only accept applications that are made to us via our Careers site.

If you experience any difficulty when applying please contact hrsharedservice@kellogg.com.

Please note that the closing date may be subject to change. We will interview suitable candidates as they apply, so please don’t hesitate to take this opportunity to submit your application as soon as possible.

If you would like to be immediately notified of new Kellogg's opportunities, please go to ‘Create or access my profile’ and complete the information required in the ‘Job Alerts’ section. You will then receive email alerts as soon as new jobs are advertised.

The Kellogg Company is an Equal Opportunity Employer who strives to provide an inclusive work environment that involves everyone and embraces the diverse talent of its people.

body: Finance Analyst - Marketing Operations-FIN001388As Finance Analyst in the recently created European Marketing Operations team you will be working cross functionally with the category, marketing and commercial teams to support the deployment of a significant marketing budget across Kellogg’s European operation. This role will provide a fantastic opportunity for a finance professional looking to gain commercial knowledge and experience of embedding new ways of working. WHAT WILL I BE DOING?·         Responsible for day to day finance activities for European media spend, including month-end and forecasting processes and associated reviews with Media Buying team, A&P trackers, variance analysis, sign-offs, system loading and reconciliations within the Accounting Policies. This will involve liaison with the current R2R GBS team, who complete the close elements.·         Business partner with the Marketing Operations Team on Media to ensure visibility and control of spend and adherence to the budget; this includes working with agencies to ensure proper visibility and controls.·         Control and management of A&P Investment, including Forecasting, Budget Planning, Internal Order Numbers and Hyperion processes.·         Partner with Categories, Clusters, GBS and Wired to Win team as appropriate to simplify, standardize and automate relevant processes and drive continuous improvement.·         S404 – Ensure S404 templates are up-to-date and perform S404 testing.·         Actively managing relevant balance sheet accounts to ensure items are not overly aged.·         Special projects and ad hoc analysis, as required.WHAT DO I NEED TO DEMONSTRATE? Required:·         Strong technical capability especially, in the use of Excel·         Impact & Influence·         Work independently·         Partner with non-finance customers·         SAP experience·         Proficient with Microsoft Office Excel (Required); Experience with Word, PowerPoint, and Access (Preferred)·         Experience working for a multinational organisation and working with colleagues internationallyPreferred:·         Commercial Finance, Financial Planning or Budgeting Experience·         Hyperion Planning experience·         Experience working in a shared services, process driven or service centre environment·         Strong understanding of accounting principles and deep, broad experience in all areas of general accounting·         Expertise in Record to Report function, including best practices, technologies, processes, procedures and tools WHAT ELSE DO I NEED TO KNOW? body:
Un job fun, intr-un loc de munca modern, cu o echipa tanara si primitoare, si multe altele te asteapta la CCC! 

Vorbesti fluent Franceza si mediu Engleza? 
Atunci acesta este jobul ideal pentru tine! 

Ce urmeaza sa faci si ce trebuie sa stii: 

Nu este neaparat nevoie sa ai experienta anterioara. Noi te vom pregati si iti vom arata cu rabdare tot ce e nevoie sa inveti pentru a lucra in departamentul de CS pentru o companie aeriana de renume! 

Daca poti:

• Sa vorbesti in Franceza fluent
• Sa comunici telefonic intr-un mod eficient si adaptat la fiecare client in parte 
• Sa stii sa folosesti un calculator: MS office si internet
• Sa poti sa lucrezi atat singur cat si in echipa
• Sa privești proiectele ca pe o provocare și o oportunitate de dezvoltare
• Sa te descurci in limba Engleza
Si in plus daca ai mai si lucrat pe un job similar-un avantaj, dar nu un criteriu obligatoriu- asteptam cu nerabdare sa ne cunoastem! 

Ce iti oferim noi:
• Salariu fix, bonuri de masa si bonusuri.
• Asigurare medicala privata
• Perioada de training platita
• Contract pe perioada nedeterminata
• Program flexibil- part time/ full time- cum vrei tu :)
• O echipa foarte motivata si dedicata, cu colegi tineri, dinamici si independenti cu care sa lucrezi si sa te distrezi
• Sansa de a deveni un profesionist in domeniul comunicarii
• O perioada de pregatire si de asemenea programe extinse de training si specializare in cadrul CCC Campus
• Perspectiva dezvoltarii unei cariere de succes intr-o companie internationala

Vino sa faci parte din povestea de succes CCC!

CCC este una dintre companiile de top din Europa care ofera servicii de customer care . Cei peste 5.000 de colegi din cele 15 locatii ale noastre din 8 tari diferite au creat deja o echipa dinamica, distractiva si flexibila, care asteapta cu nerabdare colegi noi!

Daca vrei sa afli mai multe despre noi, echipa noastra de recrutare iti va raspunde cu bucurie la un email trimis la jobs.bucharest@yourccc.com, sau poti intra cu incredere aici:

https://www.facebook.com/CCC-475187499233075

body:
Company Summary:
Since 1911, we have been part of society’s progress on five continents … and we’re not done! Our teams bring together some of the most skilled professionals anywhere. People like you, who have the desire to stretch their talents. By joining SNC-Lavalin, you’re seizing the chance to grow with a leader in engineering and construction offering challenges that never cease to inspire. Take this opportunity to go further.

SNC Lavalin, a leader in engineering and construction, is actively recruiting the best and the brightest for our shared services centre in Romania. This is your chance to showcase your skills by joining one of our world-class projects teams.

Global Information Technologies (GIT)
Contributes to SNC Lavalin's operational excellence by offering, complete, cost effective and efficient technological solutions for our business units and partners.

Global Financial Shared Services Centre (GFSSC)
Optimizes and standardizes finance processes and systems to streamline transaction based activities into one centralized location.

Job Description:
As a Financial Systems Analyst, you will be providing support (Level 2) to end users, which comprises trouble shooting problems, resolving system issues and responding to general inquiries.
You will also participate in designing, testing and documenting new developments in the financial system applications, as well as, assist with month-end and routine maintenance tasks in the system.
The financial systems analyst will operate through a contact center help-desk as part of a newly created global shared services center.

Responsibilities:
- Answer financial support calls (level 2) received from L1 and ensure resolution in a timely manner
- Perform root cause analysis and identify solutions for the problem
- Document test plans for new developments or data fixes in the application
- Prepare training documents to inform end-users of the new functionalities implemented
- Identify areas for improvement in either business processes or the system
- Manage Service Requests with Oracle to resolve issues identified in the application
- Perform certain routine responsibilities such as system configurations, integrity checks and closing modules for month-end
- Contribute to developing a Team-Based culture

Requirements:
- Proficiency in English (French is an advantage)
- Bachelor of commerce with major in business technology management or accounting
- Knowledge of the Microsoft Office Suite
- Knowledge of Oracle e-Business Suite would be an asset
- Knowledge of PL/SQL would be an asset
- Excellent oral and written communications skills
- Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced, demanding environment 
- Strong analytical skills
- Efficient time management
- Self-motivated, independent and ability to execute with minimum supervision
- Team player

Additional Information:
- Schedule: 11:00 - 20:00 (Monday to Friday)
- Commencement date – as soon as possible
- Only candidates selected for an interview will be contacted
- We are an equal opportunity employer
- The masculine gender is used only to simplify the wording
title: Financial Systems Analyst (eBS Knowledge)
locations: Dimitrie Pompeiu 5-7, București, Municipiul București, România

body: We are looking for a PHP/JavaScript Code MagicianOverviewYou will be part of a chosen few that will have the opportunity to work on some of the biggest projects in the market. Also, we’ve built over the years a work environment that provides our employees the X factor for coming to work. Do you have what it takes?What things are mandatory to knowPHP OOP – You will need to be able to write clean and maintainable code. You should know what classes, interfaces, abstractions, inheritance, polymorphism are. If you don’t have any experience with OOP programming, maybe you should reconsider applying for this.JavaScript OOP – Wait, what ??? JavaScript and OOP in the same sentence ? Well…yes.
