Take your time to study really hard and get back to us. We are always looking.What things would take your name out of the crowdExperience with a PHP MVC framework – Preferably Laravel or SymfonyExperience with a Javascript framework – of your choiceExperience with a CSS framework – of your choiceExperience with Big Data – as in BIG, REALLY BIGGithub / Bitbucket Profile – We respect your time for giving back to the community. TDD You should know that …We are part of the elite. There are a few places around the world where you would meet the technologies that we are using. Our work environment is custom tailored for your needs, and our colleagues are hand picked from the best of the best. Working with us will most probably change your life for the better. body: Descrierea CompanieiCu o experienta de peste 18 ani, firma internationala TOP LINE este varful de lance in dezvoltarea industriei serviciilor de frumusete profesionala din Romania. Compania ofera in Romania cele mai dorite produse si servicii pentru saloanele de infrumusetare (coafor, cosmetica, medicina estetica). TOP LINE asigura clientilor si partenerilor sai posibilitatea de a lucra in conditii excelente cu marci internationale vestite ca: GUINOT, ACADEMIE, MOROCCANOIL, JOICO, OPI, ANESI-DEPILEVE, LPG, MALETTI, ULTRATONE, IONTO-COMED, BEAUTY STAR, etc. De asemenea, Top Line ofera Programe de consiliere si finantare privind dezvoltarea saloanelor, Sustinere in marketing si comunicare a saloanelor partenere (campanii personalizate in mass media si social media, materiale de vizualizare, merchandising a zonei de revanzare, brosuri, pliante, etc) Top Line dispune de resursele unui Departament educational specializat in strainatate si colaborarea cu cele mai prestigioase Academii de Frumusete din lume, seminarii internationale si prezentarea in avanpremiera a celor mai importante noutati si trenduri la nivel mondial.Ce este important sa stiti inainte de a ne cunoaste : Vei face parte dintr-o echipă responsabilă pentru generarea si dezvoltarea de noi oportunitati de afaceri !Reprezentant Vanzari:-implementeaza politica de vânzări în concordanţă cu obiectivele strategice ale organizaţiei, in aria geografica de care este responsabil -planifica activitatea proprie de vizitare a clientilor, ofertare, generare si preluare comenzi de la clienti -sprijina implementarea activitatilor promotionale si a evenimentelor organizate de departamentul de marketing in zona sa, in scopul cresterii notorietatii produselor si vanzarii -culege informatii despre piata si concurenta, in vederea abordarii strategice a vanzarilor -intocmeste raportul de activitate din teren cu concluzii, ca unealta pentru sine si management in vederea cresterii vanzarilor - Contribuie la crearea unei imagini favorabile a firmei pe piata - Contribuie direct la cresterea numarului de clienti si a comenzilorEsti persoana pe care o cautam? Ce ne-ar placea sa gasim la tine:Conditii de baza: Locuiesti intr-unul dintre orasele : Bucuresti, Constanta, Brasov, Craiova, Timisoara, OradeaPosezi permis de conducere valabilExperiență și educație:- Ai minim doi ani experienta in Vanzari B2B ; B2C (cosmeticesi infrumusetare constituie avantaj)- Ai avut succes in vanzari si cunostinte complete ale procesului de vanzare- Ai abilitati foarte bune pentru Servirea Clientilor si Relationarea cu Clientii- Detii abilitatea de a lucra independent; esti motivat si organizat - Manifesti dorința de a-ti asuma responsabilitatea pentru proiecte și de a determina traiectoria lor ;- Responsabilitate si integritate in business si in relatia cu colegii - Detii abilitati de negociere si orientare spre rezultate.Beneficii:- Venit motivant- Sistem de bonusare in functie de performanta- Specializare continua - Program Permanent de Dezvoltare Profesionala si Personala, sustinut de unii dintre cei mai performati specialisti din Romania: Training, Ateliere Practice, Coaching, Coaching on the Job.Primesti provocarea?

body:
Veeam Software helps organizations safeguard their investment in VMware virtual infrastructure by providing innovative systems management software designed to reduce costs, increase productivity and mitigate risk. Veeam is rapidly expanding its presence around the world. The company's U.S. headquarters is in Columbus, Ohio and European headquarters in London, UK and APAC headquarters based in Sydney Australia.
Veeam Software is all about the people. The best people drive the best technologies to help IT organizations all over the world. Do you have a passion for new, cutting-edge technologies? We are always looking for talented, creative and motivated people to join our team. Take a look at the available positions below and apply today.
The Inside Sales Representative is responsible for winning deals for Veeam together with our Channel Partners on the territory of Nordic region.  This position will be based in Bucharest, Romania.

Language Required
	English

Responsibilities
	Receiving and responding to inbound sales leads and converting them to new business.
	Maximizing coverage within the target region and penetrate organizations with Veeam products
	Coordinating sales activities with partners/consultants/distributors and resellers to identify and close new business
	Initiating telephone and email contact with potential prospects from developed web and lead generation lists; cold calling as needed
	Developing a solid working knowledge of Veeam Software products and the benefits they provide to potential customers
	Providing support to qualified prospects and customers including follow up, product information, quotations and closures
	Providing forecasting and account opportunity as needed
	Updating and maintaining the Veeam CRM system

Qualifications
	2-4 years of experience in B2B sales
	Fluent English
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
	Ability to work independently with limited direction in a fast-paced environment; must be a high energy motivated self-starter
	Higher education 

Please visit our career website for more opportunities!
https://careers.veeam.com/

body: Vino la noi sa practici medicina asa cum ai sperat in prima zi!Începe planificarea relocarii tale in  Marea Britanie de azi!  Stim ca vrei conditii mai bune la locul de munca si stim ca vrei sa fii respectat pentru efortul pe care il depui. Noi respectam oamenii care s-au pregatit intens pentru a ajuta alti oameni sa duca o viata sanatoasa. Noi iti oferim acum oportunitatea sa iti arati adevaratul potential si sa fii rasplatit cu un venit la adevaratele standarde europene. Cei peste 70 de colegi romani angajati deja te asteapta in Scotia sa te alaturi echipei! La Meallmore vei putea sa iti pui in practica pregatirea folosindu-te de echipamente de ultima generatie reusind astfel sa inveti mai multe intr-un ritm mai accelerat devenind si mai bun pe zi ce trece. Sa nu uitam ca vei avea posibilitatea sa cunosti si sa te integrezi intr-o alta cultura plina oameni mult mai prietenosi, respectuosi si mai civilizati. Meallmore a devenit optiunea numarul 1 pentru asistentii care doresc sa se relocheze in Marea Britanie si care planuiesc sa isi aduca si familiile in cel mai scurt timp posibil.Vrei sa iti povesteasca altii care au facut deja acest pas inaintea ta?Vrei șansa de a vorbi cu potențialii tăi colegi noi, astfel încât acestia să vă povesteasca experiența lor în Marea Britanie?Va rugam sa ne contactati pentru a va da detaliile lor!Ei vor reveni în România pentru a recruta asistenti medicali generalisti pe 22 și 23 februarie 2016. Dacă planificati sa aplicati pentru un loc de munca acum PCQ și Meallmore va ajuta să începeți inregistrarea la NMC(Ordinul Asistentilor din Marea Britanie) din acest an, pentru a evita testarea de engleză care se introduce din ianuarie 2016 și vom plăti pentru fiecare candidat potrivit taxa de aplicare la NMC de £ 110!Despre angajatorAceastă companie are deja în jur de 70 de asistenți medicali romani. Clientul nostru este unul dintre cei mai respectati furnizori din Marea Britanie de asistență medicală și de ingrijire in centre rezidentiale. Avand centre de ingrijire in intreaga Scotie,acesta este specializat în îngrijirea persoanelor vârstnice cu o gama larga de afectiuni medicale, inclusiv demență.Oferta noastra:	Zborul catre UK este asigurat de Meallmore. Evident, cu bagajele facute fara sa iti faci probleme ce ar trebui sa lasi acasa. Ai 2 bagaje incluse(unul de mana si altul de cala ), dar nu in ultimul rand, va fi cineva care sa te primeasca la aeroport.	Salariul pentru asistentii medicali inregistrati la NMC: 13 £/ ora (aprox. 18.5 euro/ora), respectiv 18 £ (aprox. 25.5 euro/ora) pentru orele suplimentare	Salariul asistenti medicalii in curs de inregistrare: 8.50 £/ ora (aprox. 12 euro/ora), respectiv 11.67 £/ora pentru orele suplimentare	Posibilitatea accesarii unui avans din salariu de cel mult 1.000 £ pentru ca tu sa te poti instala si acomoda.	In plus fata de cele mentionate, mai primesti inca 300 £ bonus la sosire ca prima de instalare pentru a te ajuta sa acoperi din costurile initiale de relocare. Cazarea va fi pregatita in localitate, ori intr-o locuita la comun sau o unitate de cazare cu mic dejun inclus pentru care Meallmore iti va asigura costurile in valoare de maxim 300 £, ramanand ca doar eventualele diferente sa fie achitate pe cont propriu.	Clinica Meallmore te va ajuta sa iti gasesti casa potrivita pentru tine! Vei primi toate recomandarile si sugestiile despre ce ar fi indicat sa ai in vedere cand vei cauta o locuinta, pentru ca tu sa nu platesti o chirie supraevaluata.	Daca chiria initala(din perioada de acomodare) e mai ieftina, diferenta nu o vei pierde! Aceasta plus inca 100 de lire se vor aduna pentru prima plata a chiriei. Te poti folosi de aceasta suma inclusiv pentru plata utilitatilor si intretinerii care vor intra in responsabilitatea ta.	Te vom ajuta sa iti deschizi un cont bancar si in obtinerea numarului de asigurare sociala (NINO).Beneficii:Meallmore iti va oferi urmatoarele beneficii:•	Plata corecta a orelor suplimentare prestate•	Posibilitati reale de dezvoltare•	Concediu medical platit•	Contributia la sistemul de pensii •	Uniforma personalizata Meallmore gratuita•	Traininguri gratuite- Instruirea personalului pentru ultilizarea PC și eLearning cu ‘Learn Pro“•	Mediu de lucru excelentAplica acum CV-ul tau pentru a stabili un interviu!
title: Alatura-te asistentilor medicali de la Meallmore!

body: How about working on great technology and feeling comfortable and positive at the same time? Join a handful of passionate people who love working together for a complex but rewarding mission: Create great technology, made in Romania and used all around the world.As a Software QA Engineer, you will:•	be responsible for the quality of the software we provide to our customers•  	design test case scenarios and test plans•	develop and work with suites of automated tests (e.g. Selenium) and also execute manual tests (on Linux/Windows OS) •	report defects well documented for the development team•	verify, troubleshoot and reproduce issues•	have to interact with the development team and the support team•	work with defect tracking and test cases management tools•	manage test releases and test environmentsYou:•	believe you are passionate about software and IT. Because we are•	are already the proud owner of a decent IT knowledge base that you are interested to enhance and grow•	would be willing to use this knowledge base in software testing - such as TCP/IP protocols, client server concepts, web technologies•	would see no problem doing that on various operating systems  - Linux/Unix, Windows•	consider yourself meticulous and rigorous•	have good communication skills•	would search the cause of a software problem with the full curiosity and determination of an intellectual challengeIt would be even nicer if you:•	successfully survived to software testing exposure •	Have previously used (not only by accident) at least one scripting language (Perl, Python, Ruby, shell scripting)•	Already know that Selenium means also something else than a chemical element•	Really do read, understand and speak English•	Were involved before in software engineering processes & best practices (unit testing, system & integration testing)What’s in it for you:•	Be part of the evolution of one of the few “Made in Romania” software apps. The Axigen Mail Server is used by customers worldwide for the last 10 years•	A pleasant and friendly work environment, with now no more than 25 people, in which expertise is shared openly and where everybody strives for knowledge and self-improvement•	You will use the latest technologies in development and automated testing•	You will came across a lot of coaching and learning opportunities•	Attractive remuneration package, lunch discount tickets, Happy Friday Cookies•	Private health insurance and performance bonuses•	A flexible program ensuring a fair work/life balance•	Limited transportation hassle: we’re 8 min walking from the subway station, and you won’t go mad if you try to park nearby.About AxigenFounded as GECAD Technologies in 2001, the company became Axigen Messaging in 2012. Separated from the GECAD Group by 2014, the company with 100% Romanian ownership focuses ever since on the development & distribution of innovative messaging solutions. Since its first release in 2005, Axigen was continuously improved and extended, with the next major version – Axigen X – being expected in 2016. The software is currently supported on both Windows and most Linux flavors (RPM distributions, Debian, FreeBSD, Solaris).Axigen’s customer base is extremely diverse, covering from telcos, ISPs, private companies, and banks to academic and government institutions worldwide.
title: Software QA Engineer
locations: Str. Nicolae Caramfil, București, Municipiul București, România

body: Ericsson Overview Ericsson is world’s leading provider of communications technology and services. Our offerings include services, consulting, software and infrastructure within Information and Communications Technology. Using innovation to empower people, business and society, Ericsson is working towards the Networked Society: a world connected in real time that will open up opportunities to create freedom, transform society and drive solutions to some of our planet’s greatest challenges. We are truly a global company, operating across borders in over 180 countries, offering a diverse, performance-driven culture and an innovative and engaging environment. As an Ericsson employee, you will have freedom to think big and the support to turn ideas into achievements. Continuous learning and growth opportunities allow you to acquire the knowledge and skills necessary to progress and reach your career goals. We invite you to join our team. The Front office RAN Technician (Front Office Team Member) is the MSIP appointed responsible for monitoring and first level troubleshooting of all events from the network. The Front office RAN Technician will monitor all the Radio Access alarms and performs the first level troubleshooting within scope of contract and secure that all the alarms are properly handled whilst ensuring customer satisfaction. FO engineer interacts with other technicians, customer technical staff and other groups within Service Delivery organization (other Front Office teams, Incident Manager, Back Office, Problem Management, Change Manager, COM, MSIP).Main activities & Responsibilities •	Network surveillance: 1st level of support and preventative maintenance•	Monitoring, troubleshooting, fault acknowledgement and analysis•	Trouble ticket management•	Maintains the service delivery level within the agreed SLAs•	Follow-up on incidents, and interact with next level of support.•	Interprets / understands technical information and prepares technical documentation•	Solve standard problems based on the existing procedures•	Work with the application for trouble ticket management•	Controls and manages complex technical situations/projects under pressure calm and professionally •	Work in an international environment, with customers and suppliers•	Use effectively telecom knowledge to manage faults and customer demandsRequired competences •	Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Electric/Telecom Engineering, Information Technology or related fields or relevant equivalent experience•	Knowledge in Telecom Networks, network elements and telecom services•	Previews work experience in CORE Circuit Switch/Packet Switch and/or VAS/BSS is a plus•	1 year experience in a Telecom Environment or relevant field •	Good knowledge of IT•	Certifications: Any Certification related to Telecom shall be an added advantageRequired skills •	Fluent in English : conversation and writing•	Spanish or Italian Skill as a plus•	Strong communication skills•	Capacity to learning quickly technical and procedural topics•	Strong analytical and organizational skills•	Pro-active and team worker•	Strong performance focus•	Self-motivated and well under pressure.•	Excellent team-working skills and stress resistant•	Work independently  keeping own competence and skills up to dateWorking hours Work on shifts 24x7.
title: Front Office Technician with Spanish or Italian
locations: West Gate Park, București, Municipiul București, România

body: DESCRIEREA COMPANIEI:Telekom Romania este un brand de telecomunicaţii nou și dinamic, care oferă servicii de telecomunicaţii fixe şi mobile complete, inovatoare, simplificate și personalizate pentru o comunitate vastă de clienți, cu peste 10 de milioane de contracte de servicii. Prin cei doi operatori, Telekom Romania Mobile Communications şi Telekom Romania Communications, Telekom Romania oferă servicii integrate de telecomunicații, astfel încât clienţii să beneficieze de o experiență completă şi plină de satisfacţii: servicii de voce și date mobile 3G și 4G mobile, telefonie fixă tradițională, internet de mare viteză și televiziune pe mai multe tehnologii, inclusiv IPTV precum și conținut de înaltă calitate și exclusivități. Pentru clienţii business, noul brand este promisiunea unor soluții IT & C la cheie, care să sprijine companiile să devină mai competitive și mai agile. Telekom Romania este un brand din familia Deutsche Telekom, prezent în 51 de țări de pe cinci continente, cu peste  143 de milioane de clienţi de telefonie mobilă, 31 de milioane de clienţi de servicii fixe şi peste 17 milioane de linii de broadband din întreaga lume. Brandul este prezent pe piaţa românească din 2014, după rebranding-ul comun al COSMOTE România și Romtelecom. RESPONSABILITATI: Contacteaza clienţii sau este contactat de catre clientii care îşi declară intenţia de a rezilia contractul de servicii încheiat cu Telekom, respectând termenul si procedurile de lucru în vigoare; Pregăteşte informaţiile necesare procesului de negociere, în vederea reţinerii clienţilor, utilizând bazele de date disponibile în sistemele IT; Identifică motivul solicitării de reziliere. Găseşte soluţii pentru a păstra clienţii în reţea, potrivite atat pentru clienti cat si pentru Companie; Identifică corect solicitările clienţilor, oferă răspunsuri profesioniste, se implică activ în rezolvarea problemelor semnalate de clienţi, păstrând un ton amabil şi profesionist pe toată durata apelului; Promovează produsele şi serviciile Telekom în toate apelurile eligibile; Foloseşte corect aplicaţiile cu care lucrează, astfel încât să ofere informaţii complete despre solicitarile clientilor. CERINTELE POSTULUI:Educatie: Studii medii/superioareExperienta: In vanzari, retentie si relatii cu clientii Cunostinte PC: MS Office Competente / Abilitati:  Abilităţi de negociere şi vânzare, Abilităţi de comunicare, Abilităţi de ascultare activa, Abilitatea şi disponibilitatea de a lucra în echipă, Capacitatea de a crea un climat de lucru în echipă, Autocontrol, Stabilitate emoţională, Capacitatea de a se adapta cu uşurinţă la schimbările metodelor de lucru Capacitate de a lucra în condiţii de stres; Dedicare pentru rezolvarea solicitarilor clienţilor; Nume de contact: HR Shared Service CenterAdresa de e-mail: myhr_recruitment@telekom.com

body:
CANDIDAT IDÉAL :

• Webhelp Roumanie est actuellement une entreprise en pleine croissance à la recherche des collègues enthousiastes, communicatifs, qui aiment bien travailler en équipe.

• Etant donné que tu seras en contact permanent avec nos clients, tu apprendras à répondre à leurs besoins et à t’adapter rapidement aux changements tout en ayant une attitude positive.

• Nous allons travailler ensemble afin de t’aider à maîtriser l’art de la communication et de la relation client pour délivrer un service de la plus haute qualité.

• Intègre nos équipes de Galati pour enrichir ton expérience professionnelle et apprendre à maîtriser en français les outils de communication et une large gamme d’activités.

RESPONSABILITÉS :

• Accorder du support aux clients par téléphone (appel entrant ou sortant) et/ou en écrit (mail/chat/courrier).

• Solutionner les différents soucis du client.

• Intervenir dans les outils de communication.

• Répondre aux questions liées aux produits acquis.

BÉNÉFICES :

• Pour t’aider dans ton parcours professionnel, Webhelp Roumanie te propose des formations avancées (rémunérées) qui te préparent pour les missions que tu auras au sein de notre entreprise.

• Avec des locaux très accessibles, nous te proposons des horaires de travail flexibles et adaptés à tes besoins.

• Toutes les promotions sont issues de l’interne et nous mettons tout en œuvre pour t’offrir une carrière professionnelle au sein de notre entreprise.

• Rémunération attractive (salaire, prime de performance mensuelle et individuelle, subventions, etc.).

• Abonnement médical.

DESCRIPTION DE L’ENTREPRISE :

N°2 des Outsourceurs en France et N°3 en Europe, le groupe Webhelp est un opérateur international en Gestion de la Relation Clients qui a connu la plus forte croissance de son secteur entre 2002 et 2012.

Le groupe réalise près de 725 millions d'euros de chiffre d'affaires auprès de plus de 165 clients globaux. Au quotidien, 30 000 collaborateurs sont au contact des consommateurs dans 81 sites de production répartis dans 21 pays : France, Belgique, Roumanie, Portugal, Italie, Suisse, Autriche, Allemande, Pologne, République Tchèque, Pays Bas, Maroc, Algérie, Royaume-Uni, Afrique du Sud, Madagascar, Inde, Suriname et Tuquie.

Webhelp est le 1er employeur francophone de Roumanie avec plus de 2000 collaborateurs sur ses six sites de Bucarest, Ploiesti, Iasi et Galati.

http://job.webhelp.ro/
title: Client adviser with French at Galati

body:
We are seeking for a qualified, highly motivated Quality Assurance Engineer. He/she will have a key role in an Agile Team, responsible for the overall quality of the product, involved in planning, design, validation, verification, maintenance of the product.
The QA engineer must understand and follow the established QA process. He / she will take part in the requirements analysis on a team level, define test cases according to the requirements, create and maintain the cases in the case repository, create defects based on “root-cause” analysis and verify fixed defects based on risk assessment of the affected areas.
The QA engineer is responsible for creating and maintaining QA related documentation (test strategies, test cases, test requirements etc.), status reporting and QA metrics. He / she has responsibility for the overall quality of the products.
A candidate for this position will have to know or be willing to learn to write automation tests for the use cases validated.

Project description

Secure Relay is an Axway strategic component that is embedded in multiple Axway deliveries. This component is a proxy that allows routing of transferred messages between external partners and internal network. This is a security layer that insures our customer that their internal applications are not vulnerable to outside security attacks.
The product uses Java technology for securing communications between external parties and internal network. Multiple transport protocols are supported (HTTP/s, FTP/s, SFTP, OFTP, PeSIT and others). As the product is a proxy that our customers use to secure their internal network there is a high accent set on providing more secure implementation and making sure that all security alerts are being addressed.
Skills/Qualifications

•	At least 3 years of QA experience 
•	Strong troubleshooting and analysis skills
•	Proactive, able to quickly identify test risk areas
•	Experience using test management systems (e.g.: Quality Center)
•	Basic knowledge of Linux operating systems
•	Script programming (e.g.: UNIX shell, Perl, Python) is a plus
•	Knowledge of network and Internet standards (TCP/IP, FTP, SMTP, HTTP, SFTP)
•	Understanding of security algorithms and concepts (PKI Infrastructures, SSL, S/Mime)
•	Security-focused, up-to-date with the latest security trends
•	Experience working with at least one database (e.g.: Oracle, SQL Server) and MySQL is a plus
•	Experience with Test Automation (Java) is considered a plus
•	Experience using defect tracking systems (e.g.: Mantis, Bugzilla, Jira) is a plus
•	Fluent or native English

Career Development

This is what our candidates can expect from us if they choose to join our team:
- Career development: Employee career development is one of Axway’s major company values; and we are deeply committed to helping them leverage the promotion and job mobility opportunities that are right for them.
In addition, Axway’s global presence creates opportunities for geographical mobility both within Axway subsidiaries.
- An important training plan (technical, product & functional) in order to insure your integration and your performance
- A competitive remuneration package and real benefits
- A future and a potential for growth in an international company
- A very friendly working environment with experienced professionals
- Get challenged with important tasks so they can show their full potential and obtain new skills
- Working time that can be flexible when needed
- More paid vacation
- Open office space with various entertainment opportunities – table tennis, drums, sports and more!


Submit resumé or CV and region you are applying for to avrancianu@axway.com.
title: Senior Software Quality Assurance Engineer
locations: Central Business Park Calea Serban Voda nr. 133, București, Municipiul București, România

De ce sa ni te alaturi?
Pentru ca tu, ca si Director Adjunct Magazin (Sales Leader), poți fi cel mai bun, în fiecare zi. In JYSK noi credem ca valorile personale stau la baza serviciilor si vanzarilor facute bine. Prin urmare, tie iti place să vinzi și întotdeauna depui eforturi pentru a îmbunătăți relatia cu clienții și serviciile oferite fiind un Bun comerciant, un Bun comunicator și un Bun coleg.Ca și Director Adjunct de Magazin vei cauta mereu solutii sa imbunatatesti vanzarile, standardul magazinului si satisfactia clientului. 
Ce vei face in fiecare zi?•	Responsabilitatea ta principala sunt vanzarile si trebuie sa te asiguri ca magazinul si personalul este pregatit pentru clienti. •	Optimizezi vanzarile in magazin.•	Planifici personalul si participi la dezvoltarea acestuia.•	Esti un model al valorilor noastre: ai spirit de comerciant, spirit de colegialitate si spirit corporatist.•	Participi la recrutarea, inductia, pregatirea si dezvoltarea echipei tale. 

Cum poti face diferenta in fiecare zi?•	Esti dispus sa participi la treaba din magazin pentru a duce lucrurile la bun sfarsit.•	Ești pasionat de optimizarea vanzarilor prin intermediul unui serviciu excelent oferit clientilor.•	Iti motivezi echipa si esti capabil sa obtii ce e mai bun de la ea.•	Te motiveaza o zi plina cu activitati diferite si iti doresti sa fii responsabil de intreg magazinul atunci cand Directorul de Magazin lipseste.•	Tu esti un angajat important. Pentru tine, o zi buna inseamna sa depasesti asteptarile clientilor si targetele de vanzari, impreuna cu echipa ta. •	Ai lucrat in retail, preferabil cu experienta in management. 
Esti interesat? 
Ti-ar placea sa faci parte dintr-o companie care se ocupa constant de pregatirea si dezvoltarea angajatilor sai, indiferent de pozitia pe care o au acestia, care iti ofera multe responsabilitati, dar si bonusuri atractive daca dai dovada de o performanta superioara?Suntem o companie care e onorata sa isi dezvolte managerii.
Te rugam sa trimiti CV-ul tau.Numai candidatii selectati vor fi contactati.

body: Job Description Working in the Network Operations Center, the Intermediate Analyst – Telecommunications will focus on functional analysis and technical support for any telecommunications-related equipment or infrastructure application problems and will have the opportunity to learn about other fields (server, email, remote access, Web access). The incumbent will also monitor service availability of existing infrastructure at various SNC-Lavalin business units and project sites. The duties will require ongoing cooperation with the GIT services center, the implementation/maintenance group and external GIT resources. Responsibilities • Diagnose and solve hardware and infrastructure application problems mostly related to servers management (material and operating systems) • Administer and monitor the main infrastructure components at various business units and project sites • Analyze causes of incidents and document them • Identify and report performance problems related to material problems or server exploitation systems • Identify and report hardware or link-related performance problems • Consult specialized technical resources for complex cases Requirements Qualifications & Experience: • University Diploma in Information Technologies• At least 3 years of general experience in network administration or any other relevant experience • Good knowledge of and experience with Microsoft Windows Server 2003/2008/2012 • Good knowledge VMware ESX server administration • Good knowledge of and experience with Back-up systems • Good knowledge of Active Directory, DNS and DHCP • Good knowledge of TCP/IP protocol • Experience with large and complex environments • Good knowledge of IIS 6 or new version Capabilities: • Proficiency in English (French writing and speaking is an advantage)• Attention to detail and thoroughness• Customer service oriented• Ability to work well in a team environment.

body: StellenbeschreibungIm Rahmen unserer Strategie zum Ausbau der globalen Einkaufsaktivitäten sind Sie für den Aufbau eines strategischen Einkaufs in Abstimmung mit dem Konzerneinkauf, sowie für die Beschaffung der direkten und indirekten Materialien für den Standort Rumänien verantwortlich. In dieser Funktion verantworten Sie die Einkaufsziele Qualität, Kosten und Lieferservice im Umfeld aller in Rumänien lokalisierten Beschaffungsumfänge zur Versorgung des Standortes Sibiu. Mit Ihrem Fachwissen hinsichtlich der Beschaffungsregion Osteuropa sind Sie für die gezielte Lieferantenauswahl und deren vertragliche Absicherung zuständig und führen die Vergabeentscheidungen über Konzerngremien herbei. In dieser Funktion arbeiten Sie auch eng mit den angrenzenden Bereichen Vertrieb, Produktentwicklung-und Konstruktion, Produktmanagement, Qualitätswesen, Logistik und Produktion zusammen. Aus der systematischen Beschaffungsmarktbearbeitung und Überwachung der Preisentwicklung, setzen Sie Kostenreduzierungspotenziale selbstständig um. In Zusammenarbeit mit dem Konzerneinkauf reduzieren Sie die administrativen Aufwände und nehmen eine Lead Funktion für die Beschaffungsregion Osteuropa ein. Als Einkaufsverantwortlicher für die Beschaffungsregion Osteuropa sind Sie erster Ansprechpartner und Schnittstelle zu den regionalen Lieferanten für das gesamte WITTENSTEIN Einkaufsnetzwerk weltweit. In enger Zusammenarbeit und unter fachlicher Führung des zentralen Materialgruppenmanagements agieren Sie als lokales Einkaufsbüro, sowohl für die Lieferantenqualifizierung und – entwicklung, als auch für das lokale Beschaffungsmarktscouting und entwickeln unter Berücksichtigung der konzernweiten Materialgruppenstrategien ein leistungsfähiges Lieferantenportfolio in der Beschaffungsregion Osteuropa.AnforderungenSie haben eine technische Grundausbildung mit mehrjähriger strategischer Einkaufserfahrung im Lieferantenmanagement. Idealerweise verfügen Sie über einen Hochschulabschluss als Wirtschaftsingenieur oder vergleichbarer Ausbildung. Produkt- und Prozesskenntnisse hinsichtlich den Beschaffungsmärkten für mechanische und mechatronische Antriebssysteme auf Ebene der Einzelkomponenten sind von Vorteil. Ihre Persönlichkeit ist gekennzeichnet durch Verhandlungsgeschick, Organisationstalent sowie einer ausgeprägten Teamfähigkeit in Konzernstrukturen. Den sicheren Umgang mit ERP-Systemen, MS Office-Programmen sowie Reisebereitschaft setzen wir voraus. Als deutschsprachiger Konzern verfügen Sie über verhandlungssichere Deutschkenntnisse.

body:
Veeam's Global Campaigns and Digital Marketing team is now hiring. We are utilizing innovative digital and offline marketing techniques for engagement creation, contextual marketing and lifecycle marketing to connect with our audience in 70+ countries. For this new role we are looking for an Online Advertisement Specialist who will run and scale the sponsored media activities on major IT websites and platforms.

This person will help to maintain relationships with key media publishers worldwide and ensure successful execution of marketing campaigns and targets. This person will work together with other teams on content planning, - creation and – promotion. This includes building web banners, landing pages or mini portals for campaign execution.

Responsibilities

Coordinate paid online media contracts execution
Work with external vendors on promotions optimization
Web banner and landing page creation
Work together with other teams on content creation, promotion and planning
Targeted banner placements in relevant sources and categories
Keep promotion materials (whitepapers, videos, banners) up to date
Upload leads to CRM and track quality
Submit invoices to accounting system and control timely payment
A/B testing
Analyze results, measure success, and drive optimization

Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in marketing, economics or equivalent
Passion for technology and IT industry
University graduate with relevant internships or junior with 1 to 2 years of experience
Exceptional English communication skills: must be able to articulate a clear, persuasive argument orally and in writing
Strong analytical, planning and forecasting skills
Understanding of online media buying & media planning platforms (e.g. Google) a plus
Must be team player with ability to multi-task and thrive under pressure to meet deadlines in fast-paced environment

body: How about working on great technology and feeling comfortable and positive at the same time? Join a handful of passionate people who love working together for a complex but rewarding mission: Create great technology, made in Romania and used all around the world.As a Technical Support Engineer, you will:•	handle from the office incoming customer requests related to our products (Axigen Email Server and AddOns)•	investigate and solve functional problems •	understand and assimilate new products & technologies•	configure and deploy Axigen Email Server and 3rd party products or AddOns•	develop monitoring & configuration scripts•	deal with customer technical requests & requirements•	present and sustain technical solutions to the customer•	collaborate with the software and testing teams to ensure efficient bug fixing You:•	believe you are passionate about software and IT. Because we are•	like helping people solve their problems, whatever the channel: email or voice•	feel confident on your IT technologies exposure up to date,  including the understanding of various operating systems (Linux/Unix, Windows)•	possess a solid knowledge of networking, TCP/IP protocols and services•	are a good communicator and have a “can do” problem solving attitude.•	have a long friendship with at least one scripting language (Perl, Python, Ruby, shell scripting)•	really do read, understand and speak English. You will need it.It would be even nicer if you:•	gathered some experience with Email Servers and Email Protocols (SMTP/POP3/IMAP/etc)•	have a good idea about web technologies•	are not a complete stranger of Windows OS inner works •	are yourself a heavy user of email and collaboration features (Calendar, Contacts, etc)What’s in it for you:•	Be part of the evolution of one of the few “Made in Romania” software apps. The Axigen Mail Server is used by customers worldwide for the last 10 years•	A pleasant and friendly work environment, with now no more than 25 people, in which expertise is shared openly and where everybody strives for knowledge and self-improvement•	Attractive remuneration package, lunch discount tickets, Happy Friday Cookies•	Private health insurance and performance bonuses•	A flexible program ensuring a fair work/life balance. And yes, overtime is rewarded.•	Limited transportation hassle: we’re 8 min walking from the subway station, and you won’t go mad if you try to park nearby.About AxigenFounded as GECAD Technologies in 2001, the company became Axigen Messaging in 2012. Separated from the GECAD Group by 2014, the company with 100% Romanian ownership focuses ever since on the development & distribution of innovative messaging solutions. Since its first release in 2005, Axigen was continuously improved and extended, with the next major version – Axigen X – being expected in 2016. The software is currently supported on both Windows and most Linux flavors (RPM distributions, Debian, FreeBSD, Solaris).Axigen’s customer base is extremely diverse, covering from telcos, ISPs, private companies, and banks to academic and government institutions worldwide.
title: Technical Support Engineer
locations: Str. Nicolae Caramfil, București, Municipiul București, România

body:
Studio 20 este unul dintre cele mai apreciate si respectate studiouri la nivel mondial. Calitatea muncii noastre a fost rasplatita cu mai multe premii internationale, dintre care amintim cele mai recente:

Best Live Cam Studio (YNOT Awards, Praga, septembrie 2015)Best Emerging Studio (AW Awards, Mamaia, iunie 2015)Studio of The Year (GFY Awards, Las Vegas, ianuarie 2015 si din nou in ianuarie 2016)
Activitatea noastra a fost prezentata de presa de business din Romania, cu cifre reale, ca un exemplu de profesionalism si experienta in acest domeniu. Modele faimoase precum Devious Angel, Emma Wild, Raquelle Diva, Sasha Red sau Zeya Brunette au primit de asemnea premii internationale la Barcelona, Praga si Las Vegas, dovedind ca stim si putem sa crestem modele de succes, care castiga peste 10.000$ lunar.

Dincolo de premii, suntem o echipa extrem de simpatica si atenta, un loc de munca placut, de care te vei atasa. Lucram 100% legal si avem peste 15 ani de experienta in Romania (am inceput in anul 2001). Cele mai mari situri din lume ne mentioneaza oficial ca parteneri preferati si sunt alaturi de modelele care lucreaza la noi pentru a le ajuta sa reuseasca.

Acum pregatim o echipa noua pentru viitorul studio din Timisoara. Daca esti o persoana vesela, pozitiva, empatica, daca stii sa comunici si sa motivezi pe cei din jur, sa-i ajuti sa ofere ce este mai bun in el si daca pui succesul lor deasupra orgoliului tau, atunci vino alaturi de noi.

Candidatul ideal este o ea pentru jobul de Trainer / Coach si un el pentru jobul de Admin / Suport, are intre 25 si 45 de ani, vorbeste si scrie fluent limba engleaza si vrea sa invete, sa avanseze, sa aiba o cariera, fiind evident constient(a) ca pentru asta efortul si implicarea trebuie sa fie pe masura.

Experienta in live cam / video chat, ca model, hostess, suport, admin, trainer, manager, fotograf, operator si asa mai departe poate fi un avantaj, dar nu este obligatorie.

Interviurile se vor tine in perioada 15-17 decembrie in Timisoara, iar jobul va incepe efectiv la inceputul lunii ianuarie cu o luna de training platit in sediul central din Bucuresti, deschiderea studioului din Timisoara avand apoi loc pe 1 februarie 2016.

Poti aplica si daca te intereseaza alte joburi disponibile in studiourile 20 din Timisoara, Bucuresti sau Cluj (Cluj-Napoca): asistent / asistenta, maketing, social media, call center, operator, traducator, PR, HR, recrutare, financiar, model, hostess, vanzari, sales, servicii.  Interviu Online:1.  Pentru ce job ai decis sa aplici?2.  Ce te atrage la Studio 20?3.  Ai mai lucrat vreodata in domeniul nostru de activitate (pe orice post)?

Despre rolul de Corporate Account Manager:



Gestioneaza relatii tip win/win cu clientii corporate ( conturi medii si mari) cu scopul de a creste vanzarile Vodafone si profitabilitatea clientilor din baza alocata.
Dobandeste cota de piata si aduce valoare prin depasirea targeturilor, sustinuta de  asigurarera unei experiente bazata pe incredere si parteneriat.
Responsabilitati principale:



Vinde solutii de afaceri potrivite conditiilor de piata si obiectivelor companiei prin abordare de vanzare consultativa  
Protejeaza/creste profitabilitatea clientilor prin angajamente pe termen lung in cadrul segmentului deservit
Identifica oportunitati de business prin invatarea si intelegerea nevoilor de comunicatii si de afaceri ale clientilor
Dezvolta si mentine relatii win/win cu clientii existenti cu scopul de a creste valoarea portofoliului
Atinge targeturile individuale comunicate, adresand intreaga gama de produse/servicii in cadrul conturilor alocate
Genereaza lead-uri de vanzari altor segmente/arii/canale de vanzare din companie
Cunoasterea excelenta a produselor si serviciilor companiei, business management, propunerilor financiare, produselor , serviciilor si portifoliilor competitorilor directi.
Abilitatea de a dezvolta un caz solid contra competitorilor bazat pe produsele si serviciile, pe valoarea serviciilor,  politica de pret si diferentiatorii Vodafone
Actualizarea permanenta si respectand standardele de calitate a informatiilor din Sales Force Automation/Wallet Sizing/Forecast
Crearea unui plan de business pentru fiecare cont/client
Printr-o raportare acurata si continua ajuta in planificarea strategiei de produse, preturi si servicii

Conditii de munca:



Foloseste masina de companie
Calatoreste intensiv in zonele: Timis, Arad si Hunedoara
Rolul este locat in Timisoara
Activitate de birou

Diploma universitara
Permis de conducere categoria B

1-2 ani experienta in vanzari
Abilitati de PC: Word, Excel, Power Point, E-mail
Fluenta in vorbirea limbii engleze
Preferabil 1 an experienta in vanzari directe, B2B ( experienta IT&C si Telecom, reprezinta un avantaj)

body: Your role within our KingdomWe’re looking for an exceptionally skilled Technical Lead with strong Java skills to establish and lead development of an innovative new tools for our game teams in our QA Hub in Bucharest.The King QA Hub is the evolution of two years of designing and implementing a different way of thinking about QA and building the tools and expertise needed to support it. At King, QA means Quality Assistance, which is all about equipping teams with the knowledge they need to take ownership for the quality of their games. We do this by providing different testing services throughout the software development life cycle. We are focused on building the future of testing tools that improve productivity and quality. As a Development Team Lead at King, you’ll have a great opportunity to build the systems we need, as we don’t depend heavily on external frameworks. You’ll be involved in making the architectural decisions that will ensure that the quality of our systems is the best.We offer you the chance to work in an Agile environment where frequent, fast-paced releases mean you’ll see the impact of your work almost immediately. You will among other things…•	Help build a team of front and backend Developers•	Lead the team and ensure its effort is invested focusing on the areas that reap the most benefit for the company•	Responsible for defining and overseeing technical architecture and development best practices•	Design and implement server features required to support new game and platform functionality and releases.•	Deliver code (and supporting documentation) of the highest quality through good design, attention to detail and system testing on a timely basis.•	Support the technical and professional development of the DevelopersWorking in the QA Hub provides opportunities to learn different testing disciplines and working with cutting-edge technology on all mobile platforms. This all happens in a space designed specifically to support your own way of working.Skills to create thrillsYou have great passion for programming and a solid sense of quality and polish. As a developer you are also analytical and genuinely interested in understanding the whole tech stack. Other skills include:•	Experience in designing robust, highly scalable systems.•	Able to architect & design components, features and systems.•	Very experienced in Java, databases and web development in general.•	Familiar with HTML, CSS, Javascript, JSP, Bash.•	No stranger to web protocols, application servers and web servers.•	Striving to be a genius in your area of expertise.•	Used to TDD, UNIX environments, VCS•	A team player who likes to discuss solutions and ideas.•	Able to translate business needs to technical requirements and implementation.•	Motivated by challenges and new opportunities.•	Fluent in English.We’re knights of creativityWe believe that great games are developed by working in small, autonomous creative teams that control the whole process – from idea to amazing game. Our close connection with and instant feedback from the player community, enables us to deliver truly magical moments. We value your free time and your need to refuel, relax and find inspiration – by playing games with your colleagues, being at home with your family or going to the gym or out for a run. That's how we stay creative. That’s why we call ourselves developers of magic and knights of creativity.  Want to join our Kingdom?Please send us your CV by clicking the ‘Apply now’ button. All applications must be in English.  The brilliant experience we give our players comes from the diversity and experience of our people. A great saga needs all sorts of heroes. That’s why we hire all sorts of talent.

body: A software tester must have a deep understanding of computer programming.They must also possess a strong interest in technology and its advancement. In this role, specifically, the tester will not only test new features and functionality, but must also actively use every function and tool of the software solution in order to develop a deep understanding of the product and how it works. Constant use of the application will also allow for proactive identification of bugs, performance and reliability issues, as well as other potential failures. Detailed metrics are recorded and monitored to track the progress and outcomes of the testing process.Communication skills are important as the tester must be able to effectively communicate with other team members and the customer. In order to accomplish this they must be able to communicate using both technical and nontechnical terms depending on the audience they are addressing.Written communication and documentation skills are also essential. As a key member of the product development team in a start-up company, it is essential that the candidate be able to accurately document test procedures and results to allow for continuous process improvement and to institutionalize the knowledge base.As a Software Development Tester you will be responsible for all aspects of software testing. Working within the development team, you will:• Evaluate and test new or modified software development programs according to user requirements and established guidelines.• Participate in feature developments from concept to design and construction to drive quality into software application• Responsible to create effective and automated test cases• Design and develop tools for test management, execution and reporting to enhance the overall software testing process• Write, revise, and verify quality standards and test procedures for program design, product evaluation and quality assurance• Review logs and monitoring/performance metrics to detect error codes or interruption of program and corrects errors.• Identifies differences between established standards and user applications and suggests modifications to conform to standards.• Conduct compatibility tests with vendor-provided programs.• Test implementations/integrations with third party platforms.• Writes documentation to describe program evaluation, testing and correction.Job Requirements:• Three years of software development and/or testing experience is required;• Degree in Computer Science or related field is preferred;• Experience in testing PHP scripting and web-based development;• Experience in testing web-based software, cross-browser and cross-platform;• Experience in reviewing requirements and developing test cases based on those requirements;• Strong communication skills;• Attention to detail and problem-solving attitude;• The ability to work as a team player;Benefits:•    Healthcare for you through private medical subscription•    Attractive salary package according with experience an individual performance •    Fruit days•    Working from home days•    Performance bonuses

body: Job PurposePerform Finance review and Balance Sheet reviews as per the annual plan of Outstation Finance & Risk Management (OF&RM) by either desktop reviews or visiting the station in partnership with Regional Finance Manager Outstations (RFMO) and evaluate the sufficiency of the internal controls to cover financial risks at the station.Validate quality, accuracy and timeliness of financial accounting, reporting and efficient usage of accounting and operational systems by identifying areas of risk and recommending controls where necessary. Ensure stations are in compliance with Group policies and procedures as well as the procedures laid down in Finance & Accounting Procedures Manual for Overseas Stations (FAMOVS).  KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES Independently conduct finance review of stations to confirm transactions are recorded correctly in the financial system and reflect a true and fair view. Highlight deviations from the agreed finance procedures while performing the process review during the station visit.Perform the required analysis (using appropriate analysis and data mining techniques) to ensure that the finance review conducted is of high quality. Suggest and implement improvements to the review procedures so that they are performed effectively and efficiently.Ensure finance review observations are validated and discussed with the Finance staff/ Finance & Administration Manager (FAM) before the findings and observations are reported in the finance review draft.Provide a Finance review draft report in the agreed format capturing the findings in an appropriate manner. Maintain the Finance review documentation for retrieval when required as well as demonstrate a comprehensive coverage of the finance activity reviewed.Ensure that all issues identified by the finance review are captured in the relevant Issue Repository (AIMS).Support stations with follow-up of recommendations and other improvement actions and projects.Monitor and follow up with local management on all issues identified in the finance review and obtain appropriate evidence for/of closing of recommendations in a timely fashionProvide support to Manager Financein active corporate projects. Qualifications & Experience Finance Accounting: 3+ YearsDegree or Honours (12+3 or equivalent) : In Commerce, Finance or Accounting Qualified accountants (CPA, CIMA, CA) - preferred.Experience in a Finance or AuditKnowledge/skills: Sound Accounting knowledge Adequate ERP skills (Oracle / SAP or similar) to perform the role efficientlySalary and BenefitsWe offer an attractive tax-free salary, paid in Dirhams, the local currency of the UAE, besides generous travel benefits normally associated with an airline.About Emirates Tomorrow you could be living in dynamic Dubai and earning a tax-free salary with global benefits. Starting with two aircraft and a handful of enthusiastic people, we have grown at a phenomenal rate. We are now one of the fastest growing airlines in the world, flying to over 125 destinations across 6 continents. We are looking for people to join our global family of over 55,000 people from 160 nationalities across a diverse range of disciplines. If you are a high performer, seeking unparalleled career opportunities, join the Emirates team and help us create the future of travel To ApplyPlease submit your application before 24-Feb-16, 23:59 GMT + 4 hours

body:
Softing is a successful, independent provider of hardware and software for industrial automation and automotive electronics. SoftingRom has been founded early in 2005 as an R&D center of Softing AG Munich, with offices both in Cluj-Napoca and Miercurea-Ciuc. 
We’re having now a new open Scrum Master position in Cluj-Napoca. Softing Industrial Automation employs Agile and Scrum as key paradigms for successfully deliver customer satisfaction in project/product development.This is strongly emphasized in the strategic goal to become an Agile organization and reflected in its internally defined processes.
Scrum Master is an important role in these processes, therefore we believe it can be optimally performed by full-time dedicated professionals with constant care to encourage, facilitate, learn&share, protect, reflect and reward.
Main responsibilities
Strongly serving and supporting the Product Owner and Development Team
Providing all support to the team using a servant leadership style and leading by exampleGuiding and coaching the Scrum Team and organization on how to use/improve Agile/Scrum practices and valuesGuiding and coaching both the Scrum Team on how to get the most out of self-organizationFollowing the internally documented or approving Agile based software development processesRemoving impediments or guiding the team to remove impediments by finding the right pathsBuilding a trusted and safe environment where problems are raised and solved proactively without fear of blameHelping in getting the work done without coercion, assigning or dictating the work Facilitating discussion, decision making and conflict resolutionAssisting with internal and external communication, improving transparency and information flowSupporting and educating the Product Owner, especially with respect to refining and managing the product backlog.
Required skills/Experience
Scrum Master certification (ideal)
At least one year experience playing the Scrum Master role for a development teamGood skills and knowledge of servant leadership, facilitation, situational awareness, conflict resolution, continuous improvement, empowerment, increasing processes transparency 
Knowledge and/or experience with Agile techniques: UserStories, Continuous Integration, Continuous Testing, Burndown, Velocity, Retrospective formats etc.
Handling meetingsExcellent communication and mentoring skillsEnglish language (both reading and writing) 
Would be a plus 
Technical background in software developmentExperience with a variety of contexts: being in multiple scrum teams, different team sizes, different organizations and cultures, distributed teams etc.A tracked record of continued and recent education in Scrum, including training, self-study, conferences etc.Knowledge of other approaches discussed in the Agile space: XP, Kanban, Feature Driven Development etc.
 What you could benefit of
Attractive salary, medical services, fidelity bonus, lunch ticketsHighly qualified teamComprehensive technical trainings on our expertise areaPositive and informal working environmentChallenging projects for well-known customers in the industryThe opportunity to actively contribute at the design and success of our solutions 
If this sounds interesting for you, please send your CV (in English/Romanian language) at jobs_ro@softing.com and let's talk more about this role, about the projects and about our great team.
title: Scrum Master
locations: Buftea 1, Cluj-Napoca, Județul Cluj, România

body:
Căutăm oameni entuziaști și responsabili cărora le place să muncească. 
Oferim un mediu de muncă excelent într-o echipă cu adevărat dedicată și motivată în care poți să te formezi și să câștigi experiență profesională. 
Respectăm cu strictețe toate normele legale și tratăm cu respect fiecare angajat.

Responsabilități:
- întâmpinarea clienților
- vânzarea de produse de cofetărie
- preluare comenzi- operarea casei de marcat
- aranjarea produselor în vitrină
- curățenia și ordinea în magazin

Beneficii:
- contract de muncă cu normă întreagă
- program pe 2 ture, 5 zile pe săptămână
- mediu de lucru plăcut

Descrierea companiei

French Revolution s-a înființat în 2013 și este singura cofetărie din România dedicata producerii de ecleruri de cea mai înaltă calitate.
French Revolution are în prezent peste 20 de angajați care lucrează într-un laborator ultra modern și în 2 magazine situate în centrul Bucureștiului.
French Revolution înseamnă o revoluție în calitatea si rafinamentul produselor de cofetărie franțuzești în România. Tot ceea ce facem se supune următoarelor 5 valori:

1. Autenticitate si creativitate - suntem originali, surprinzători și folosim mereu ingrediente, rețete și metode de preparare autentic franțuzești;

2. Onestitate - respectam angajații și clienții în tot ceea ce facem;

3. Excelenta în produse și servicii - produse de o calitate excepțională și servicii care sa ofere clienților o experienta desăvârșita;

4. Siguranță alimentara - aplicam cele mai înalte standarde de igiena, calitate a ingredientelor, condiții de păstrare a materiei prime si de prezentare a produselor;

5. Pasiune - facem lucrurile cu dedicare pentru a oferi experiente gastronomice cat mai rafinate.

www.frenchrevolution.ro

body:
Société Générale European Business Services délivre de la valeur ajoutée pour leGroupe Société Générale au niveau des services de finance, comptabilité,ressources humaines et IT pour toutes les entités de l'Europe.
SAFE est encharge du management du risque opérationnel dans le cadre du groupe Société Générale, étant aussi en charge du cadre de la surveillance permanente.
SAFE c’est une Direction responsable du domaine anti-fraude et de tous les sujets relatifs à la sécurité informatique. Parmi ses missions on peut mentionner celle qui concerne la configuration et le management des accès aux outils informatiques utilisés dans le cadre de GBIS – la banque d’investissement du groupe SociétéGénérale.
 Votre rôle :
Le périmètre fonctionnel couvre le management des risques de la Sécurité Informatique.
Votre mission principale va consister en :
1)     Participation à la campagne de re-certification des accès informatiques et techniques des utilisateurs en :
-         Préparant la campagne et les vérifications préliminaires ;-         Gérant la campagne de suivi en maintenant la communication journalière avec les utilisateurs ;-         Investiguant les soucis remontés par les utilisateurs ;-         Suivant la mise en place des décisions en production (en s’assurant que les accès sans pertinence sont supprimés de l’environnement de production) ;-         Participant à la clôture de la campagne.
 2)     Participation à l’activité de reporting en :
-         Générant et en préparant des rapports dédiés sur les deux activités principales décrites ci-dessus (reporting hebdomadaire et mensuel) ;-         Préparant des rapports en collaboration avec l’équipe de Paris SAFE/ITS/IAM.
 Profile requis :
 Profile technique :
-Etudes supérieures : Université, ASE, Polytechnique ;-Profile technique et aisance dans la manipulation des données techniques ;-Français au niveau avancé (parlé et écrit) ;-Connaissances des notions de la sécurité informatique.-Connaissances des sujets IAM (Identity and Access Management) ;- Bonne maîtrise de Microsoft Office (Outlook/Excel/Access) ;-Notions de sensibilité et de vulnérabilité IT (Linux, Windows, DB) ;-Bonnes compétences de reporting avec Excel ;-Notions de VBA pour Excel (macros et reporting).
  Profile personnel :
  -Attitude proactive et réactive ;-Esprit d’équipe ;- Rigueur et capacité de maintenir la confidentialité des données manipulées ;- Bonne capacité relationnelle et de communication ;-Personne autonome ;- Bonne capacité d’analyse et de synthèse.
  Notre offre :
 -Conditions salariales motivantes ;-Contrat à durée indéterminée ;- Plan de carrière (professionnel et financier) ;-Formations spécifiques ;-Assurance médicale ;-Tickets restaurant ;-Environnement de travail professionnel et agréable ;-L’opportunité de rejoindre une équipe multiculturelle.

body: New project for insurance Industry! Software developers wanted – all levels of experience!For this new project we are creating a team of developers for the implementation of Guidewire Insurance Suite - a set of applications that support insurance operations: underwriting, policy administration, billing, and claims management.Based on your experience and motivation, you will have the chance to learn new technologies, programming languages, lead a team and obtain certifications.Guidewire software is built using a similar language to java, called ‘Gosu’, that is easy to learn, retains all the strengths of Java but has strictly fewer weaknesses.Why learn Gosu? Why is it used for Guidewire?- statically typed,- dynamically compilable, - metaprogramming capabilities,- fairly simple syntax - easy learning-curve What we need from you: - Willingness to learn a new programming language- Fluent English and German - IT-oriented education/University degree- Availability to travel in Europe (mainly Switzerland) occasionally- Software development experience- Knowledge in state-of-the-art programming platform (Java SE preferred. Alternatively .NET/C# or Objective-C)- UI-Design with Widgets (arbitrary framework)- XML - Software development processes (Agile preferred)- Version control systems (e.g. Git, SVN, CVS)- SQL and Relational databases (e.g. DB2, Oracle DB, SQLServer or MySQL)- IDEs (e.g. Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA or NetBeans)Other skills or competencies preferred: - Insurance expertise- Java Enterprise Edition JavaEE- Messaging and RPC (WebServices, message queues)- Transaction handling- HTML 5 & AJAX frameworksYour Role:Support Guidewire implementations (entire Guidewire Insurance Suite; including policy, claims and contact management as well as billing systems).Enhance the data model, dialogues, process flows, business rules and logic, database queries as well as interfaces to internal and external systems. About our team:Part Mentor, part architect, part developer, part subject matter expert in the insurance industry, our small team of consultants on each project help our customers adapt to change and embrace new ways of innovating their business operations. Titles are not as important to us as the quality of the people we work with and the opportunity to be productive. We strive to constantly improve our development process, and collaborate to create and maintain the greatest enterprise software suite in the Property and Casualty Insurance industry.What we are looking for in our new colleagues:• Curiosity based on genuine love of technology and solving tough technical problems• Accountability based on an earnest desire to do what is expected without prompting• Kindness and respect for your fellow teammates. We truly do want to build teams that like to work together so we do hire team players who are motivated to be courteous and productiveYou will be helping make our customer’s lives easier and their businesses more efficient as they adopt the Guidewire solution, as each customer has their own configuration and integration needs.Our customers are insurance companies, and insurance software is surprisingly complex, difficult to get right, and actually a lot of fun to work on. Demand for the Guidewire software is on the rise, and we are growing to meet the needs of the market.

body: Ericsson Overview: Ericsson is a world-leading provider of telecommunications equipment and services to mobile and fixed network operators. Over 1,000 networks in more than 180 countries use Ericsson equipment, and more than 40 percent of the world's mobile traffic passes through Ericsson networks. Using innovation to empower people, business and society, we are working towards the Networked Society, in which everything that can benefit from a connection will have one. At Ericsson, we apply our innovation to market-based solutions that empower people and society to help shape a more sustainable world. We are truly a global company, working across borders in 175 countries, offering a diverse, performance-driven culture and an innovative and engaging environment where employees enhance their potential every day. Our employees live our vision, core values and guiding principles. They share a passion to win and a high responsiveness to customer needs that in turn makes us a desirable partner to our clients. To ensure professional growth, Ericsson offers a stimulating work experience, continuous learning and growth opportunities that allow you to acquire the knowledge and skills necessary to reach your career goals. Job Summary - Strategic Sourcing Manager role: The Strategic Sourcing Manager will be responsible for developing and managing one or more of Ericsson’s regional suppliers and is responsible for ensuring that sourcing and management activities are performed efficiently and effectively and in accordance with contract and alignment with the future direction of that particular category/supplier at Ericsson.We are now seeking a talented and proactive individual who is looking for a new challenge. The successful candidate will have to be result oriented with strong analytical abilities and excellent communication skills.The main areas of responsibility are: • Manage all sourcing aspects of the assigned suppliers/agreements related to Indirect Sourcing• Develop operations and negotiation strategy together with IT stakeholders• Be final escalation point for assigned suppliers• Track internal behavior and drive policy compliance. Reports will be produced for all organizational hierarchies as well as for all Ericsson’s regions.• Address drivers of spending, align spend to business needs and reduce unnecessary spend.• Be the main driver, together with Business Services Sourcing, for designated categories at Ericsson & coordinate all processes & operational improvements.Requested Competence:• Business acumen• Proven ability to drive results in multi-cultural & large corporate environment• Creative, open minded with a strong focus on stakeholder’s requirements• Strong analytical skills• Excellent project management skills• Adequate knowledge of the concept of contract management, laws related to contracts / agreements and applicable legal obligations and arbitration process•A proactive & consultative approach• Experience from a large International corporation is preferable• Team player and networking skills• A thorough and methodical approach to work• Highly developed skills in knowledge sharing by actively contributing knowledge, experiences and skills to create a learning culture• Furthermore, you are business minded and a good communicator with a strong drive. That you work unhindered in English in speech and writing is an absolute requirement, since most of all communication is in EnglishMinimum Qualifications & Experience Requirements: • At least 3 years of relevant experience (contract negotiations)• A first academic degree or equivalent qualification
title: Strategic Sourcing Manager - System SW

body:
Visma

Visma makes businesses more efficient, through offerings of software, outsourcing services, commerce solutions, retail-IT solutions and IT-related projects and consulting. Visma simplifies and digitalizes core business processes within the private and public sector. 340,000 customers in Northern Europe utilize Visma’s products and services and an additional 330,000 use Visma as a hosting partner. The group has 7000 employees and its net revenue amounted to NOK 7 000 million in 2015.

Visma is known for developing leading software and high-quality services for satisfied customers in combination with financial strength and solid growth. The objective is to make the customers more efficient and competitive through freedom of choice between software solutions and outsourcing services.  

.net Software Developer

We have a challenging opportunity for an ambitious and motivated Software Developer to join our Visma User Directory team. We are building an User Directory and Single Sign-On (SSO) solution that is an important component in Visma’s drive for integrated products & services toward hybrid strategy. You will work in R&D office from Sibiu, together with colleagues in Norway and Romania - and a lot of colleagues from the other teams spread in locations from nordic countries.

As a Software Developer you will be working with design, implementation and maintenance of new and existing features of our VUD asset. In your work you will need to focus on architecture, usability, performance, stability, security, etc.


Work tasks and responsibilities:

•	Design, implementation and testing of solutions

•	Participate in architecture, design and code reviews

•	Write unit and integration tests

•	Maintain good code quality

•	Keeping up-to-date on new technologies, methods and tools

•	Participate in our Scrum processes and other team activities


We believe that you have:

•	Bachelor or Master degree in Computer Science

•	Experience in C# and Microsoft technology stack

•	Solid Object Oriented Programming knowledge, design patterns

•	Knowledge of and experience with SQL databases - modelling and development

•	Hands-on experience with unit testing & Test Driven Development, knowledge about other types of tests and tools is a plus

•	Understanding of security, certificates and identity providers is a plus

•	Interest in software engineering methods, design patterns and modelling

•	Good spoken and written English


Personal skills:

•	Well-structured and quality focused attitude

•	Team spirit and good communication skills

•	Analytical mind-set and well organized with attention to details

•	Self-motivated and self-driven

•	User experience and customer satisfaction oriented


We will offer you:

•	An exciting position in an international working environment (R&D community of 600+ employees)

•	You will be part of a dynamic and highly skilled team

•	We offer you a creative working environment and the latest technologies and tools

•	Good opportunities for career development in a large international company

•	Competitive terms and conditions

•	International travels for trainings and workshops

•	Access to company apartments in Spain and France


Position: full time
Location: Sibiu, Romania

body:
Who we are:

youngculture is part of NSM Engineering, a Swiss software engineering group of companies, which provides near-shore services for aviation, banking, telecommunications, eCommerce, and many other sectors. Its headquarters are in Zurich and it has its own near-shore development centers in Serbia (Belgrade, Nis) and Romania (Iasi).

With the approach to deliver high quality software solutions for our international customers we are looking for motivated new colleagues, to join our growing Iasi software engineering team in the following position:

JAVA DEVELOPER - eCommerce (Regular & Senior)

You will be part of our agile team engaged in the development of a top enterprise e-commerce platform. You will contribute with your expertise in creating high-quality code on customizations and solutions with use of Java Enterprise, Spring framework and Web Services.

Who we are looking for:

The ideal candidate hired into this position should have the following key skills /experience:
•	Bachelor or higher degree in computer science (or equivalent)
•	2-5+ years of professional experience in software development using Java. Previous work in e-commerce projects, agile methodologies and distributed development teams would be considered as assets
•	Very good understanding of OOP principles, design patterns and practices
•	Experience using Spring framework (Core, MVC, Integration, Security), REST Web Services, and ORM technologies (JPA/Hibernate) 
•	Experience in web development (JSP, JavaScript/JQuery, Ajax, HTML5, CSS)
•	Ability to interpret and communicate information to the client
•	Open and friendly personality, as well as drive, initiative, problem-solving mindset,  excellent interpersonal and team-working skills
•	Good verbal and written communication skills in English
•	Knowledge of German will be considered as an asset
•	Availability for abroad business trips.

What we offer:
•	Challenging projects in a highly professional, but also relaxed, collaborative and supportive environment
•	Working in small and excellent skilled teams
•	Opportunity for long term professional growth within our development center
•	Salaries and conditions which correspond to the high demands
•	Modern office space in the city center
•	Travel opportunities to EU countries.

Working location:
Iasi, Romania

Please send your resume to jobs.romania@youngculture.com. 
While we appreciate everyone’s interest in youngculture’s openings, notice that only selected candidates will be contacted.
Your application will be treated strictly confidential.

body: About our client:Our client is an important Dental Laboratory located 30km from Barcelona.Job desciption:- Design, fabricate or repair dental devices including full or partial dentures, orthodontic appliances, crowns, bridges, inlays, onlays, clasps and bands, and implants- Prepare plaster models and moulds from dental impressions- Prepare wax bite-blocks and impression trays- Cast porcelain, plastic, CAD-CAM for bridges and denture bases- Pack plastic material in moulds to form full or partial dentures- Mould wax over denture set-up to form full contours of artificial gums- Make orthodontic bands from porcelain, plastic, CAD-CAM- Finish metal framework of dentures and polish and buff dentures to obtain natural finish- May consult with dentists or other specialists on problematic dental cases- May train and supervise other dental technicians and dental laboratory assistants in fabricating dentures and other dental devices- IMPORTANT: Productivity around 15 peaces per personThe sucsessful applicant:- Dental Technician Degree- Productivity around 15 peaces per person- Realiable Experience (you will have a practical exam)What's on offer:- Permanent job offer- Direct contract with the laboratory- We offer a Working Visa- Fix annual salary between 20.000€ and 30.000€ (depending on experience)- Great work environment- Career path and internal promotions
title: Dental Technicians (porcelain,  plastic,  CAD-CAM)
locations: Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain

body: Order Fulfilment Analyst (Rotational Day/Night Shift Pattern)-LOG001595To assist in transferring the warehouse stock in a timely manner, in order to fulfil customer and shipment orders and to help identify any potential stock issues.WHAT WILL I BE DOING?Act decisively and engage effectively with all key stakeholdersCo-ordinate with Transport and Supply Planners to manage the stock into the warehouse (i.e. missing/late replenishment) Co-ordinate with shuttle providers to ensure “backloads” are moved in a timely manner Work with Customer Services to manage any stock issues/shortages etc.Liaise with stock control/integrity on stock discrepanciesConduct inventory allocation to ensure inventory is assigned to correct orders.Manage the BOP processEnsure stock is deployed correctly between local warehouses and is available and ready to ship for all customer ordersCreate deliveries for Sales orders and STOsMonitor Best Before End dates, aged stock profiles and Promotion allocationsMonitor and chase Quality release as required to fulfill ordersWHAT DO I NEED TO DEMONSTRATE? Required Education and Experience:Bachelor Degree or equivalent, preferably in Management, Business, Supply Chain, Accounting or related fieldLanguage skills- English (Required); Second Language (Preferred)Strong analytical and problem solving skills and a high level of proficiency in MS ExcelUnderstanding of inventory policies and inventory management Proficiency with ERP systems (e.g. SAP) and Microsoft OfficePreferred Criteria:Experience of working for a multinational organization and working with colleagues internationallyFMCG industry work experienceCompetencies:Acts Decisively and engages effectively with key stakeholders in a proactive mannerWHAT ELSE DO I NEED TO KNOW? Please note, the working pattern for this role will be shifts as the role needs to be covered 24/7.Please note that we will only accept applications that are made to us via our Careers site.If you experience any difficulty when applying please contact hrsharedservice@kellogg.com. Please note that the closing date may be subject to change. We will interview suitable candidates as they apply, so please don’t hesitate to take this opportunity to submit your application as soon as possible. If you would like to be immediately notified of new Kellogg's opportunities, please go to ‘Create or access my profile’ and complete the information required in the ‘Job Alerts’ section. You will then receive email alerts as soon as new jobs are advertised. The Kellogg Company is an Equal Opportunity Employer who strives to provide an inclusive work environment that involves everyone and embraces the diverse talent of its people.
