body: 109115 Engine & Transmission Component BuyerDescriptionCompany General InformationTOYOTA is one of the world’s largest automobile manufacturers and a leading global corporation.  Founded in 1937. Toyota now sells vehicles in 170 countries and employs over 300.000 people.Based in Brussels, Belgium, and staffed by 2.700 people and more than 60 nationalities, Toyota Motor Europe (TME) handles the wholesale marketing of Toyota and Lexus vehicles, parts & accessories, and manages Toyota’s European R&D, manufacturing and engineering operations.Team / Division DescriptionThe Purchasing team at Toyota Motor Europe is located in the heart of Europe. Our department plays a key strategic role in the development of our future products. As a Buyer you will be able to develop and manage all aspects of the commercial relationship between Toyota and its suppliers, located all over Europe. Moreover, this position will allow you to have an insight in the most recent technical innovations and will enable you to get a deep understanding of how a leading multinational operates and interacts with numerous internal and external parties.Your Responsibilities• You buy engine & transmission components for current and future models/vehicles•  You negotiate with our suppliers to achieve the best cost reduction•  You handle all commercial issues related to responsible suppliers•  You make appropriate sourcing and supplier selection recommendation and you check the market for new suppliersYour Profile• University degree (business or engineering)• A minimum of 2 years of experience as a buyer in a manufacturing / engineering department• Team player with good communication skills, flexible mind and challenge spirit• Good practical problem solving skills• Good negotiation and communication skills• Fluency in English is a must, additional European language skills are an asset You have a Toyota DNA, this means you:• wish to develop and you are ready to persevere in order to reach challenging targets • seek facts before making recommendations or decisions• have strong planning and organization skills• enjoy working in a team, respecting others• have a creative mind and passion for cars• have excellent communication skills
title: Engine & Transmission Component Buyer
locations: Bruxelles, Regiunea Capitalei Bruxelles, Belgia

body:
Veeam Software helps organizations safeguard their investment in VMware virtual infrastructure by providing innovative systems management software designed to reduce costs, increase productivity and mitigate risk. Veeam is rapidly expanding its presence around the world. The company's U.S. headquarters is in Columbus, Ohio and European headquarters in London, UK and APAC headquarters based in Sydney Australia.
Veeam Software is all about the people. The best people drive the best technologies to help IT organizations all over the world. Do you have a passion for new, cutting-edge technologies? We are always looking for talented, creative and motivated people to join our team. Take a look at the available positions below and apply today.

The Inside Sales Representative is responsible for winning deals for Veeam together with our Channel Partners on the territory of Hungary.  

This position will be based in Bucharest, Romania.

Responsibilities: 

- Receiving and responding to inbound sales leads and converting them to new business.
- Maximizing coverage within the target region and penetrate organizations with Veeam products
- Coordinating sales activities with partners/consultants/distributors and resellers to identify and close new business
- Initiating telephone and email contact with potential prospects from developed web and lead generation lists; cold calling as needed
- Developing a solid working knowledge of Veeam Software products and the benefits they provide to potential customers
- Providing support to qualified prospects and customers including follow up, product information, quotations and closures
- Providing forecasting and account opportunity as needed
- Updating and maintaining the Veeam CRM system 

Qualifications :

- 2-4 years of experience in B2B sales
- Fluency in Hungarian
- Fluent English
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills
- Ability to work independently with limited direction in a fast-paced environment; must be a high energy motivated self-starter
- Higher education 


Please visit our career portal for new and exciting roles at Veeam!
http://careers.veeam.com/
http://careers.veeam.com/about/core-values
title: Inside Sales Representative with Hungarian
locations: Afi park 1, București, Municipiul București, România

body:
Société Générale European Business Services is looking for high standard professionals ready to commit on a longterm basis, offering at the same time a wide variety of features such asexpertise, challenging development opportunities in an international environmentand the joy of a strong spirit.
Responsibilities:•	Coordoneaza echipele de proiect si ofera suport si consultanta pentru a duce la bun sfarsit obiectivele proiectelor in termenele agreate•	Promoveaza si implementeaza metodologia Managementul Proiectelor in cadrul SG EBS si aplicatiile informatice asociate acesteia.•	Planifică în mod detaliat implementarea fiecarui proiect, controlează si monitorizeaza fiecare proiect;•	Managerul de Proiect va valida final Planul de Proiect si alocarea nominala a resurselor din toate compartimentele organizationale implicate in proiect.•	Conduce Echipa de Proiect pentru a obtine descrierea obiectivelor si a nevoilor beneficiarului proiectului si a partilor afectate de Proiect (echipa de proiect) în scopul elaborarii documentului final de Specificatii de Business (”Business & User Requirements). •	Pe baza Specificatiilor de business (Business & User Requirements) si a feedback-ului obtinut din partea Echipei de Proiect, Managerul de Proiect elaboreaza Specificatiile Functionale.•	Managerul de Proiect va valida final Specificatiile Functionale in vederea asigurarii corelarii acestui document cu Specificatiile de business (Business & User Requirements). •	Managerul de Proiect va valida final Specificatiile Tehnice (”Technical Requirements”) inainte de demararea dezvoltarilor IT in vederea asigurarii corelarii acestui document cu Specificatiile de business (”Business & User Requirements”) si Specificatiile functionale (”Functional Requirements”). •	Coordoneaza si/ sau efectueaza testele functionale pentru noile dezvoltari informatice in colaborare cu utilizatorii respectivi•	Realizeaza impreuna cu compartimentele organizationale implicate ghidurile de utilizare aferente noilor dezvoltari informatice si ofera suport in vederea intelegerii si promovarii noilor functionalitati catre beneficiarii finali.•	Da acordul din punct de vedere functional, pentru punerea in productie a aplicatiilor informatice pentru proiectele gestionate 
Requirements:• 5 - 7 ani experienta in Project Management •	Studii financiar-bancare – Academia de Studii Economice •	Cunostinte de IT: liceu cu profil informatic sau facultatea de Cibernetica - ASE•	Buna intelegere a metodologiei proiectelor de IT – intelegerea business-ului si a specificatiilor functionale, testare, change management, training pentru utilizatori•	Engleza nivel avansat si Franceza nivel mediu•	Excelente abilitati de comunicare si persuasiune •	Persoana analitica, autonoma, orientata spre rezultate•	Expunere la mediu si cultura organizationala internationala •	1 - 2 luni training in Paris; disponibilitate de a calatori ori de cate ori este nevoie la Paris si in alte locatii din Europa

Please note that only the selected candidates will be contacted for an interview and all the CVs will be kept in our database for future suitable professional opportunities.

Société Générale European BusinessServices is a player in the shared service center market and delivers highadded value services in various fields of activity for worldwide entities ofthe Group (finance/ accounting, procurement, human resources and IT). The company is currently serving over 20countries mostly across Europe for all major business lines of the Société Générale Group.
The Finance Shared Service Center of SociétéGénérale European Business Services, launched in 2011, now counts more than 250staff delivering services for more than 300 client entities.
The team’s activity consists indelivering two important kinds of processes: accounting – namely Groupreporting in IFRS, statutory and regulatory reporting on top of the permanentsupervision activities and related set of control; and Account Payable and Travel& Expenses, with teams specialize in optimizing all procure to pay activities.
title: Senior Project Manager
locations: Strada preciziei, București, Municipiul București, România

body:
Honeywell International is a $37 billion diversified technology and manufacturing global leader, with more than 120,000 employees in 100 countries around the world and has a demonstrated heritage of both innovation and achievement. 

Honeywell Transportation Systems (TS), part of Honeywell’s Aero strategic business unit, is a leading provider of world-class technologies and solutions to automakers, their suppliers, and consumers. Transportation Systems’ fuel-saving and emission-reducing Turbocharger technologies enhance the efficiency and performance of passenger and commercial vehicles worldwide. Transportation Systems is part of Honeywell Aerospace, one of the Corporation’s three reported segments.

Honeywell TS is looking for a Commodity Buyer to join the Romanian office in Bucharest!

Job description:
•	Meet Annual Operating Plan / 5 years strategic planning plan’s performance objectives on his scope, while leveraging Honeywell Turbo Technologies’ global spend
•	Support sub-commodity strategy activities on his assigned scope under the supervision of the Commodity Manager
•	Build Supplier Panel for the Worldwide / Regions operational requirements (project & production)
•	Ensure commercial & industrial market expertise of the Sub-Commodity. 
•	Keep Honeywell Turbo Technologies informed of all relevant technological & market trends and economical changes
•	Lead new supplier integration process in the Panel: perform supplier prospection, supplier assessments (CSA), supplier development
•	Ensure platforms, customer teams current and future needs are identified and answered by his sub commodity strategy
•	Meet Annual Operating Plan’s objectives on his Sub-Commodity
•	Build and consolidates productivity action plans for its sub-commodity (Negotiation etc)
•	Define corrective action plans with Operations Buyers to ensure Annual Operating Plan’s objectives are met
•	Conduct negotiations with assigned suppliers
•	Generate & consolidate ideas for global projects, collect ideas from suppliers. 
•	Build business cases when Value Engineering Idea Leader is not in the Sourcing Operations
•	Support new product launches in coordination with New Product Introduction team
•	Manage advance purchase for his commodity
•	Manage performance for assigned suppliers: review monthly metrics, lead supplier performance reviews and foster improvement of suppliers’ performance. 
•	Lead supplier development projects with the support of Supplier Quality & Development
•	Support escalation of operational issues with impacted Buyer


Qualifications required: 
 •	University degree
•	Experience in purchasing - minimum 2 years
•	Need to have a level of contract negotiation expertise
•	Very good negotiation skills
•	Ability to communicate in English
•	Knowledge of ERP system.
•	Expertise in using MS office mainly excel and power point
•	Global mind-set and experience in working with the people from cross culture
•	Good communication and presentation skills are must for this position
•	Ability to communicate concisely
title: Commodity Buyer (determined period 1 year )

body:
Responsabilitati

•	Isi va insusi cunostinte aprofundate despre produsele dezvoltate in cadrul diviziei atat din punct de vedere tehnic cat si din punct de vedere business
•	Concepe si realizeaza sisteme informatice pentru a sustine demonstratii si « Proof of Concept » cu produsele realizate in cadrul departamentului. Identifica impreuna cu colegii cu rolul de Product Sales cazurile de utilizare semnificative in realizarea demonstratiilor si le transpune din punct de vedere tehnic pe sistemele informatice create in acest sens
•	Participa activ la instruirea partenerilor care trebuie sa-si insuseasca cunostinte despre produsele dezvoltate in cadrul diviziei
•	Participa la strategia de vanzare, dezvoltare si constructie a produselor pe care le are in portofoliu
•	Identifica functionalitati noi ale produselor pe care le propune spre dezvoltare prin intermediul Product Owner-ului.
•	Analiza comparativa a specificatiilor produselor competitive
•	Realizeaza documentatie specifica pentru prezentarea de produse, solutii bazate pe produse, instruire utilizatori si administratori produse, cerinte de tip RFP pentru produsele pe care le are in portofoliu
•	Evalueaza si raspunde la RFI/RFP-uri  pentru solutii care includ produsele  dezvoltate in cadrul diviziei 
•	Ofera input privind lista de licente necesare si estimarea de efort necesara implementarilor de solutii bazate pe produsele pe care le are in portofoiliu
•	Poate participa la sedinte de analiza pentru identificarea nevoilor clientilor  si a  cerintelor de detaliu pentru  solutiile pe care trebuie sa le propuna clientilor
•	Participa la conceperea arhitecturii solutiei si identifica solutiile tehnice optime pentru a raspunde nevoilor clientilor
•	Participa la proiecteaza sisteme informatice ce integreaza multiple produse dezvoltate in cadrul departamentului precum si tehnologii realízate de terti 

Cerinte
•	Studii universitare, de preferat in domeniul tehnologiei informatiei
•	Gandire analitica si abordare pragmatica
•	Abilitati foarte bune de prezentare si pregatire demonstratii tehnice si de business
•	Experienta profesionala de 2 ani (minim 0 ani: nivel Junior, peste 4 ani: nivel potential Senior) in vanzarea de solutii informatice complexe
•	Cunostinte despre tehnologiile utilizate in produsele dezvoltate in cadrul diviziei (Web, Client-Server, Mobile)
•	Cunostinte legate de ciclul de dezvoltare software (Waterfall, SCRUM)
•	Abilitate avansata de realizare si sinteza a documentatiei tehnice
•	Cunoasterea limbii engleze la un nivel foarte bun vorbit si scris
•	Motivat si interesat sa lucreze cu tehnologii noi
•	Responsabil, flexibil, atitudine pozitiva, se adapteaza usor in conditii noi de lucru
•	Lucreaza bine in echipa si cu bune abilitati de comunicare

body: QS unisolution is a young, international company with offices in Stuttgart,London and Bucharest. We provide innovative IT solutions in the field of highereducation which are already being used by over 300 institutions worldwide. We support providers of education in optimising their organisation and work processes. body:
About DB Global Technology: 
DB Global Technology (DBGT) is the newly established European development center in Bucharest, Romania. As a subsidiary of Deutsche Bank AG, DBGT is a dedicated application development and software engineering center for leading-edge technology solutions that power the future of global capital markets. DBGT partners with the Deutsche Bank Group Technology and Operations division to access superior technology skills and promote innovation in the development of software applications and IT solutions.Deutsche Bank is looking for an experienced, motivated and ambitious Architecture Specialist to develop and implement architecture guidelines in Deutsche Bank IT projects. The Architecture Specialist will be expected to work closely with the Treasury business as well as data, functional and solution architects.
Position Description Summary:
The Architecture Specialist supports and performs analysis for day to day tasks of the Group, Data, Business, Solution or Technical Architects in specific projects.To support Data Architects, the IT Architecture Specialist mainly performs analysis on planned data flows into and from systems. They also pay attention to the appropriate data stores and access approaches for transactional, reporting and analytical environments. Specifically, the role includes the documentation of data issues arising in a project’s data architecture.To support Solution Architects, the IT Architecture Specialist provides support in defining solution architectures and high-level software designs, by creating architectural models and the documentation required by the SDLC. Additionally, the IT Architecture Specialist provides support in reviewing the architecture and design of solutions and analyses their conformity to architecture guidelines.In all their activities, the IT Architecture Specialist is closely guided by more senior IT Architects. The IT Architecture Specialist will have intimate knowledge of the architecture principles and apply them in all their tasks.
Key Responsibilities / Tasks:
• Supports in developing data architectures for a business domain / area or project which align with the overall bank-wide data architecture.• Researches and profiles data sources in data categories of expertise.• Assists the business in defining data requirements.• Has a specialist role in one or more data environments like data warehousing, real-time data access, data integration, or messaging.• Helps to create templates for data deliverables to enhance the productivity of all Data Architects.• Supports the development of project related data deliverables.• Plays an active role in data related Communities of Interest and promotes proper data management techniques within the Bank.• Prepares analysis for the design of the optimum architectures of IT solutions.• Ensures that architectures of solutions conform to the defined principles, blueprints, standards, patterns, etc., for solution architecture as well as for enterprise architecture.• Carries out reviews of software designs and documentation.• Advises the assigned technology initiatives in:• Undertaking peer reviews of, and reviewing solution architectures and designs, taking into consideration specific business and technical constraints, requirements and dependencies.• Preparing high level design documentation and detailed-level design documentation produced by project teams for review and validation.• Measuring the quality of the solution from an architectural perspective and ensuring the conformance of delivered solutions to predefined quality metrics.• Analyses level of conformance of solutions to defined solution architecture and Enterprise Architecture principles, blueprints, standards, patterns, etc.• Analyses level of conformance to defined SDLC processes and reuse of shared enterprise assets where possible.• Actively supports achievement of Bank’s/Division’s strategy, plans and values, and ensures they maintain a clear understanding and ongoing alignment of activities with the organisation’s priorities.• Demonstrates personal support to the achievement and maintenance of a high performance culture in which people management and development is a key priority. Demonstrates personal commitment to supporting colleagues within the team.Exposure• Knowledge of IT delivery and architecture including knowledge of Data Modelling and/or DBA, first experience in application design and programming.• Relevant Financial Services experience.• Experience in data and business analysis and design with a cohesive vision of key business data challenges.• Ability to work in a fast paced environment with competing and alternating priorities with a constant focus on delivery.• Ability to balance business demands and IT fulfilment in terms of standardisation, reducing risk and increasing IT flexibility.• Ability to relate and adapt data-related vision and strategy to the external environment that affects the organization in terms of economic climate, customer market demand, regulation and other legalities, geography, political, culture, labour, technology.
Experience:• Knowledge of IT delivery and architecture including knowledge of Data Modelling and/or DBA, first experience in application design and programming.• Experience in data and business analysis and design with a cohesive vision of key business data challenges.• Ability to work in a fast paced environment with competing and alternating priorities with a constant focus on delivery.• Ability to balance business demands and IT fulfillment in terms of standardisation, reducing risk and increasing IT flexibility.• Ability to relate and adapt data-related vision and strategy to the external environment that affects the organization in terms of economic climate, customer market demand, regulation and other legalities, geography, political, culture, labour, technology.• Well-developed requirements analysis skills, including good communication abilities (both speaking and listening) and stakeholder management (all levels up to Managing Director).• Experience in IT delivery or architecture including experience as an Application Developer• Strong object oriented design skills• Experience working in an Agile based team – ideally Scrum• Desirable Technology Skills: Business Rules Engines in general (IBM ODM in particular), Scala / Akka / Reactor Pattern / Camel,  Oracle Exadata• A demonstrable track record of successful delivery• Candidates with previous experience working in a bank desired, but not mandatory.
The ideal candidate:
• Experienced, ambitious and motivated to work in a Treasury function• Structured in your approach with a mind-set built on simplicity• An able communicator, both written and verbal• Comfortable engaging with senior stakeholders to MD level.• A capable leader, with strong influencing skills• Comfortable with a high pressure environment with tight deadlines driven by our regulators.

body:
Alison Hayes is one of the leading companies designing and manufacturing clothes for retailers in the UK and elsewhere. 

Job overview
 To manage Romanian Subcontractors and to support the Production Operational Manager and Chief Operational Officer on any production issues on the International Production Base.

Major responsibilities

To ensure that production and customer service targets are met through planning, co-ordinating and directing manufacturing resources and continually improving manufacturing processes.
Responsible for the management and communication of production schedules.
To review that production is on schedule and the finish is acceptable.
To liaise with the DC, factories and QCs regarding the quality issues on delivered items and work together to resolve these.
To establish priorities to Logistic/ warehouse departments on supplying raw materials or loading finished garments to/ from subcontractors according to the cutting date and delivery dates
To update on real time basis FR system.
To travel regularly basis and as needed to AH Subcontractors 
Replaces the Production Operational Manager during his absence.


Competencies for success (skills)

Functional skills:
Experience with overseas manufacturing.
Excellent IT skills are essential for this role

General skills:
Exhibit strong organisational and presentation skills.
Demonstrate excellent time management. 
Be highly organised.
Should be a team-player with excellent communication skills.
Ability to prioritise work in a deadline-orientated environment. 
Important organisational relationships
Production managers should demonstrate their leadership skills
They should liase with senior management regularly, including the Directors of the 
 Company.
 The post manages the production team (merchandisers, controllers, trimmings    and      fabric teams) and its day-to-day running.
Knowledge of factory production planning
English (written and spoken)
Daily information exchange with the  AH DC departments and UK office departments (sales/warehouse/ logistics department/ QC department)



The headquarters of Alison Hayes (Romania) S.R.L is in Urziceni, Ialomita County

body:
Job Description: 

The position is located in Bucharest, Romania.
We are looking for a technical person who will:

• Take part in regression automation test of wireless backhaul HW & SW systems.
• Define and write automatic test for new systems and features.
• Build test setups 
• Record, investigate and analyze defects.

By joining our team, you will enrich your experience and become a technical professional in the field of testing high-end telecommunication technology.

Job requirements:

The ideal candidate has the following:

Must
•	3-4 years of relevant experience in writing and performing automatic regression tests
•	B.Sc in Electrical Engineering / Computer Engineering 
•	Experience in Networking
•	Good English language skills in speaking and in writing 
•	Knowledge in Ethernet  L2/L3 switching 

Advantage
•	Experience in operating Ethernet and TDM Test Equipment (IXIA/Agilent-N2X/STC, OmniBER/etc) 
•	Experience in microwave radio, modulation, error-proof data transmission
•	Experience in TDM (E1/T1) and SDH (STM-1/OC-3) technology 

We are looking for candidates capable of self-learning and working in a dynamic environment, with excellent communication skills and team player, capable of grasping an overall view of a complex embedded system.
title: Regression Testing Engineer

body: Ericsson Overview Ericsson is a world-leading provider of telecommunications equipment & services to mobile & fixed network operators. Over 1,000 networks in more than 180 countries use Ericsson equipment, & more than 40 percent of the world's mobile traffic passes through Ericsson networks. Using innovation to empower people, business & society, we are working towards the Networked Society, in which everything that can benefit from a connection will have one. At Ericsson, we apply our innovation to market-based solutions that empower people & society to help shape a more sustainable world. We are truly a global company, working across borders in 175 countries, offering a diverse, performance-driven culture & an innovative & engaging environment where employees enhance their potential every day. Our employees live our vision, core values & guiding principles. They share a passion to win & a high responsiveness to customer needs that in turn makes us a desirable partner to our clients. To ensure professional growth, Ericsson offers a stimulating work experience, continuous learning & growth opportunities that allow you to acquire the knowledge & skills necessary to reach your career goals. Job SummaryMarket intelligence is a combination of research and consultancy, helping businesses to make decisions and set priorities. The Market Intelligence Analyst will analyze, interpret and synthesize learnings from all research sources, drawing conclusions that are actionable, impactful, and accessible for customers and/or stakeholders.  Successful candidates will be responsible for collecting, analyzing and summarizing data from various sources: internet research, economic databases, market reports from diverse research companies, customer and competitor research, industry events etc. to meet time-sensitive delivery goals. The position will involve doing detailed competitive intelligence analysis.Responsibilities & TasksContinuously monitor and analyze key industry and market trends as well as the wider external environment Raise awareness of trends and their potential impact on our companies business, and provide recommendationsGather information about competitors / and or suppliersGather information about industries and provide industry analysesPerform financial analysesServe as the liaison to the customers and work with them to develop and refine research objectivesCollaborate with internal teams to ensure customer’s objective are met Position QualificationsCore Competences: Financial evaluation skills (background: financial newspapers, brokerage companies) - Good level of knowledge & understanding of financials ratios Strong written and oral communication skills are essential, as presenting findings and supporting conclusions is an important part of the job Advanced Excel and PowerPoint skills Knowledge of strategic analysis frameworks (Porter’s Five Forces, Kraljic, SWOT)  Strong command of macroeconomic and specific industry indicators  Behavioral CompetencesAccuracy and attention to detail  Ability to work effectively in teams as well as independently, within tight deadlines  Be able to interact with the customer (e-mails, phone calls) independently and use his/her skills to guide newcomers  Be able to handle a request end-to-end (from receiving the request to performing the pre-analysis and then independently) Propensity to creative and innovative thinkingMinimum Qualifications & Experience Requirements:At least 1 year of relevant experience A first academic degree or equivalent qualification
title: Market Intelligence Analyst
locations: West Gate Park, București, Municipiul București, România

body:
Job Summary
The AP Travel and Expense Analyst is responsible for performing accounting and administrative tasks related to efficient and timely processing of all Travel and Expense reports. In connection with this role, the analyst will also process credit card applications, system maintenance, and customer support of the T&E Credit Card program.  This position resolves business critical issues, provides internal and external customer support, implements process improvement initiatives, and proactively manages day to day issues related to employee reimbursements.
Responsibilities: 
Review all expense reports for accuracy and completeness through the SAP ERP system
Perform random audit of expense reports  in accordance with Cameron policies and procedures
Pull and copy expense reports for all company internal/external audits on an as needed basis
Process all application requests and issue credit cards for T&E card program in accordance with Cameron policies and procedures
Cancel cards when directed to by AP Accountant in accordance with company policy
Assist customers with invoice and monthly statement requests, or fraud/chargeback inquiries
Respond to Helpdesk inquiries regarding all T&E policies and processes , and educate internal users on the use of the online training and information as needed
Responsible for monitoring all exception reports and reporting exceptions to AP management team in a timely manner
Maintain accurate and current documentation and files

REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS
1-2+ years of finance and accounting experience in a multinational company/shared service center with emphasis on processing travel and expense reports
1+ years of SAP or other ERP system application
Familiar with accounting standard concepts, practices, and procedures
Proficient working with Microsoft Office suite, including Word, Excel, and Outlook.
Ability to handle high-volume of data in a face paced environment
Adaptable to learning new software applications
Strong written, oral communication and interpersonal skills
Language requirements: Fluent in English (comprehension, written and speech).  Other languages a plus.
A disciplined self-starter with an eye for detail and accuracy
Strong attention to detail and ability to multi-task, work independently, and prioritize in a fast-paced, high volume work environment
Organizational and time management skills
Professional and has a service-oriented approach
title: Accounts Payable Travel & Expense Analyst
locations: Vasile Milea Blvd 4E Sector 6, București, Municipiul București, România

body: Ready to make $30,000 USD while working for a fortune 500 company from the comfort of your home? Eager to join a network of the most talented remote workers in the world? If so, this role is for you. Work for Crossover, and you’ll earn the most competitive wages on the market, collaborate with the most skilled teams in your field, and work for the most elite companies in the world. Sound too good to be true? Take a closer look... What to Expect as an iOS Developer at CrossoverJoin Crossover and you’ll be part of a team responsible for designing, coding, testing, debugging and maintaining various digital media applications. We strive to keep current on the latest trends in mobile technologies, so you’ll be expected to effectively lead team members and act as a technical reference. We’ll want you to clearly explain various technologies and solutions to both technical and nontechnical stakeholders. During any events and games, you will provide phenomenal support for live products. You will develop and support front-end, online mobile product initiatives. You will be responsible for creating and iterating excellent software applications with top quality user experience. On a bigger scale, you will work together with other developers, engineers, and production groups to design and implement new applications, systems, and tools that are unparalleled in the market.Qualifications for this OpportunityIf you want to work with the best, you have to be the best. A successful iOS Developer at Crossover will demonstrate the following qualifications:- 3+ years of experience building high traffic and large scale iOS apps- Committed to producing code that follows the best practice’s of the industry- Previous experience with other mobile platforms (not required but desired)- Proficiency in the following skills and technologies is mandatory:- xCode- Objective-C, JSON, XML, SOAP, REST- OO programming and design patterns- HTML5, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax and PHP- APIs and Web Services- Video playback in iOS (not required but desired)- Server-side technologies such as PHP and Java- Proficiency in Android SDK is desired but not mandatoryCompensationAt Crossover, you’ll earn extremely competitive wages while enjoying the flexibility of working from virtually anywhere on the face of the earth:Salary: 15 USD/hrPosition type: Full time (40 hours per week)Location: GlobalThe Type of iOS Developer We’re Looking ForCrossover values a culture of excellence. We need developers who are not only technically proficient, but also demonstrate the following qualities:- An ability to quickly and eagerly learn new technologies- A Willingness to take responsibility for projects and determine their trajectory- An ability to consistently meet deadlines even while running multiple projects- Excellent communication skills with a wide range of individuals (in English)- A collaborative approach to team projectsNext StepsReady to join? Start the process now by applying through our application link. If you meet the qualifications, we will proceed with a series of tests and interviews. Crossover is eager to see what you have to offer our cutting edge global workforce.
title: iOS Mobile Apps Developer - $2500/month

body:
Ne-am inceput activitatea in 2007 si cei 8 ani de experienta si-au spus cu siguranta cuvantul in standardele dupa care ne ghidam in acest moment. Suntem o echipa tanara, creativa, motivata si ceea ce ne defineste si ne place cel mai mult este faptul ca venim la munca de placere, crestem impreuna si ne completam reciproc. Dar...momentan lipsesti TU din echipa noastra!

Descriere:

- Crearea, realizarea si modificarea design-ului paginilor web din portofoliul nostru.
- Asigura mententanta si aduce imbunatatiri site-urilor actuale ale companiei.
- Colaboreaza si interactioneaza cu echipa de marketing in vederea implementarii de noi functii pe site-uri.
- Se implica in campanii de promovare pe Google, Facebook, Twitter etc si alte surse de generare trafic.
- Jobul se adreseaza persoanelor interesate de un program full-time, pe termen lung.

Cerinte:

- Cunostinte avansate de Adobe Photoshop sau orice alt soft profesional de editare grafica.
- Abilitati de design si cunostinte de HTML5 si CSS3.
- Optimizare SEO, propunere de solutii si implementarea acestora in vederea imbunatatirii traficului.
- Cunostinte deployment site-uri (CPanel, FTP... etc.).
- Cunostinte de baza pe partea de backend a site-urilor, PHP, MySQL, JavaScript.

Alte Cerinte:

- Abilitatea de comunicare, lucru in echipa.
- Persoana creativa si care poate propune solutii la problemele intalnite.
- Atentie la detalii, persoana organizata.
- Este capabil sa invete, se adapteaza la schimbari.
- Portofoliul de proiecte este obligatoriu.

Avantajele Postului:

- Orar flexibil, full-time.
- Colectiv tanar si dinamic.
- Laptop.
- Salariu motivant.
- Seriozitate.
- Investim in cresterea si dezvoltarea ta – asiguram participarea la cele mai bune cursuri.
- Bonusuri de performanta pe baza unor KPI’s.

Daca te potrivesti cu descrierea si te vezi colaborand cu noi, asteptam CV-ul tau!

body:
Red Mountain Management (RMM) is a Romanian consultancy company activating within the financial investment services market. Due to our registered business growth based on large partnerships with important international players, we are currently looking for highly dynamic professionals to join our team of sales specialists. 
We are recruiting passionate and motivated Social Media Specialists able to deliver results against objectives and meet the company expectations in a professional and dynamic manner. The Social Media Specialists must be eager to develop themselves in a fast-paced professional environment.

Responsibilities:
- Responsible for the identification and contact of potential (international) clients using the social media platforms.
- Use the company’s professional written templates in order to grow the share of the products and services based on the company strategy.
- Ensure coherent and simple messages and ads.
- Providing all the necessary information and assistance in a professional and accurate manner.
- Selecting the best professional approaching methods to attract the potential clients attention and turn that interest into sales.  
- Maintaining and developing successful business relationships throughout theentire approach and contact process/ life-cycle.
- Making efforts to identify and anticipate the client needs.
- Staying updated with RMM best practices and industry researches.

Requirements:
- Proficient in Italian and English (written & spoken).
- Computer proficiency- Microsoft Office Suite, Internet 
- Strong familiarity with online environment, especially professional and social networks - LinkedIn and Facebook basic experience.- Knowledge of Arabic language is a PLUS.
Creativity and presentation skills:
- Attention to details and good communication skills. 
- Experience in consulting/marketing is a PLUS.
- Eager to work in a demanding but challenging and dynamic environment that will quickly expand personal capabilities and marketing knowledge.
- Driven by determination to grow fast (committed to work hard to support the growth of the company and thus create great career opportunities within the company). 
- Ability to learn fast and to adapt to new and challenging situations.

Benefits:
- Motivating position and unique chance for professional development in the local office of a major international company.
- Dynamic, multinational work environment in a young team & young start-up branch - free of slow corporate procedures & regulations.
- Opportunities for personal development through training courses.
- Competitive remuneration package based on fixed salary+bonuses+commissions.
- Private medical insurance.
- Professional training and ongoing coaching.

If you enjoy being challenged over and over again, but also to have fun, RedMountain Management (RMM for friends) will be the best place for you to work.We invest heavily in the development of our people, and RMM gives you plenty of opportunities for individual initiative and responsibility.
title: Social Media Specialist with Italian

body:
MSD is a global health care leader with a diversified portfolio of prescription medicines, vaccines and animal health products. Today, we are building a new kind of healthcare company – one that is ready to help create a healthier future for all of us. 


Our ability to excel depends on the integrity, knowledge, imagination, skill, diversity and teamwork of an individual like you. To this end, we strive to create an environment of mutual respect, encouragement and teamwork. As part of our global team, you’ll have the opportunity to collaborate with talented and dedicated colleagues while developing and expanding your career. 



•Actively promote company’s products to diabetologists, and other health care professionals according to marketing and sales strategies defined for the franchise while always maintaining an ethical & compliant behaviour in line with all laws & regulations (internal & external). 
•Develop positive relationships with all customers and provide product and disease state expertise. 
•Assess customer requirements and advise on the most appropriate products. 
•Submit regular reports on sales and related activities. 
•Follow up with customers to ensure that a high level of customer satisfaction is achieved and maintained. 
•Identify potential target territories and provide feedback to line managers. 




Qualifications

•University degree
•At least 2 years experience in Diabetes on CV area of Romania (CJ, MS, AB, BN) is a strong advantage 
•Good knowledge in Diabetes field and understanding of pharma business 
•Highly customer-focused 
•Comfortable working independently, but also with a strong team-spirit 
•Sense of responsibility and attention to detail 
•Language: Romanian and English business proficiency and understanding 
•Computer proficiency: 
•CRM systems (Oracle, Viva, etc.) 
•Office: Excel, Word, PowerPoint – business level 



Our employees are the key to our company’s success. We demonstrate our commitment to our employees by offering a competitive and valuable rewards program. Our Company’s benefits are designed to support the wide range of goals, needs and lifestyles of our employees, and many of the people that matter the most in their lives.

body: CANDIDATUL IDEAL:Sa creada ca e cel mai bun !Sa creada ca poate rezolva orice problema !Sa stie cine e Wittmann Battenfeld fara sa caute pe NET !Sa fie pasionat de tot ce include industria de mase plastice.Sa isi doreasca sa devina un adevarat profesionist in domeniu !Sa nu poata sa zica: “lasa ca merge si asa“Sa nu poata sa zica “ asta nu e treaba mea“Sa duca lucrurile pana la capat !Sa vrea sa se alature celei mai dinamice si profesioniste echipe din acest domeniu.Aptitudini necesare:- cunostinte hidraulica ( sa poata sa citesca si sa inteleaga o schema hidraulica, actionari hidraulice proportionale)- cunostinte electronice-cunostinte pneumatice-sisteme automatizate / automatizari industriale- automate programabile-sisteme de actionare electrica cu turatie reglabila- elemente de executie mecanica-disponibilitate pentru lucru in echipa- deplasari pe termen lung- rezistenta la stressCunostinte (mentenanta, operare), masini injectie roboti, uscatoare, aspiratoare, mori, racitoare pentru industria maselor plastice prin injectie.Cunstinte matrite.Cunstinte plastic si procesarea acestora.Cunostinte PC:- Microsoft Office obligatoriu- programme de proiectare 2D, 3D ar considera un avantajCunosttinte limbi straine:- Engleza obligatoriu-Germana ar fi un avantajCarnet de conducere:- B obligatoriuSi daca nu indeplinesti toate lucrurile de mai sus, dar Vrei si Crezi si ti-ar placea sa ajungi sa le cunosti, si stii ca ai ceva inauntru deosebit care te face sa meriti....te asteptamRESPONSABILITATI/BENEFICII:Candidatul se va alatura celei mai bune echipe de service din Romania in domeniul maselor plastice.Poate fi din orice oras din tara de preferat ar fi: Arad, Timisoara, Oradea, Cluj, Sibiu, Bucuresti.Va lucra direct de la locul lui de domiciuliu pana cand vom infiinta o filiala in zona.Disponibilitate de a calatori 100% in tara. Va pleca de Luni de acasa si se va intoarce Vineri seara.Responsabilitatile lui vor fi:- deplasarea la client si punerea in functiune a utilajelor- instruirea clientului cum sa lucreze cu utilajele- pornirea productiei si optimizarea productiei la client-efectuarea unui raport al interventiei-promovarea echipamentelor, recomandarea de solutii tehnice clientului- asistenta tehnica telefonica pentru client- asistenta tehnica/reparatie a echipamentului la client- sustinerea colegilor din partea comerciala in proiecte importante prin cunostinte tehnice- pregatire continua in cele mai noi tehnologiiBeneficii:- vei apartine de o reprezentanta directa a celei mai puternic furnizor de echipamente din industria maselor palstice din Romania- vei avea instruiri in echipamente de minim 3 ori pe an- un colectiv care te va trage NUMAI IN SUS !- vei veni intr-un colectiv de invingatori - nu te vei plictisi ca nu vei avea de munca niciodata !- vei participa la PROIECTE REPREZENTATIVE PENTRU INTREAGA LUME nu pentru Romania sau Europa !- vei porni fabrici de la 0 !- vei avea siguranta locului de munca de maine- un colectiv minunat si care te astepta cu dragsi binenteles...- vei avea un salariu EGAL cu munca ta INTELIGENTA !- vei avea SMARTPHONE Samsung S4 sau Black Berry- Lap top - masina cu 2 locuri la dispozitie- prime de proiect, zi de nastere, intamplari grave, sau fericite, prime de sfarsit de an...- sambete duminici platite in cazul in care se lucreaza- tot salariul pe cartea de munca- salariul este in lei dar echivalnet in EUR si ajustabil raportat la cursul EUR/LEU de 2 ori pe an- salariul si sau conditiile de lucru se vor renegocia la fiecare inceput de an, in minus sau in plus depinde numai de tine !DESCRIEREA COMPANIEI:Wittmann Battenfeld este reprezentanta directa comerciala si tehnica  in Romania a grupului Wittmann din Austria, singura companie din Europa care produce si comercializeaza solutii complete pentru industria maselor plastice. Avand 4 fabrici in Austria unde este si Headquarterul, dintre care trei in Viena, a patra in Kottingbrunn a cincea in Ungaria la Mosonmagyarovar a sasea in Franta in Moirans.Cu peste 60 reprezentante directe in lume si o cifra de afaceri de peste 300 milioane de EUR grupul Wittmann este cel mai puternic furnizor din industria maselor plastice prin injectie. Avand o reputatie IMPECABILA a echipamentelor si a serviciilor de mententanta a acestora in orice loc al lumii.Numarul 1 in Europa in roboti industriali pentru masini de injectat mase plastice.In Romania este infiintata reprezentanta directa 4 ani si deja este pe departe cea mai tanara, dinamica si profesionista echipa din domeniu furnizorilor de echipamente pentru mase plastice.

body: We have an opening position of PCH Customer Service Officer, as contractor, reporting to PCH BU Manager RABB Region, for a non-determined period, located in Bucharest.Please find below the main responsibilities of the above-mentioned position.Responsibilities:   	Receives, edits, and enters orders for Pfizer products into the system, validating information and checking back with customers where necessary in order to process such orders in an effective and speedy manner. 	Maintains relationships with logistic service provider. 	Maintains an accurate filing system for orders, including the collation of orders, copies invoices, to ensure the effective running of the order system.  	Receives, investigates and keeps records of incoming customer queries / complaints, and takes the initiative in working towards prompt settlement or resolution of such queries / complaints, with the aim of achieving and enhancing customer satisfaction. 	Maintains relationships with distributors regarding expiring products, damaged products, etc. 	Maintains contact with customers to ensure that scheduled orders are received on time. 	Completes the invoicing cycle based on the proof of delivery documents: delivery note and signed invoices.Skills, Knowledge, Qualifications & Experience: 	University degree  	Proven experience to handle customer complaints 	Knowledge in SUN System is considered a plus 	Experience in commercial operations would be considered an advantage 	Experience in dealing with wholesalers 	Proven ability to track project implementation 	Proven ability to identify, analyze and collate information 	Good knowledge of MS Office – Excel 	Good communication skills 	Team player 	English proficiency 	Experience in centralizing and generating different reportsIf you are interesed in this position, please send your resume to HRRomania2@pfizer.com

body:
Ericsson Overview:

Ericsson is a world-leading provider of telecommunications equipment & services to mobile & fixed network operators. Over 1,000 networks in more than 180 countries use Ericsson equipment, & more than 40 percent of the world's mobile traffic passes through Ericsson networks. Using innovation to empower people, business & society, we are working towards the Networked Society, in which everything that can benefit from a connection will have one. At Ericsson, we apply our innovation to market-based solutions that empower people & society to help shape a more sustainable world.

We are truly a global company, working across borders in 175 countries, offering a diverse, performance-driven culture & an innovative & engaging environment where employees enhance their potential everyday. Our employees live our vision, core values & guiding principles. They share a passion to win & a high responsiveness to customer needs that in turn makes us a desirable partner to our clients. To ensure professional growth, Ericsson offers a stimulating work experience, continuous learning & growth opportunities that allow you to acquire the knowledge & skills necessary to reach your career goals.

Job Summary:

The main purpose of the role Instructor is to be responsible for delivery and customization of training products for Learning Services customers.

Main Tasks:

 •To deliver technical training and learning solutions for internal/external customers and ensure that assigned courses/modules are delivered with desired quality. Trace latest information in relation to competence area and conduct related technical lecture to share most updated knowledge.
•To take active part in the course material preparation, customization and learning solutions development and update.
•To be in charge with effective assistance on technical support and on setting up the training environment. 

Responsibilities:

Related to training delivery:
 •Uses assessment tools to determine effectiveness of proposed training programs.
•Interacts with functional organizations to develop specifications for content of courses, to ensure that course content and material reflects current products specification and features and builds up needed competencies/skills.
•Prepares lesson plans including the method, media, course workbooks, trainer notes and documentation to be presented. It Instructs participants through classroom/virtual lectures, group sessions and/or laboratory sessions.
•Conducts technical training courses for customers and/or employees.
•Facilitates learning as a coach, a tutor through the monitoring of trainee’s progress and reviewing of any problems arising during their learning process.
•Conducts follow-up evaluations/surveys to determine applicability of course material and to assess 

Related to training development:
 •Defines training objectives
•Defines chapters and appropriate duration
•Develops training module curricula
•Develops trainer guide
•Develops training documents
•Validates training documents after the first training session 

Others:
 •Applies Ericsson and internal department’s procedures.
•Applies the general safety rules. 

Qualifications:

Technical skills:

 •Knowledge within Telecom, specialist in GSM and WCDMA mobile core networks such as AXE Operation, HLR/VLR/AUC Operation, MSC Operation, Mobile Media Gateway (AXE and CPP Platform) Configuration, MSC Blade Cluster and User Data Consolidation Solution.
•2G, 3G, LTE, IMS, IMT network switching troubleshooting on: MSC, MSC-S, HLR, HSS, MGW, STP, MSS, SBG, BGF, CSCF (preferably Ericsson equipment).
•Understanding GSM system concept: IMSI, MSRN, routing concepts (SCCP, GTRC etc.), B-number analysis, GT analysis, complete call flow. Very good concepts in CCS7 signaling, IP, ATM, ISDN and SIGTRAN. Knowledge on protocol level of CCS7, ISUP, SCCP, TCAP, MAP etc.
•Experience in project activities: implementing, adapting of E2E service functionalities
•Previous teaching experience will be considered a great plus.
•Other vendors experience is a plus (Huawei/Nokia Siemens/ Alcatel Lucent). 

Human skills: 

 •Excellent presentation skills.
•Previous experience as a trainer or knowledge sharing is a must.
•Fluent in English speaking and writing (other languages are considered a great plus).
•Be curious and innovative.
•Be a team player.
•Be enthusiastic and motivated.
•Be able to work independently and be self-motivated.
•Ability to provide clear and concise reports/feedback to peers and management, adapting the style of communication appropriately to the audience/receivers.
•Ability to deliver on-time.
•Willing to travel inside and outside of Romania. 

Minimum Qualifications & Experience Requirements: 

 •Bachelor degree or above of Telecommunications, Computer Science or Electrical Engineering
•At least 3 years of telecommunications practical experience. 

Additional Requirements, Physical Demands, Region/Local Specifications: 

 •Location in Romania, Bucharest
•Able to deliver technical trainings in romanian language

body: Société Générale European Business Services délivre de la valeur ajoutée pour le Groupe Société Générale au niveau des services de finance, comptabilité, ressources humaines et IT por toutes les entités de l'Europe.La Direction des Ressources Groupe Société générale est dotée d'un département Business Solutions Center – BSC – qui a pour vocation d’être le partenaire des directions centrales et des branches pour les accompagner dans le déploiement des solutions informatiques mutualisées au sein des Filières, Finance, Risques, RH.Au sein du BSC, le Centre de Solutions Finance assure en particulier les évolutions et le bon fonctionnement des applications de production des états réglementaires de SG Métropole, du Groupe et des filiales.Votre environnementAu sein du groupe Société Générale, vous rejoindrez le Business Solution Center, qui est un centre de services partagés, intégré à la Direction des Ressources et de l'Innovation du Groupe.Sa mission : doter les Filières et Pôles du groupe de solutions informatiques performantes et innovantes.Comme éditeur et fournisseur de solutions, le Business Solution Center accompagne aussi les grands projets Groupe et la transformation de la Filière IT.Votre rôleAu sein de la Direction des Ressources du Groupe, et plus particulièrement du Business Solutions Center, le Maîtrise d’œuvre Sogefilia a pour mission de prendre en charge l’assistance de premier et second niveaux aux utilisateurs, la mise en œuvre des évolutions et projets techniques concernant les progiciels et développements in-house servant les processus de Comptabilité Générale et de Déclarations Réglementaires des filiales françaises du Groupe Société Générale (Sogefilia – environ 400 entités) en :•	Garantissant la disponibilité, la qualité de la production au second niveau en assistant techniquement l’équipe de support aux utilisateurs et en intervenant dans la gestion de la relation avec l’exploitant•	Mettant techniquement en œuvre les évolutions imposées par l’exploitant sur l’architecture en place (Citrix, Web, spécificités des postes utilisateur final) •	Assurant la relation technique avec les éditeurs des progiciels, l’équipe de développements tactiques et l’exploitant•	Réalisant en partenariat avec les éditeurs et l’exploitant les projets techniques des différents progiciels •	Assistant le responsable Maîtrise d’œuvre dans la gestion technique du périmètre applicatif et en particulier sur les projets et évolutions fonctionnelles.Vous interviendrez sur des activités comme :•	Assistance technique de second niveau sur les incidents de production•	Mise en œuvre technique des projets et évolutions métier en collaboration avec les éditeurs, l’exploitant et la Maîtrise d’Ouvrage•	Suivi opérationnel des travaux de packaging des progiciels avec l’exploitant, l’éditeur et la maîtrise d’ouvrage•	Mise en œuvre des roadmaps publiées par les éditeurs des progiciels du périmètre (ex : évolutions réglementaires)•	Proposer des corrections/évolutions suite aux incidents récurrents et/ou à votre retour d’expérience•	Remonter les alertes adéquates au Responsable Maîtrise d’œuvre.Votre profil technique :•	Niveau d’études : Bac+4 minimum avec spécialisation Informatique•	Maîtrise pratique des architectures techniques : 3-tiers, Web, Citrix…•	Maîtrise pratique des OS standard : Windows, Linux•	Maîtrise pratique de SGBD : SQL Server, Oracle•	Maîtrise du langage Transact SQL•	Une première expérience dans une grande DSI sera un avantage déterminant Nous portons attention également à :•	Une attitude responsable et un fort engagement dans la réalisation de votre mission•	Une forte autonomie et réactivité compte tenu des délais courts dans lesquels les évolutions demandées, parfois très significatives, doivent être réalisées•	Rigueur, créativité et communication sont nécessaires à la réussite de cette mission•	Aisance relationnelle et capacités de discussion indispensables pour body: Who we are:youngculture is part of NSM Engineering, a Swiss software engineering group of companies, which provides near-shore services for aviation, banking, telecommunications, eCommerce, and many other sectors. Previous work in Scrum methodology and distributed development teams would be considered as assets•	Sound experience integrating Magento to other 3rd party software such as Solr, SAP PI/PO, CQ5, MySQL•	Familiarity with Magento 2.0 concepts would be considered a big plus•	Excellent PHP skills•	Very good understanding of Frontend technologies and frameworks - Less, JQuery, KnockoutJS, Responsive Web Design. Knowledge of RequireJS and/or AngularJS would be considered as assets•	Relevant experience in CI/CD and related tools (SVN and Git, Atlassian Bamboo)•	Experience with Atlassian tool suite: Jira, Confluence, Stash•	Moderate administration skills with Linux (RedHat)•	Ability to interpret and communicate information to the client•	Proven experience in leading and growing development teams•	Dedication and ownership for delivery on time and quality•	Open and friendly personality, as well as drive, initiative, problem-solving mindset, excellent interpersonal and team-working skills•	Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English•	Availability for short-term abroad business trips.What we offer:•	Challenging projects in a highly professional, but also relaxed, collaborative and supportive environment•	Working in small and excellent skilled teams•	Opportunity for long term professional growth within our development center•	Salaries and conditions which correspond to the high demands•	Modern office space in the city center•	Travel opportunities to EU countries.Working location:Iasi, RomaniaPlease send your resume to jobs.romania@youngculture.com. body:
We are hiring because of growing and expanding our team in a Corporate Travel & Expense industry, top products worldwide and a big number of clients / platform users. Our client is part of an international, challenging and friendly environment.
You will have the opportunity to use the latest .NET and modern web technologies to design and build new components and features for our large scale web applications, create automated tests and make sure the software lives up to our high quality standards in a growing platform. 
Agile is the Methodology that we like! You can be part of an experienced and dynamic Scrum team and will be involved in all the phases of a software development product life cycle, from requirements analysis and design through implementation, testing and deployment.
You have a solid Computer Science background, relevant industry experience and a passion for clean code? Come and meet us!

About our activity and responsibilities:
•	Design and implement software solutions for our web applications;
•	Perform code reviews;
•	Write unit tests (both for back-end and front-end);
•	Unit Testing, Test-Driven Development, Integration Testing;
•	Consider performance tuning, improvements and focus on quality standards

Cutting edge technologies:
•	Design, develop, and implement software solutions based on Microsoft and open source technologies: C#, .NET Framework, ASP.NET WebAPI, MVC, WebForms, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, NHIbernate, Oracle, Windsor Castle dependency injection, xUnit, RhinoMocks.

Technical skills:
•	Experience in .Net or C# development is essential
•	Web application development using ASP.NET WebAPI, MVC, WebForms
•	Good command of SQL databases (preferably Oracle)
•	Good to have: Single Page Application development using JavaScript, Backbone, Marionette, Handlebars, Bootstrap, responsive design, Node.js, Npm, Bower

Nice to have: 
•	Experience designing and implementing REST APIs
•	Experience in programming / writing of unit test, TDD using xUnit, RhinoMocks or other frameworks, 
•	Dependency Injection containers knowledge (Windsor Castle or others);
•	Experience with NoSQL databases (CouchBase, Redis and/or MongoDB)
•	Experience in solving performance issues (profiling, query optimization, caching)
•	Knowledge about Dependency Injection containers and techniques, Unit testing and mocking frameworks (xUnit, RhinoMocks).

Our team profile:
•	Ability to openly present own ideas 
•	Independent and highly motivated with a strong customer focus 
•	Able to work both independently and as part of a team 
•	Fluency in English; French would be a big plus 
•	Willing and able to be part of international projects and initiatives 
•	Action and results orientated, ability to manage multiple priorities.
title: Senior .Net Developer
locations: Dimitrie Pompei nr 6A, București, Municipiul București, România

body:
Job purpose and key deliverables

Under the direction of the Dealing Room Manager, to support the activities of the London based Treasury Service Centre (“TSC”) as follows:

1.	Liquidity management: Reconciliation of opening balances, adjustment for daily clearing items, verification of daily Batcash submissions, execution of daily cash management FX swaps and investment of surplus cash balances in line with policy.

2.	TaO: To support and complete integration testing cycles and user acceptance testing for all future deployment groups. To assist local market SAP users as required and to represent TSC in system related meetings and projects.

3.	Agency Dealing: To support and execute transactions where applicable for existing and new agency markets, and to assist in future on boarding projects.

4.	Short term funding: Planning, preparation and execution of short term funding to include commercial paper market data collection, database maintenance, ad hoc reporting, deal input and validation.

5.	Intercompany funding: Pricing of inter company funding transactions in line with mandates, evidence and communication of arms length pricing to end markets, execution of corresponding loan/deposit hedges, preparation and coordination of internal discount notes.

6.	End Market FX: To assist in the execution of End Market operational fx and hedge requirements.

7.	Ad hoc reporting as required.

8.	To work with the Dealing Room Manager, and the London based dealers on other ad-hoc projects.

Essential requirements

1.	The Job Holder will need to be highly adaptable to change and able to synergise relevant concepts in financial markets and financial risks to produce relevant innovations for the TSC as well as for the BAT Group.
2.	The Job holder must have excellent communication skills both verbal and in writing and must be proactive in maintaining and developing working relationships with various end market organisations and external counterparties. Knowledge of multiple and relevant languages will be useful given the jurisdictions that the TSC operates in.
3.	The job holder must have relevant Treasury experience from a back office or accounting background.
4.	The Job Holder must have excellent computer skills in respect of using all the Microsoft office suite (in particular Excel), Lotus Notes, Bloomberg, FXall and SAP
title: Treasury Dealer / Analyst
locations: SEMA PARK Etaj 1 Splaiul Independentei 319 Sector 6, București, Municipiul București, România

body: C/C++ Senior Software Engineer iRewind is looking for a senior software engineer with C/C++ development experience.At iRewind, we are building a platform designed to let millions of people enjoy and share their personal videos. Our product relies on a scalable Java solution spanning multiple layers going from the automated generation of personalized videos to content delivery. We are using a complex stack bringing together many state-of-the art components from distributed databases to computer vision libraries.  Our new teammate should play a leading role in the development of our content delivery platform. We are looking  for someone with existing experience in developing large scale Java applications, who is passionate about continuous improvement. You should be comfortable working in a very dynamic environment, requiring constant learning of new tools and rapid delivery of new features.RequirementsExtensive experience (min 5 years) of application design & development with C/C++ Very good experience with Linux operating systems. Knowledge of OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision) Excellent time management and strong multi-tasking skills Opengl experience is strongly preferred The ability to effectively collaborate in software development activities Python wrapping over C/C++ libraries Nice to have:Experience with machine learning algorithms  ResponsibilitiesArchitecture, design, development and testing plans for new modules Hands-on software development and testing, typically spending about 75% of time writing code  Integration of tools, components and other systems Explore new, innovative technologies and find solutions to bottleneck problems Provide estimates and benchmarks for different technical solutions Mentor junior members of the team About iRewindWe are a Swiss tech start-up founded in December 2013. We began commercial operations in February 2015 in the sports market, with expansion plans to Leisure and Travel segments such as amusement parks, castles, resorts, museums, cruises, etc.Our technology matches camera meta-data with user positioning information to identify and make you the star of your personalized video memory. We disrupt the memories market by eliminating the need to carry a camera.Accolades received:1st place winner Swiss ICT “Newcomer“ (2014) 1st place winner Grand Prix Geneva International Inventions Salon (2014) “Top 17 Disruptors“ at START Global Web Summit (Oct 2014) “Top 8 Recommended“ promising Swiss start-ups ( Bilan, Feb 2015) 1st place winner “Creative Integration of Technology“ (Axis Communication, 2015)

body:
The Customer Behavior team is recruiting for a Senior Software Development Manager to lead our Analytics group. As a Senior Software Development Manager, you will be responsible for leading a team of engineers in design, development, test, and deployment of these services. A successful candidate will have an established background in developing customer-facing experiences, a strong technical ability, excellent project management skills, great communication skills, and a motivation to achieve results in a fast paced environment.
Key Responsibilities:
• Responsible for the overall systems development life cycle
• Develop the long-term strategy for your programs and translate that into an achievable road map/action plan
• Management and execution against project plans and delivery commitments
• Manage the day-to-day activities of the engineering team within an Agile/Scrum environment
• Management of departmental resources, staffing, mentoring, and enhancing and maintaining a best-of-class engineering team
• Work closely with the engineers to architect and develop the best technical design and approach
• Report on status of development, quality, operations, and system performance to management
Professional traits that are not unique to this position, but necessary for Amazon leaders:
• Exhibits excellent judgment
• Hires and develops great people
• Has relentlessly high standards (is never satisfied with the status quo)
• Is able to dive deep and is never out of touch with the details of the business or the technology
• Expects and requires innovation of her/his team
• Has passion and convictions and the innate ability to inspire passion in others
• Strong results orientation
• Thinks big
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related technical discipline
• 5+ years of experience as a software developer
• 5+ years of experience managing people

• Deep hands-on technical expertise
• Excellent verbal and written communication skills
• Strong business and technical vision
• Ability to handle multiple competing priorities in a fast-paced environment
• A deep understanding of software development in a team, and a track record of shipping software on time
• Exceptional customer relationship skills including the ability to discover the true requirements underlying feature requests, recommend alternative technical and business approaches, and lead engineering efforts to meet aggressive timelines with optimal solutions

body:
We are looking for a QA Analyst who wish to be a part of developing of our international team. Corporater AS is a Norwegian software company which is the world’s leading provider of Enterprise Performance Management solutions. The company is growing rapidly, therefore we are looking for more well-qualified staff. We have 100 employees - 25 at the company’s head office in Stavanger, Norway. Over the last fifteen years we have delivered solutions to more than 300 customers in the public and private sectors. Corporater has subsidiaries in Romania, Brazil, Sweden, UAE, USA and India. 

Our team in Bucharest is looking forward to welcome 

QA Analyst

Responsibilities:

- Analyze requirements and design test plans and scenarios for Corporater solutions (Enterprise Performance Management Suite, the mobile application, Surveyor). This way you will be able to identify key aspects of the quality of our solutions like stability, performance, reliability, impact of change/regression etc
- Resolve issues by working closely with application software development, product management and other departments within the organization
- Find, manage and track quality issues in English, using JIRA as the defect tracking tool

Main requirements:

- Testing and technical skills - experience with defect tracking tools (ideally JIRA) and the ability to report, manage and retest bugs independently. Previous experience of testing business management solutions is desired.
- Good English communication skills (in writing and verbally) - be able to discuss and understand the issues or new functionalities with Developers/Product manager/Business analysts/Consultants.
- Capability of integration in an international/multi-cultural environment 

We offer:

- A good work environment as a part of a multi-national and multi-cultural environment
- Competitive (motivating) terms corresponding your experience
- Strong and active technical environment with good potential for growth and be exposed to new technologies
title: QA Analyst
locations: București, Municipiul București, România

body: Wipro WT is a trendsetter and leader in the Outsourcing space. We invite passionate, energetic, creative and focused individuals who want to be a part of our growth story! Wipro WT is the best option you can find to develop your expertise in the industry. You will get immense opportunities to learn from our focused approach towards delivering long-term benefits and measurable value to our customers through:Business Domain KnowledgeIntegrating TechnologyProcess ExcellenceAt Wipro, you will get a solid understanding about the best way to service the customer requirements by leveraging Quality, Innovation, self-sustaining Process Framework, IT expertise and Domain knowledge. With the best people talent, we offer customized service offerings, translating into the most flexible and cost effective services of the highest quality. You will get the opportunity to be a part of a very capable and energetic team of over 24,000 colleagues, operating out of more than 25 delivery locations across the globe. This team from Wipro BPS has been a valued partner to all our customers in achieving their business goals. A wide range of industry options are available since we services customers in various industries including Banking & Capital Markets, Insurance, Travel & Hospitality, Retail & Consumer Products, Energy and Utility, Technology, Manufacturing, Telecom & Healthcare sectors. We have built deep expertise in Processes like Finance & Accounting, Procurement, Marketing, Legal, HR Services, Tech Support, Customer Services and Analytics. Follow us on Facebook @ www.facebook.com/WiproRomaniaService Desk Admin L1Profile:- Fluent communication skills in English and one of the following: Bulgarian/ Croatian- Previous Helpdesk (Voice Support) experience is to be preferred.- Excellent telephone manner.- Experience of using call logging software.- Knowledge of Microsoft based operating systems with emphasis on Windows X- Experience with using and troubleshooting Outlook within a network environment (permissions, calendar sharing, delegation)- Experience with using and troubleshooting Microsoft Office with emphasis on MS Word, MS Excel and MS PowerPoint.- Basic understanding of PC hardware set-up and configuration.- MCP certification would be desirable- Should have worked as a Customer Support Engineer / Technical Support Executive / System or Network Administrator & acquired hands-on experience in the above areas in large & complex setups- Should have good understanding of infrastructure management processes; Understanding of ITIL framework is needed- Good communication (written & oral), presentation skills, quick learner, self-initiated, team player, willing to travel, open to work in shiftsRole and responsibilities:- To provide 1st line/2nd line technical support; answering support queries via phone, email, Chat and Web- To maintain a high degree of customer service for all support queries and adhere to all service management principles.- To take ownership of user problems and be proactive when dealing with user issues.- Logging / verifying customer details- Identifying the issue and categorizing / prioritize the incident- Creating a ticket in CRM tool- Referring KB for workaround / resolution and attempting resolution- Strong interpersonal skills are a prerequisite.- Ability to work effectively in a dispersed team and individually.- Ticket re-assignment to L2 if ticket unresolved by L1 (where ever applicable)- Ticket reassignment to PRG's if ticket unresolved by L1 (where ever applicable)- Routing / Chasing of tickets with other PRG's- Recording trend of calls and identifying outages proactively- Callbacks for customer not reachable cases & customer request- Identifying the trend of calls / tickets and highlighting it to L2 / TL as applicable for outage confirmation (where ever applicable)- Creating child tickets and tagging them with problem ticket- Callback the user and confirm resolution (where ever applicable)Foreign languages skills:- Advanced English language skills, both written and spoken and- Fluent communication and writing skills in Bulgarian/ CroatianBenefits:- Opportunity to work in a young and dynamic environment;- Attractive benefits package;- Lunch tickets- Fitness deduction- Health insurance and dental scheme;- Opportunity to develop and learn constantly- Access to internal training (job related and soft skills training)
