body:
Ericsson Overview


Ericsson is a world-leading provider of telecommunications equipment & services to mobile & fixed network operators. Over 1,000 networks in more than 180 countries use Ericsson equipment, & more than 40 percent of the world's mobile traffic passes through Ericsson networks. Using innovation to empower people, business & society, we are working towards the Networked Society, in which everything that can benefit from a connection will have one. At Ericsson, we apply our innovation to market-based solutions that empower people & society to help shape a more sustainable world.



We are truly a global company, working across borders in 175 countries, offering a diverse, performance-driven culture & an innovative & engaging environment where employees enhance their potential every day. Our employees live our vision, core values & guiding principles. They share a passion to win & a high responsiveness to customer needs that in turn makes us a desirable partner to our clients. To ensure professional growth, Ericsson offers a stimulating work experience, continuous learning & growth opportunities that allow you to acquire the knowledge & skills necessary to reach your career goals.

Job Summary



Through efficient management of people under his/her organization, the Team Leader shall strengthen Ericsson GSSO's competitive position by maximizing service portfolio, proactively managing business risks & contributing to the creation of value for the Customer



The Team Leader is accountable for evaluating, qualifying & selecting team members and ensuring they are capable and motivated to deliver the services of the GSSO.



The Team Leader is responsible for all individual performance management aspects, staffing, development needs, customer satisfaction and quality and accuracy of deliverables.

The Team Leader reports to the Head of Analytics & eSourcing and supports GSSO regular operations, non-standard projects and development initiatives.

The Team Leader role could be a professional experience in the career path towards a people management role.

1.1                      People-related Responsibilities
•Supports integration of new team members at organizational level (understanding of role and responsibilities, of Ericsson and GSSO culture etc.) and provides assistance for them in the long-run in collaboration with the Coordinator role.
•Maintains a high level of readiness within the team in regards to skills and competencies through active initiation of training plans, knowledge sharing and refresher sessions and feedback to  team members
•Recruits and ensures that staffing needs are estimated, included in forecasts, approved and then selection process is executed seamlessly
•Supports team members in building competence development plans and career goals
•Provides feedback to team members and facilitates communication within the team
•Coaches team members for their current job and for their development plans
•Drives performance through SMART objectives in the team members IPMs

1.2                      Process-related Responsibilities
•Oversees work and load balance and supports the Coordinators in these efforts
•Plays and active role in various governance forums, presentations and analysis and presents them to the Sourcing Units
•Supports process maintenance with the Business Partner and Coordinators: work instructions creation and updates, process documentation management etc.
•Drives best practices across the Ericsson Sourcing Community through day-to-day work and  also by contributing to newsletters and events
•Drives and executes the GSSO strategy and liaises with other GSSO team to ensure this strategy gets implemented timely
•Takes ownership as 2nd level of escalation and insures issues are addressed for mutually beneficial outcome
•Represents GSSO and respective Team in various forums
•Contributes to GSSO growth and development by engaging in cross-functional projects

1.3                      Performance-related Responsibilities
•Controls and takes accountability for the performance of the team in the areas of: customer satisfaction, response/execution time, perception on service and other indicators included in the GSSO Balance Scorecard
•Initiates corrective and preventive measures from the identified malfunctions in the team members’ performance
•Acts as 3rd tier in Audit and Quality Assurance Processes and takes action to improve these over time



2                          Main Interfaces

2.1                      GSSO
•Team members
•Coordinator
•Business Partner
•Heads of Sourcing Units
•GSSO Teams
•GSSO Management

2.2                      Ericsson Sourcing
•All Ericsson Sourcing Units members
•Non-Sourcing Units

2.3                      Supplier Organizations (mainly for eSourcing)
•Sales & Account Managers

3                          Competence profile

3.1                      People skills
•Skilled in staffing, recruitment, motivating, team management and leadership
•Strong communication and presentation skills
•Strong customer orientation and ability to work under pressure
•Proficient in facilitating and presenting in public

3.2                      Process skills
•Excellent knowledge in Sourcing area and common industry practices

3.3                      Performance skills
•Strong analytical, synthetic and documenting skills
•Good understanding of performance management at team and individual level

4                          Education & Language
•Bachelor Degree within Finance / Economics / Mathematics / Computer Science / Computer Engineering or alternate
•Fluency in written and spoken English required is essential
•Other language skills are advantageous

5                          Interpersonal skills     
•Leadership
•Personal example for communication, ethics and proactive attitude
•Customer service is essential
•Flexible and responsive to changing work patterns and demands
•A thorough and methodical approach to work
•Well-developed interpersonal communication and people orientation
•Willing to share knowledge, experiences and skills to create a learning culture
•Excellent ambassador of GSSO and Ericsson culture and values
•Networking skill
•Persuasion and influencing
•Coaching and facilitation

body:
Esti in cautarea unui job part-time, care sa iti ofere posibilitatea de a merge la cursuri? Ai deja un job part-time si doresti sa-ti completezi veniturile? Atunci, job-ul nostru este ceea ce cauti !DIVA HAIR COSMETICS recruteaza Gestionar depozit, program part-time (de luni pana vineri, de la 09.00-15.00).
Descrierea activitatii:							- organizarea comenzilor din platforma interna de lucru, in functie de prioritatea in livrare;- pregatirea si ambalarea produselor, in vederea livrarii comenzilor catre client;- mentinerea legaturii cu firmele de curierat;- intocmirea documentelor necesare trimiterii coletelor, conform procedurii fiecarei firme de curierat cu care se colaboreaza;- verificarea periodica a expeditiilor;- introducerea comenzilor in platforma interna de lucru;- arhivarea si indosarierea comenzilor, precum si a altor documente;- pregatirea comenzilor de etichete pentru produse;- actualizarea in permanenta a stocului de produse din spatiul de depozitare al firmei si transmiterea cantitatilor existente catre seful direct;- aranjarea si mentinerea repartizarii produselor in spatiul de depozitare alocat, in functie de anumite criterii specifice stabilite de catre seful ierarhic superior.* Activitatea se va desfasura de luni pana vineri, in intervalul 09.00-15.00.
Cerinte:
       -   studii medii finalizate ;       - usurinta in comunicare, capacitate de asimilare a informatiilor, adaptabilitate, atentie sporita la detalii, rapiditate in efectuarea sarcinilor;      -    cunostinte operare PC (Windows, Microsoft Word si Excel, Internet);      -    abilitatea de a lucra eficient in conditii de presiune si termene limita.
Beneficii:• salariu atractiv in raport cu volumul de munca;• desfasurarea activitatii in cadrul unei echipe tinere, muncitoare, alaturi de care poti creste profesional.
Asteptam cu mare interes CV-ul tau la adresa de mail: hr@divainteractive.ro !
 Mai multe informatii despre Diva Hair Cosmetics puteti afla accesand site-ul nostru: http://www.divahaircosmetics.ro/

body: Come work with the top 1% of global talent to manage the delivery of WOW Support to our customers for 25+ software products.  We offer a fast-pace environment where inventiveness and entrepreneurial drive are rewarded. We’re also one of the few IT companies offering high-paying jobs that are 100% remote, work from home. You never have to fight traffic to office again.Versata provides software support services to customers who use our 25+ software products and our Level 2 support agents are the major technical resource for our customers. We are looking for Level 2 support agents who are passionate about helping customers. We need L2s with a variety of skill sets so we encourage you to attempt to qualify for the position based on the technology with which you are most proficient. What do we need from you?As a Level 2 Support Agent, you will:Learn and become proficient in solving technical issues in at least three of our products Solve complex technical issues escalated by Level 1 Support staff Proactively document, monitor and update Support tickets and actionable steps taken Support the Level 1 agent in communicating progress to the customers Submit software product issues (bugs) to product development for resolution Validate and document software bug fixes in product releases before they are made available to customers Stay up-to-date with all the latest technologies concerning our software products Create Knowledge Base Articles / Technical Notes Provide technical support and product training to other team members Participate in Team Meetings  Compensation:$2250/monthWhat we’d like to see in your background:Proficiency in using commonly available Windows platforms Proficiency in:Windows Networking Excellent problem solving and troubleshooting skills Well versed in current software support practices and tools including: troubleshooting, virtual environments, issue tracking, log investigation, build testing, and `ticket management Ability to manage your time and prioritize effectively while working multiple issues for multiple customers Ability to communicate effectively in written and spoken English Ability to research potential solutions with limited available documentationAdditionally, the following requirements apply to all Support positions:Communication Skills - In order to effectively communicate with our customers, all candidates for support positions must have excellent written and verbal communications skills. All support staff that interact directly with customers are required to be fluent in English. If hired to work in another language as well as English, communications skills in the other language must be excellent. Dynamic Work Environment - All candidates must be able to work successfully in an environment where our core support systems and processes are continuously improved over time. Process Adherence – All candidates must be able to successfully adapt and adhere to our process methodology. Video - candidates must have the computer hardware and networking bandwidth to conduct a seamless video Skype conversation for team communication. Ongoing use of webcam for billing and Skype video are required. Working Hours: This job is only offered on a Full Time basis (40 hrs/wk).  Level 2 Agents work between 8 am and 6 pm Eastern Time, including breaks, Monday through Friday.  Please note that we do observe US Daylight Savings Time, so Eastern Time is UTC-4 in the summer and UTC-5 in the winter. To qualify, please provide a resume/CV demonstrating the required experience and skills.  From there, to help us find the top 1% of talent, we ask that you first complete some screening tests.  Once you receive testing, you have 7 days to complete all assessments and submit your responses.After you pass our screening tests, there will be a paid trial week where we provide training and ask you to show us your skills. At the end of your trial week, we will either extend an ongoing contract, place you in another position, or release you from the trial.Versata Support is proud to be an equal opportunity employer that provides an exceptional work environment.  All candidates will be required to undergo and pass a rigorous background check to ensure a safe and productive workplace.Are you up for the challenge?
title: Level 2 Support Agent - $2250/month

body: Nordea will shape the future digital banking. For Northern Europe's largest digital project we arehiring highly skilled and motivated developers who with dedication and experience can securegreat digital solutions. Do you have development experience within one or more of the following areas: Mobile - iOS (Objective-C, Swift, adaptive UI, REST, JSON APIs, Git, Java Script, Python,Ruby, unit testing and open source projects etc) -  Android (REST, JSON APIs, Git, Java Script, Python, Ruby, unit testing and opensource projects etc)Web (HTML5, CSS3, Sass, Less, Flexbox, Bootstrap, TypeScript, CoffeeScript, JSlibraries, Angular JS, React JS, Backbone, Knockout, Jasmine, Qunit, Mocha, Karma, Gitetc)Test (Junit, NUnit, Jasmine, QUnit, Mocha, Karma, Java Script, Ruby, Java, C#, Scala,Java 8 Spring, RX Java, RESTful API, Play, Scalatra, Spring Boot, WebAPI, Maven,Gradle, Git, Linux, Jenkins etc)Integration (Java 8, Spring, RX Java, RESTful API, Play, Scalatra, Spring Boot, WebAPI,Maven, Gradle, Git, Linux, Jenkins, Java Script, Ruby etc) Security (Java, ObjC, Java Script, OWASP Top Ten, app development, RESTful API, Play,Scalatra, Spring Boot, Git, Linux etc)Nordea offers:You will become an important part of Nordea's strategic task force, which aims to develop thefuture digital platform  You will be working agile in a scaled environment; in small teams and in close cooperation witha Product Owner in Copenhagen  You will grow along with sharp minded and dedicated colleagues.Together we will create the future digital platform for bank customers.The recruitment process The recruitment process is handled by Speedrecruiters. body:
Red Mountain Management (RMM) is a Romanian consultancy company activating within the financial investment services market. Due to our registered business growth based on large partnerships with important international players, we are currently looking for highly dynamic professionals to join our team.
Your career starts today, step into the financial market supported by a world leading company.
Take a leap forward, gather new experience and evolve both professionally and personally. Red Mountain Management has a partnership with a revolutionary company in the binary options industry, due to its recognized experts in the trading assistance department and also due to the competitive financial products made available. Our partner achieves an outstanding performance with and an impressive expansion with the best team of experts and the best financial products.
Responsibilities:
-	Responsible for maintaining and developing successful business cooperation with the international prospects in order to build and maintain their interest and satisfaction in the company’s products.
-	Providing all the necessary information and assistance in a professional and accurate manner for growing the share of the products and services based on the company strategy.
-	Attracting the potential client’s attention and turn that interest into sales.
-	Making efforts to identify and anticipate the client needs and beyond current service relationship.
-	Manage the relationship with the client through CRM and all available communication channels. 

Desired Experience and Skills:
-	Advanced English skills both spoken and written. 
-	Any other language is considered a PLUS.
- Computer literate.
-	Experience in sales/consulting/call center/ capital markets is desirable.
-	Ability to build rapport and trust, in an excellent telephone and email manner, with a friendly and informative approach.
-	Highly customer-focused.
-	Comfortable working independently, but also with a strong team-spirit.

Benefits:
- Motivating position and unique chance for professional development in the local office of a major international company.
- Dynamic, multinational work environment in a young team & young startup branch - free of slow corporate procedures & regulations.
- Opportunities for personal development through training courses.
- Competitive remuneration package based on fixed salary+bonuses+commissions.
- Medical insurance.
- Professional training and ongoing coaching.

If you enjoy being challenged over and over again, but also to have fun, Red Mountain Management will be the best place for you to work.
title: Account Manager with English

body:
Candidatul ideal

To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each basic responsibility satisfactorily and meet education and experience requirements.
Education and Experience:
- Five to ten years of finance or business management experience required.
- Broad working experience with information systems; understands basic concepts of systems implementation required.
- Knowledge of electronic data interchange technologies (EDI, XML), and Oracle eBusiness applications preferred.
- Supply chain; logistics; or transportation industry experience preferred.
- Fluent English is required. Ability to speak Spanish, French, or German is preferred.
- Proven project management abilities required.
- Ability to multi-task and work in multi-disciplinary teams required.
- Excellent written, verbal, and presentation communication skills required.

Descrierea jobului



Responsible for the expansion and execution of freight audit and payment program in Europe, including the development and revision of existing processes, management of third party provider, and integration with the supply chain optimization program and various global and regional mode teams.
Basic Responsibilities and Objectives Include:
• Project leadership including the development of project plans for new or changes to existing audit payment processes.
• Expansion of the audit payment program to include all European business units. Including incorporating changes required to meet regional requirements
• Development and reporting of the necessary budget including monthly updates and annual setting of the budget.
• Works closely with business unit and corporate leadership to identify requirements and develop strategies for the development, implementation, and monitoring of compliance for freight bill audit and payment processes.
• Ensure compliance with internal accounting requirements including industry and legal requirements and standards.
• Reporting and measurement of effectiveness of the audit and payment processes
• Management of the freight audit program’s central funding agent in Cluj, ensuring timely payments to 3rd party provider as directed by Emerson, and proper allocation and receipt of all expenses for business units as part of the monthly freight expense reconciliation activities.
• Management of the internal and external third party(s) to meet the described objectives.
• Reporting to senior management of performance and escalation of critical issues.

Descrierea companiei

Emerson is a global leader in bringing technology and engineering together to provide innovative solutions for customers in industrial, commercial, and consumer markets around the world. Founded in 1890 in St. Louis, Missouri (USA), Emerson delivers solutions through five business segments: Process Management, Industrial Automation, Network Power, Climate Technologies, and Commercial & Residential Solutions. With sales of $24.7B and more than 130,000 employees in over 150 countries, we have a customer-focused, results-driven culture where employee performance is recognized and rewarded.

Visit us at: www.emerson.com
title: AUDIT PAY PROJECT LEAD
locations: Strada Emerson, Cluj-Napoca, Județul Cluj, România

body:
“Made by Bosch” stands for exceptional quality of a global player. We invest in the future by steering a consistently profitable course. With your commitment, you can also help protect the long-term success of the Bosch organization.
As market leader, the Automotive Electronics Division offers innovative electronic systems, photo voltaic inverters, control units, sensors and semiconductors. Be part of our new and innovative Bosch team in Cluj.

Your responsibilities:

•	Daily operation and maintenance for medium and low voltage systems and equipment (e.g. power cells, transformers, medium and low voltage distribution systems, general power and lighting, data wiring,  access  control wiring, fire protection etc.)
•	Planning and completion monitoring of  tasks related to preventive maintenance of electrical systems

body: Ericsson Overview Ericsson is a world-leading provider of telecommunications equipment and services to mobile and fixed network operators. Over 1,000 networks in more than 180 countries use Ericsson equipment, and more than 40 percent of the world's mobile traffic passes through Ericsson networks. Using innovation to empower people, business and society, we are working towards the Networked Society, in which everything that can benefit from a connection will have one. At Ericsson, we apply our innovation to market-based solutions that empower people and society to help shape a more sustainable world.We are truly a global company, working across borders in 175 countries, offering a diverse, performance-driven culture and an innovative and engaging environment where employees enhance their potential everyday. Our employees live our vision, core values and guiding principles. They share a passion to win and a high responsiveness to customer needs that in turn makes us a desirable partner to our clients. To ensure professional growth, Ericsson offers a stimulating work experience, continuous learning and growth opportunities that allow you to acquire the knowledge and skills necessary to reach your career goals.Job Summary This Job Role is responsible for the coordination, management and execution of proactive and reactive maintenance activities that require a higher level of support that the one offered by the 1st Level Operations. This shall ensure that the services provided to customers are continuously available and performing to Service Level Agreement (SLA) performance levels.Responsibilities & Tasks • 2nd Level Assurance Support Activities • 2nd Level Incident Management Position Qualifications• In depth knowledge of operation and troubleshooting of routers, switches, firewalls, proxy servers, VPN concentrators, traffic analyzers• In depth knowledge of operation and troubleshooting of switching and routing protocols• Experience with equipment manufactured by Cisco, Huawei, Redback, Juniper, Extreme, Nokia and others• Good communication skills. • Ability to work independently and in a team environment • Ability to work under strong pressure related to scale of business impact • Bachelor/Master of science in Electrical Engineering, Computer Information Systems, or equivalent with minimum of 3 to 5 years of work experience.• Cisco/Juniper certifications is a plus Required Skills• Excellent communication skills in both English and Romanian, ability to interact with customers and internal stakeholders, and provide technical solutions.• Solid understanding of service provider networks, internet network architecture and routing products.• Understanding of Routing Protocols like BGP, OSPF, ISIS. • Good experience with the following solutions under MPLS protocol (Layer 3 VPN and Layer 2 VPN/VPLS) is a must.• Cisco (CCNP , CCNP SP (old CCIP certification)) /Juniper (JNCIA , JNCIP-SP) certifications is a plus• Understanding of Broad-band Remote Access Protocols like PPP, DHCP, AAA, RADIUS and Mobile Networks like GGSN/SGSN/LTE, CPG is a plus.• Good knowledge of Ericsson SE and Huawei NE40 architecture and platform is a plus.• Should have excellent network and routing product debugging skills. • Should have ability to provide rapid root-cause analysis and solution for various customer IP related issues.• Scripting skills in Perl and/or Expect is a definitely plus. • Presentation & Communication Skills. Knowledge sharing. Working with People • Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or related discipline required.

body:
Veeam's Global Campaigns and Digital Marketing team is now hiring. We are utilizing innovative digital and offline marketing techniques for engagement creation, contextual marketing and lifecycle marketing to connect with our audience in 70+ countries.

At Veeam we are selling 100% with and through channel partners and we are empowering our partners with multichannel campaigns and the necessary marketing infrastructure.

Language Required: English

Responsibilities

The Senior Manager Global Partner Marketing Campaigns will be accountable for all partner marketing campaign creation and execution. The outcomes will be campaigns which target the right segments (SMB, midmarket, enterprise), communities (VMware, Hyper-V, NetApp, EMC, Cisco, HP) and audiences (persona we sell to) through the utilization of the most effective engagement engines (e-mail, display ads, social media, Google ads etc.).

In addition Veeam is empowering its partners through a partner marketing platform which supports the execution of the campaigns. This role will be responsible for creating and managing all campaign assets on the platform and driving channel partners to utilize, adopt and execute campaigns with those assets.

Success will be measured through the partner adoption of campaigns, the effectiveness of our campaigns and the ability to support broad demand generation creation. 
The specific set of KPIs will need to be developed for each campaign, including the impact on awareness, demand generation / leads, revenue and the utilization of campaign assets.

In order to be successful this person will need to collaborate with segment marketing, product marketing, field marketing and channel sales teams. 
While subject matter experts will support the bill of material creation, this person will also need to have the ability to create relevant partner marketing assets on their own.

Qualifications

Bachelor’s degree in marketing or equivalent, a Master’s degree preferred
Minimum of 6 to 8 years of (global) marketing experience in complex, technology based industries
Minimum of 3 years of proven experience in integrated campaign management with and through channel partners
Ability to produce theme based relevant partner campaign content for different media and channels through synthesizing information from various sources and through the inclusion of subject matter experts
Strong collaboration and management skills with the ability to work across many functions
Comfortable with executing yet capable of also influencing others for joint results
Exceptional English communication skills: must be able to articulate a clear, persuasive argument orally and in writing
Modern sales and marketing technology & tools understanding like the use of CRM systems, marketing automation systems, google analytics and techniques to create SEM, SEO, retargeting, banner, display advertisement and landing pages a plus
Experience in (campaign) budget management and in developing a set of (campaign) success criteria`s preferred

We offer

Modern, energetic working environment
Opportunities for professional growth and promotion
Competitive salary
title: SENIOR MANAGER,  GLOBAL PARTNER MARKETING CAMPAIGNS

body:
ContentSpeed, leading Romania's full service eCommerce agency is looking for new colleagues to join its team in Bucharest
You will have access to more than 10 years of high quality know-how in customized software development solutions used by world renown brands in the market.

Who we need::
• Very good knowledge of PHP and MySQL (Smarty Templates nice to have)
• Proven skills of XHTML / CSS / Javascript
• Previous experience in dealing with clients under tight deadlines
• Structured coding habits would represent a plus.
• Ability to adapt to a fast paced multicultural environment
• Capability of auto-structuring and organizing your own activity

What you will do:
• Analyze the workflows gaps and propose fixing solutions
• Implement various methods for different concrete eCommerce processes (payments, delivery)
• Integrate communication and functionalities between various applications (platform and crm, erp)
• Work on on-going developments of new modules
• Come up with ideas for new upgrades

What we offer:
• Flexible working hours 
• Well structured career plan and job promotions opportunities
 •Performance bonuses
• Income plan specifically tailored according to results, up to 1500euro/month
•Healthcare for you through private medical subscription
 • Fruit days
 • High quality support, training and help for rapid learning and skill development both in software development and eCommerce 
• Really nice work environment and adequate work/relaxing atmosphere

For applying to this position, please send us your resume at jobs@contentspeed.com

body: We are currently expanding our business worldwide and we invite you to join our elite team because AMOMA.com:•	Is one of the leading online reservations platforms;•	Inspires ambitious people to achieve professional greatness;•	Has a young and dynamic team of almost 300 colleagues from different countries working together in our office in Bucharest.Become part of our team and you’ll have:•	Motivating salary and stability (permanent work contract);•	Private medical insurance;•	Multicultural and fun environment with state of the art facilities;•	Discount for personal hotel reservations (because we LOVE to travel).Main role: To ensure the correlation between the legal and business framework, offering the necessary support to all employees to have a meaningful work, to be paid accordingly to their contribution and performance results, to offer professional development and involvement to the business history and success.The job holder will ensure necessary and updated legal labor documentation and proper registering of the working contracts and further addendums; facilitates disciplinary & grievance process; correlates the daily business needs to monthly planning of the employees, accurate processing and recording of monthly company`s payroll, participating in setting and implementation of employee satisfaction surveys, incentive schemes, internal communication process, helps in building the HR strategy.S/he will assure the right flow of information, use and support, apply all internal communication tools/policies and provides continuous improvement for our existing processes.A. Employment contract/ Personnel file•	Ensure the necessary legal labor documentation, signed by all parties and registered in due time, as per the law;•	Ensure individual employee’s personnel file, always updated with latest changes;•	Ensure employee database correct and updated registration;•	Ensures that internal house rules is updated with latest business needs and facilitates the disciplinary & grievance process as per the law, if necessary;•	Complies and always updated with latest law requirements and conditions of: Employment contract, Internal Regulations, norms, standards, and specific laws, etc.;•	Archive of personnel documents, prepare necessary reports.B. Planning and Payroll process•	Collects the necessary daily business needs in terms of employees, proposing the monthly planning;•	Prepare and register the necessary internal transfers, change of job titles, level of salaries, etc;•	Prepares and ensures primary necessary data and documents for the monthly payroll process, as per internal procedures;•	Cooperates with the external accounting company offering the necessary support for completing the payroll process, as per labor and fiscal law requirements;•	Distributes pay slips and other salary related documents, offering explanation about the individual monthly payroll processes to all employees, if needed;•	Participates in setting and implementing of the incentive schemes;•	Permanent information and updated on legislative changes in the labor legislation and payroll, ensuring those changes impacting the business are distributed to the concerned people inside the organization.C.  Employee engagement•	Participates in setting and conducting employee opinion surveys, as well as correlating the results on business;•	Propose and implements rewards and recognition schemes;•	Participates in implementing the company’s performance management process, as per internal procedure;•	Involved in issuing and applying of the Human Resources internal policies regarding communication within the company;•	Refine core messaging to ensure organizational consistency in all aspects of communication, including monthly newsletter;•	Assist the HR Manager in setting the HR strategy, cooperates with all colleagues from HR team and the rest of the company team as well.Main requirementsTechnical skills/experience background•	Minimum of 2 years hands-on administrative and payroll experience;•	University degree, certification in labour legislation - human resources inspector; any supplementary studies in human resources area would represent a plus;•	Very good knowledge of English language, spoken and writing, is mandatory (a second language is an advantage);•	Computer literate: MS Office and Internet.Competencies:•	Dynamic, driven to deliver;•	Enthusiastic, positive an diplomatic attitude, collaborative;•	Very good planning and organizational skills;•	Very good analyzing and problem solving skills;•	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills;•	Able to maintain absolute discretion regarding confidential and or sensitive information;•	Integer;•	Self motivation and function comfortably in an environment that requires ability to work multi-task and unsupervised;•	Persuasive and ambitious;•	Able to fit in and work as part of a team;•	Personally credible, instilling trust;•	Flexible and able to adapt to change in a fast paced work environment, ability to work under stress.

body:
GE Grid Solutions is looking for a C++ Software Development Engineer to join our team in Bucharest!

Project context:

Electricity markets – critical IT systems – trading platform – near real-time applications.

If you enjoy challenging though problems, delivering thoughtful solutions and learning every single day, you may be a good candidate to join our team.

Desired Skills and Experience:

•  JEE – 3+ years – mandatory
•  Object oriented design: UML, design patterns 
•  Advanced programming: Design patterns, secure code, high performance code, object relational  mapping (e.g. Hibernate), Java collections (complexity, stability) 
•  Advanced software architecture knowledge: Multi-tier architect, service oriented, JMS, multi-threading, redundancy, security, high-performance implementation, resilience, caching
•  Web: AJAX, GWT, Spring (Core, Security, Batch, Integration) 
•  Application servers: JBoss, Weblogic, Apache, IIS 
•  Others: SVN, XML parsers libraries (e.g. JAXB), Web Services (SOAP, CXF), software management tools (e.g. JIRA, Team City, Jenkins) 
•   OS : Windows, Linux RedHat 
•  .Net knowledge is a plus
•  English – fluent (both oral and written) - Mandatory
title: J2EE Developer

body:
Studio 20 este unul dintre cele mai apreciate si respectate studiouri la nivel mondial. Calitatea muncii noastre a fost rasplatita cu mai multe premii internationale dintre care amintim cele mai recente:
- Best Live Cam Studio (YNOT Awards, Praga, septembrie 2015)
- Best Emerging Studio (AW Awards, Mamaia, iunie 2015)
- Studio of The Year 2015 si 2016 (GFY Awards, Las Vegas, ianuarie 2015 si din nou in ianuarie 2016). 
Activitatea noastra a fost prezentata de presa de business din Romania, cu cifre reale, ca un exemplu de profesionalism si experienta in acest domeniu. Modele faimoase precum Devious Angel, Emma Wild, Raquelle Diva, Sasha Red sau Zeya Brunette au primit de asemnea premii internationale la Barcelona, Praga si Las Vegas, dovedind ca stim si putem sa crestem modele de succes, care castiga peste 10.000$ lunar.
Dincolo de premii, suntem o echipa extrem de simpatica si atenta, un loc de munca placut, de care te vei atasa. Lucram 100% legal si avem peste 15 ani de experienta in Romania (am inceput in anul 2001). Cele mai mari situri din lume ne mentioneaza oficial ca parteneri preferati si sunt alaturi de modelele care lucreaza la noi pentru a le ajuta sa reuseasca.
Lucram intr-o atmosfera serioasa dar relaxata, oferim ajutor cu machiajul, haine, training, cursuri gratuite de limba engleza, tot ce iti trebuie pentru a face cat mai multi bani. Programul de lucru este flexibil, excelent pentru studente, dar si pentru absolvente. Oferim training si suport pentru primele 2-3 luni si chiat mai mult, salariu, bonusuri si avansuri cand ai nevoie, conditii excelente de lucru, tehnice si estetice. Suntem o firma serioasa, care punem accent pe seriozitate si profesionalism, avand rezultate excelente pentru colegele care isi doresc un job serios, sunt ambitioase si vor sa reuseasca. 
Activitatea de live cam model, model online sau hostess online consta in discutii prin chat text, audio si video, in limba engleza, cu persoane majoritar de sex masculin din Statele Unite ale Americii. Studio 20 este 100% feminin, pentru a asigura un mediu de lucru relaxat si constructiv. 
In acest moment avem deschise in Bucuresti 2 studiouri, primul langa Gara de Nord si al doilea in Piata Victoriei, cel mai mare studio din Romania ca suprafata ocupata, dotat cu echipamente de ultima generatie, camere cu design variat, spatii de relaxare si make-up, dupa cum puteti vedea aici http://www.studio-20.ro/locatii/studio-videochat-bucuresti-victoriei.html si in Cluj-Napoca primul studio profesional din zona: http://www.studio-20.ro/locatii/studio-cluj-napoca.html
Pe 15 februarie vom lansa si studioul din Timisoara.

Cerinte pentru angajare: Seriozitate, varsta 18-35 de ani, limba engleza scris si vorbit de la mediu in sus, placerea de a comunica cu oamenii si mai ales ambitie. 
Oferta (bonusuri, beneficii):
- Venitul mediu este de 2.500$ lunar, dar poti castiga si de 3-4 ori mai mult, depinde numai de ambitia ta, spre deosebire de alte studiouri noi nu promitem, noi te invitam sa stai de vorba cu modelele care deja castiga acesti bani alaturi de noi,

- Contract legal, toate platile sunt pe acte (nu lucram absolut deloc la negru sau la gri);
- Mediu de lucru placut, bazat pe RESPECT si AJUTOR reciproc;
- Ajutor la cazare in Bucuresti sau Cluj pentru modelele care se muta din alte orase;
- Corectitudine si sinceritate, atat de rare in mediul de afaceri din Romania si totusi atat de importante pentru o colaborare pe termen lung.
Intra pe pe www.studio-20.ro pentru mai multe informatii sau vino in vizita sa ne cunoastem, fie ca vrei un job de hostess / model / operator / PR  sau un job in echipa de suport: asistenta, call center, traducator, secretara, manager, trainer, suport, vanzari, HR, call-center, operator pc, traducator engleza, assistent manager, social media, marketing, online marketing, copywriter, etc.  Interviu Online:1.  Intre ce ore doriti sa fiti contactata pentru stabilirea unui interviu?2.  De ce ati ales Studio 20?
title: HOSTESS MODEL PR ONLINE Bucuresti,  Cluj - 2.500$

body:
About the Role: 

Amber is looking for the type of person who likes to go beyond job requirements and who's good at coordinating office operations and implement procedures that ensure organizational effectiveness, efficiency and safety.


As a Facility Coordinator your focus will be on:

•	Performing facility activities including coordinating general maintenance, repairs and housekeeping
•	Acting as primary liaison for building maintenance issues
•	Coordinating supply needs for all employees
•	Overseeing new hire process is followed and new hires have the appropriate equipment, furniture, and supplies on their first day of work
•	Coordinating office and workstation moves and adjustments with IT, department manager and employee
•	Managing building maintenance daily operation
•	Cost control, resource management and planning for building management related issues
•	Vendor management 
•	Assist in procurement of spares, consumables and building management related services
•	Managing projects concerning rearrangements of office space in accordance with business need
•	Booking transport and accommodation
•	Managing office budgets
•	Ensuring that health and safety policies are up to date
•	Serve as the point person for maintenance, mailing, shopping, supplies, equipment, bills and errands
•	Partner with HR to maintain office policies as necessary
•	Organizing office operations and procedures
•	Managing relationships with vendors, service providers and landlord
•	Managing contract and price negotiations with office vendors, service providers and office lease
•	Managing office budget, ensure accurate and timely reporting


Desired Skills and Experience


•	Proven office management, administrative or assistant experience
•	Knowledge of office management systems and procedures
•	Excellent time management skills and ability to multi-task and prioritise work
•	Attention to detail and problem solving skills
•	Excellent written and verbal communication skills
•	Strong organisational and planning skills
•	Proficiency in MS Office

Our Offer

•	A job where every day is different and you will develop your skills and potential
•	An attractive salary along with meal tickets
•	Medical Services Package
•	Professional and friendly working environment
title: Facility Coordinator
locations: Str. Copilului Nr. 22 Sector 1, București, Municipiul București, România

body:
Candidatul ideal

Cerinte obligatorii:
Permis de conducere categoria C + E, card tahograf și teste medicale și psihologice curente
Comunicare cunoștințele de limba engleză pentru a permite o conversație cu o persoană vorbitor de limba engleză. 
Experiența minim 1 an în transportul internațional, susținute de recomandari sau certificate de angajare. 
Abilitatea de a lucra sub presiunea timpului, diligență și responsabilitate.

Descrierea jobului

Locurile de munca sunt disponibile pe tot teritoriul Angliei, iar detaliile cu privire la locația curentă vi se va transmite în timpul procesului de recrutare, care, pentru comoditatea dumnevoastra, se poate face si la distanță (on-line).
Ne asiguram tot timpul ca soferii nostrii:
Sa lucreze pentru companii cu branduri de renume,
Primeasca asistență în completarea formalităților necesare pentru a lucra în Anglia,
Formare profesională pentru muncă și cazare gratuită pe durata executării acestuia,
Salariu atractiv, în intervalul £ 9 - £ 16 pe ora in functie de forma de angajare, precum și schimburile plătite la timp.
Beneficii oferite pentru angajați:
Intoarcerea zilnica la reședința după finalizarea programului de munca, 
Oferta de muncă temporară. Posibilitatea de locuri de muncă permanente direct la client, după finalizarea cu succes a formării.
Cerințele noastre pentru candidati sunt simple și transparente.

Candidații interesați vă rugăm să trimiteți CV-ul pe adresa de email romania@transline.co.uk sau sa aplicati la acest anunt.
Puteți vizita, de asemenea, biroul nostru de la Brasov, situat in strada Mihail Kogalniceanu, nr 17, etaj 9, Cladirea C4, cod postal 500090.

body:
In Creditexpress departamentul Call Center este responsabil pentru colectarea eficienta a creantelor clientilor nostri, prin contactarea telefonica a debitorilor (persoane fizice si juridice).
Suntem in cautarea unor candidati ambitiosi, care isi doresc sa lucreze intr-o companie in care sa isi puna in valoare abilitatile de comunicare, negociere si persuasiune si in care performantele individuale sunt apreciate si rasplatite pe masura.

PROFILUL CANDIDATULUI IDEAL:
 Experienta anterioara de lucru in Call Center sau Servicii Clientii reprezinta un avantaj important
 Abilitati foarte bune de comunicare si negociere, orientare catre rezultat
 Perseverenta, autocontrol, rabdare, capacitate de invatare rapida
 Abilitati bune de lucru cu calculatorul
 Disponibilitate de a lucra in ture

RESPONSABILITATI:
 Colectarea debitelor restante de la persoane fizice si juridice pentru clientii Creditexpress, la standarde etice si profesionale inalte
 Gestionarea apelurilor de la si catre debitori, negocierea telefonica cu acestia a termenilor si conditiilor de plata
 Primirea, inregistrarea si gestionarea solicitarilor si plangerilor din partea debitorilor
 Prelucrarea tuturor cazurilor cu seriozitate si acuratete, respectand standardele de calitate
 Oferirea de feedback continuu superiorilor privind orice problema aparuta in procesul de colectare

OFERTA NOASTRA:
 Program de lucru: 6 ore/zi, in ture in intervalul 08.00-14.00/ 14.00-20.00
 Sistem de salarizare si bonusare competitiv si atractiv
 Posibilitate de dezvoltare profesionala intr-o companie internationala in continua crestere
 Participare la programe de formare profesionala, in acord cu politica interna a companiei
 Conditii de lucru excelente

Noi te vom pregati si iti vom arata cu rabdare tot ce e nevoie sa inveti. Daca poti:• Sa vorbesti in Spaniola fluent• Sa comunici prin telefon intr-un mod eficient si adaptat la fiecare client in parte • Sa stii sa folosesti un calculator: MS office si internet• Sa poti sa lucrezi atat singur cat si in echipa• Sa privești proiectele ca pe o provocare și o oportunitate de dezvoltare• Sa te descurci in limba EnglezaSi in plus daca ai mai si lucrat pe un job similar-un avantaj, dar nu un criteriu obligatoriu- asteptam cu nerabdare sa ne cunoastem! body: Ericsson Overview:Ericsson is a world-leading provider of telecommunications equipment & services to mobile & fixed network operators. Over 1,000 networks in more than 180 countries use Ericsson equipment, & more than 40 percent of the world's mobile traffic passes through Ericsson networks. Using innovation to empower people, business & society, we are working towards the Networked Society, in which everything that can benefit from a connection will have one. At Ericsson, we apply our innovation to market-based solutions that empower people & society to help shape a more sustainable world.We are truly a global company, working across borders in 175 countries, offering a diverse, performance-driven culture & an innovative & engaging environment where employees enhance their potential every day. Our employees live our vision, core values & guiding principles. They share a passion to win & a high responsiveness to customer needs that in turn makes us a desirable partner to our clients. To ensure professional growth, Ericsson offers a stimulating work experience, continuous learning & growth opportunities that allow you to acquire the knowledge & skills necessary to reach your career goals.Description: The role of the Supplier Performance Analyst is to plan, execute and conclude Supplier Relationship Management (SRM) events in cooperation with Ericsson Sourcing Managers and /or Supplier Responsible Managers and their targeted suppliers. These events are supplier performance evaluations (SPE) and requests for information (RFI). Successful candidates will be responsible for:Creating in the online system various SRM specific events (different types of evaluations across different geographies), propose timeline and confirm with the Driver. Liaise with suppliers during the event from inviting them to participate to training them on how to use the online system. Clarify for the suppliers the objectives of the evaluation project. Escalate no response from suppliers/stakeholders on RFIs & SPEs. Providing updates to the Sourcing Managers and /or Supplier Responsible Managers on the progress of the evaluation. Analyzing and summarizing data from the online system at the closure of the evaluation and build a report for the Sourcing Managers and /or Supplier Responsible Managers to make a decision in terms of suppliers’ selection and governance. Upload Supplier Status and Risk Cards /Supplier Performance Cards/Minutes of Meetings to Supplier Information Portal (SIP). Activities/Duties:Secures evaluation phases (plan, create, monitor and analyze of each event) happen as per expected timelines and service levels; Escalates issues and concerns related to evaluations success to Sourcing Managers and /or Supplier Responsible Managers;  Manages suppliers complains to mutual benefit; if needed, escalates to Sourcing Managers and /or Supplier Responsible Managers, SRM Driver, Team Leader etc.; Analyze evaluations outcomes and provide recommendations for supplier selection; Serve as the liaison to the Sourcing Managers and /or Supplier Responsible Managers as well as Suppliers; Collaborate with internal teams to ensure sourcing project objectives are met. Skills:Negotiation and Communication skills (background: vendor management, customer service); Strong written and oral communication skills are essential, as presenting findings and supporting service delivery is an important part of the job; Accuracy and attention to details; Ability to work effectively in teams as well as independently, within tight deadlines; Advanced Excel and medium PowerPoint skills; 2+ years’ experience in customer and/or supplier facing roles;  be able to interact with the 3rd parties (e-mails, phone calls) independently;  be able to handle a request end-to-end (from receiving the request to closure of the evaluation).
title: Supplier Performance Analyst
locations: West Gate Park, București, Municipiul București, România

body:
High demanding assistant manager position in the Romanian branch of the largest American videochat company. This job involves following the administrative procedures of the company as well as constant learning and improving of personal skills. 
We are looking for a person who wishes to progress. 
This job involves actively participating in the managing, supervising and training a staff of up to 400 models. Needless to say that the perfect candidate understands that videochat is a solid business and that we expect the highest ethical and professional standards both in dealing with the models and with the outside contractors and/or suppliers.

Cerinte:
- English both spoken and written fluently. 
- Positive attitude focused on problem-solving instead of on the problem itself.
- Multitasking, communication skills, intuition, ability to get a certain desired message across to any type of individual
- Leadership skills, organized, open-minded, emphatic, ambitious, responsible, reliable.
- Availability all weekdays, and all shifts (morning, evening, night).

This position represents a great opportunity to learn and be a part of an American management structure. We are focused on constant optimization and improvement both of the workplace and of the personnel. We understand that the employees make a company what it is, so we take special care in selecting them.

In order to maintain a stress-free work environment for our models, we have a female-only staff, therefore we are looking exclusively for female applicants.  Interviu Online:1.  If a news television would like to present our company in a show, would you have any problem in being included in this material and talking about the business in an interview?2.  If your best friend told you that she wanted to become a videochat model and wanted your advice, what would you tell her?3.  How do you define the perfect job?4.  Do you consider that the fact that you were born in Romania and not someplace else is a disadvantage for achieving your desired career? Please explain your answer.5.  If one of the models that you manage would have a negative attitude and would constantly complain to other models and to you about the poor response of her activity in terms of earnings, what would be your reaction?

body: Ideal Candidate: Are you a passionate developer of web sites or mobile applications? Tired of the small web sites and wanting to work on big projects alongside a great team? Are you looking to master the art of code writing? Then you might be a good fit for working at Clarisoft :-) What are we looking for?• Software developers for web sites (mostly PHP or ASP.NET) or for mobile (iOS or Android) that enjoy challenges, ask questions and pay attention to details, learn new things or technologies and apply them creatively to solve the problems at hand.• Do you know other languages but want to learn something new? Are you at the start of your career and highly motivated? You can still apply.• We hire for attitude and train for skills.• And if you are at or finished an IT university you are lucky in-deed: you do not need a mandatory experience, you will be like in kindergarten taking care of you and doing what you want and you are also being paid to do it.Knowledge some of the following is a plus:• jQuery, AJAX• MySQL, MS-SQL• JSON/XML handling, communications with web services (HTTP, SOAP, REST)Your responsibilities:• Include everything related to code: write it, debug it, test it before sent it to QA.• We like you to challenge us, think of better solutions or designs, and tell us how can we improve our environment, participate in multiple projects, share your knowledge with the others, and be an excellent team player.Company details:• A team of 70 people in USA and Romania that like to build great software platforms• We enjoyed tremendous success and growth in recent years. MIT, NASA, and some of the biggest companies in the world used the software we created. We want to keep this going and need your help for it.• Centrally located offices at Victoriei Square, flexible hours, creative environment, soccer & beer nights, team-building on your birthday, budget allowances for things you want to learn, unexpected bonuses … and you might have some ideas too.• We already hired over 20 people in the last 6 months, we are growing each day and being one of us from the beginning gives you the opportunity to learn and even become a team lead.• You can benefit from the tax incentive (no income tax) offered by the Romanian government.• Opportunity to learn emerging technologies.• We value the team concept and foster an environment where people can grow together. If you have other people in mind that fit the profile, just send them the link to apply. We might hire your friends too and give you a nice bonus! Here are some cool things you can read about us http://www.clarisoft.com

body: Job purpose:The IT Technical Support Specialist works closely and collaboratively with various internal stakeholder groups including the HR, Training,  IT Teams and LMS vendors in order to support the implementation and day-to-day operations/administration of the new Learning Management System (LMS). He/she assists LMS end users, backend administrators, instructional designers / course developers and HR / L&D management with content set up and loading, system monitoring, maintenance and troubleshooting, reporting and training. This role will also be focused on creating and publishing to the LMS online learning content utilizing e-learning authoring tools and technologies.Job Description:•	Manages learning content in all Learning Management Systems (LMS) that education team uses•	Proactively monitors LMS for technical issues•	Provides Tier-2 (main contact point on technical issues for Tier-1 support, and other internal teams when needed) technical support (adjusting settings, , escalation to platform’s vendor; investigate and seek solutions to complex issues, refer to Level 3 as necessary; and perform diagnostic testing, and the utilization of remote control tools)•	Develops “how to” procedures and fixes bugs in LMS in urgent cases•	Proactively manages knowledge base of feedback, issues and feature requests•	Writes specifications and test cases for the new features in LMS according to department’s business needs•	Give individual or group instruction to users or make arrangements for instruction of software or systems.•	Configure software, and provide technical assistance. Assist in software needs and upgrades•	Track escalated user problems and inform the user of the status. Log all client problems and solutions.Technical Skills:•	1+ years of PHP, JavaScript, CSS and HTML development experience (.NET is a strong advantage)•	Strong technical proficiency and the ability to learn complex systems quicklyExperience and education:•	Fluency in English and French is required, Polish is a plus•	Bachelor’s Degree in Technology or Computer Science (Politehnica, ASE Cybernetics etc.)•	3+ years of Support, Testing or similar experience, which includes writing specifications and managing external development•	Able to install and maintain web servers and application servers•	Good understanding of web based systems, •	Knowledge of monitoring tools (deploy and use): Nagios, Cacti, HPOV, Universe, NetBackup, BMC products•	Basic understanding of multiple operating systems such as AIX, Linux, and Windows.•	Knowledge of Web and application servers: Tomcat, Apache, Websphere, Weblogic, Jonas, etc.•	Strong organization skills with the ability to manage many projects simultaneously•	Excellent organizational, written, and verbal communication skills•	Ability to perform comfortably in a fast-paced, deadline-oriented work environment•	Ability to work as a team member, as well as independently•	Experience in a quality assurance role, preferably in a contact center or customer service environment•	Ability to conduct and manage project reviews and communicate process improvement recommendations.Thank you for applying!
title: IT Technical (LMS) Support Specialist with French
locations: Bulevardul Lascar Catargiu Nr.51-53 sector 1, București, Municipiul București, România

LUXOFT Holding, Inc (NYSE:LXFT US) is a leading provider of software development services and innovative IT solutions to a global client base consisting primarily of large multinational corporations. body:
Procter & Gamble is a highly successful global company that manufactures leading brands including Pantene, Head&Shoulders, Pampers, Always, Ariel, Gillette, and many others, with the vision of touching and improving consumer’s lives across the globe.
Product Supply Manufacturing is responsible for every aspect of product making and is recognized as an industry leader.  Manufacturing has far-reaching responsibilities which cover reliability, quality, safety of our equipment/ processes and the motivation of the people working in the plant.

Your responsibilities can range from production process analyzing and optimization or implementation of new equipment/product upgrades, to working with global teams to develop and maintain the latest technology, to building cross function understanding between manufacturing and brand teams – and much more. In the plant and with our principle of job rotation you can develop your abilities and career with focus on people responsibility or technical / project responsibility.

We currently have vacancies in our Urlati plant. We are looking to recruit top university graduates in electrical, mechanical, manufacturing, automation and chemical engineering.  In addition to technical excellence we also look for individuals who show leadership potential and embrace change, and who can demonstrate working effectively as a part of a team to deliver high quality results. As a P&G employee, your professional and personal development will take place in an environment where people care about your progress and performance, regularly review that performance, and work with you to identify your individual career needs.

We are looking for recent university graduates who have already completed their university studies.

Procter & Gamble offer a competitive salary and benefits package (+relocation).

Qualifications:
P&G looks for top candidates in electrical, mechanical, Information technology, automation, chemical and process engineering. In addition to technical excellence we also search for skills like communication, initiative, leadership and the ability to work effectively with others, creativity, innovation and good knowledge of the English language. Beside this, no experience is required.

Your challenge: Making a world class product!

We are recruiting under a global standard process which happens on our Career Website: www.balkans.experiencepg.com

Our Recruiting Process:
1. Apply On-line on the next address: https://pg.taleo.net/careersection/10000/jobdetail.ftl?job=EUR00000204
2. Complete the On-line Assessment
3. Reasoning Test at the Office
4. Last step- 3 Interviews

Europe Recruiting Team wishes you Good Luck!

body: Wipro WT is a trendsetter and leader in the Outsourcing space. We invite passionate, energetic, creative and focused individuals who want to be a part of our growth story! Wipro WT is the best option you can find to develop your expertise in the industry. You will get immense opportunities to learn from our focused approach towards delivering long-term benefits and measurable value to our customers through: Business Domain KnowledgeIntegrating TechnologyProcess ExcellenceAt Wipro, you will get a solid understanding about the best way to service the customer requirements by leveraging Quality, Innovation, self-sustaining Process Framework, IT expertise and Domain knowledge. With the best people talent, we offer customized service offerings, translating into the most flexible and cost effective services of the highest quality. You will get the opportunity to be a part of a very capable and energetic team of over 24,000 colleagues, operating out of more than 25 delivery locations across the globe. This team from Wipro BPS has been a valued partner to all our customers in achieving their business goals. A wide range of industry options are available since we services customers in various industries including Banking & Capital Markets, Insurance, Travel & Hospitality, Retail & Consumer Products, Energy and Utility, Technology, Manufacturing, Telecom & Healthcare sectors. We have built deep expertise in Processes like Finance & Accounting, Procurement, Marketing, Legal, HR Services, Tech Support, Customer Services and Analytics. Follow us on Facebook @ www.facebook.com/WiproRomaniaService Desk Admin L1Profile:- Fluent communication skills in English and one of the following: Arabic/ Turkish/ Greek- Previous Helpdesk (Voice Support) experience is to be preferred.- Excellent telephone manner.- Experience of using call logging software.- Knowledge of Microsoft based operating systems with emphasis on Windows X- Experience with using and troubleshooting Outlook within a network environment (permissions, calendar sharing, delegation)- Experience with using and troubleshooting Microsoft Office with emphasis on MS Word, MS Excel and MS PowerPoint.- Basic understanding of PC hardware set-up and configuration.- MCP certification would be desirable- Should have worked as a Customer Support Engineer / Technical Support Executive / System or Network Administrator & acquired hands-on experience in the above areas in large & complex setups- Should have good understanding of infrastructure management processes; Understanding of ITIL framework is needed- Good communication (written & oral), presentation skills, quick learner, self-initiated, team player, willing to travel, open to work in shiftsRole and responsibilities:- To provide 1st line/2nd line technical support; answering support queries via phone, email, Chat and Web- To maintain a high degree of customer service for all support queries and adhere to all service management principles.- To take ownership of user problems and be proactive when dealing with user issues.- Logging / verifying customer details- Identifying the issue and categorizing / prioritize the incident- Creating a ticket in CRM tool- Referring KB for workaround / resolution and attempting resolution- Strong interpersonal skills are a prerequisite.- Ability to work effectively in a dispersed team and individually.- Ticket re-assignment to L2 if ticket unresolved by L1 (where ever applicable)- Ticket reassignment to PRG's if ticket unresolved by L1 (where ever applicable)- Routing / Chasing of tickets with other PRG's- Recording trend of calls and identifying outages proactively- Callbacks for customer not reachable cases & customer request- Identifying the trend of calls / tickets and highlighting it to L2 / TL as applicable for outage confirmation (where ever applicable)- Creating child tickets and tagging them with problem ticket- Callback the user and confirm resolution (where ever applicable)Foreign languages skills:- Advanced English language skills, both written and spoken and- Fluent communication and writing skills in Arabic/ Turkish/ GreekBenefits:- Opportunity to work in a young and dynamic environment;- Attractive benefits package;- Lunch tickets- Fitness deduction- Health insurance and dental scheme;- Opportunity to develop and learn constantly- Access to internal training (job related and soft skills training)

body: Why join us? Because you, as a Store Manager, can be the best you can be, everyday.In JYSK, we believe that good sales & service builds on strong personal values. Therefore, our Store Managers always strive to be great tradesmen and good colleagues. Through your team, you always look for ways to improve store turnover, daily operations and staff performance and development. What can you expect to be doing, day to day?•Having the full responsibility of your store, you will maximize sales & service.•Going in front and getting the best out of your team, you will learn new things about leadership, retail and yourself.•Dealing with operational issues like planning, prioritizing and follow up on staff performance.•Ensuring that you and your team stick to the JYSK concept to ensure a consistent flow of goods and competent, helpful and available staff.•Being a consistent role model for our values: tradesman, colleague and corporate spirit.•Assisting your team in all kind of other tasks like goods receiving, organizing stock room, filling shelves and ordering articles.How can you make a difference, every day?•You like rolling up your sleeves to get things done•You are passionate about optimizing sales through great customer service•You create results through overview, pro-activeness and decisiveness.•You spot and use the full potential of your team, and communicate easily with your your colleagues as well as your customers.•You are efficient in planning, prioritizing and following up on budgets, goals and costs•You see things in a broad perspective, but still have an eye for detail.•You nave worked in retail with comparable management experienceCurious?Would you like to join a company that constantly trains and develops its employees at all levels, and offers attractive bonuses for good performance?A company that puts honor in developing its own managers?Then send you CV.Only the selected candidates will be contacted.

body: Do you have a demonstrated track record of outperforming sales targets in enterprise software sales? Are you persistent and aggressive in finding and closing on new deals? Do you love to work directly with clients? If you are able to combine a personable demeanor with a strong work ethic and an openness to being coached, and if you have a passion for customer success — then this is the role for you. Job DescriptionThe Portfolio Account Executive (PAE) is a critically important sales role at a dynamic and growing enterprise software company that is helping its customers transform the way they do business. As the German Portfolio Account Executive, you will connect our installed base of German Silver Accounts (representing our largest customer segment by revenue) to our innovative enterprise software solutions, enabling these customers to create transformative experiences for their end consumers.  Acting as the “owner” of 40 – 50 Silver Accounts in Germany, the PAE acts autonomously to achieve sales objectives within an entrepreneurial, meritocratic company environment that values and rewards performance and fosters meaningful professional growth. Aurea helps companies like Bank of America, Johnson & Johnson, Disney, British Airways, and IBM perform at higher levels by deploying best-in-class enterprise software solutions created from a growing stable of enterprise software products — growing through both core investment in innovation as well as through aggressive acquisition. Ignite delivers its work through a group of goal-oriented, self-starting individuals. The company's innovative, virtual, global work environment along with its aggressive growth through acquisition allow these associates to experience an extraordinary level of professional freedom, growth and development. Qualifications and Key Selection CriteriaSkills and experienceDemonstrated track record of outperforming sales targets in enterprise software sales as the 1 absolutely responsible sales person for building and closing the deal – so we’re searching for a sales account manager, not a business development or team manager 10 years of experience in sales, with recent experience in software sales, preferably in a fast-paced, dynamic, entrepreneurial environment where you are required to understand different software solutions and be able to do overview product presentations yourself without technical/Presales support Passion for working directly with clients — you’re the one who is responsible for winning or losing a deal Strong evidence of personal motivation and success, either in academic, athletic or other pursuits Ability to quickly form trust-based relationships and to expand upon these relationships Highly disciplined and able to work independently to achieve/exceed sales goals in a virtual company environment Experienced and knowledgeable in CRM and Customer Experience Experience working with integration technology Excellent English communication (written and oral) Bachelor’s degree from top university (technical degree a major plus)  Residence in Germany or Austria is a mustBehavioral characteristics  Impeccable customer focus and professionalism Highly motivated, high energy, “must-win” approach, combined with a passion for learning and professional growth Exceptional bandwidth and ability to strive in a dynamic, fast-paced environment Team player with strong skills in the areas of leadership, motivation, relationship building, and communications Coachable professional who values constructive feedback to attain alignment  The compensation plan for this role is $125,000 base + $125,000 commission. To qualify, please provide a resume/CV demonstrating the required experience and skills.  From there, to help us find the top 1% of talent, there will be an online skills examination and then a series of interviews, which help us truly evaluate your talent vs your peers. Are you up for the challenge?
title: Silver Portfolio Account Executive - $250, 000/year

body:
You will be part of a chosen few who will have the opportunity to work on some of the coolest projects on the market. We offer you the perfect work environment in which you will be valued for your true potential.  If you would like to grow in a stable company, you’ve found the right place.

Mandatory requirements:

•  you must know the basics of front-end web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
•  work experience with at least one of the following css frameworks:  bootstrap, foundation, purecss, skeleton
• basic understanding of less/sass preprocessing (grunt, gulp, compass)
• you must know how to build responsive design
• basic knowledge of Photoshop and converting PSD to HTML.

If you miss some of the requirements above, don’t worry. Take your time to study really hard and get back to us. We are always looking.

What things would take your name out of the crowd:

• SVG graphic animations
• C3js

Don’t worry, we don’t require all of the above. If you start working with us, this is one of the many career paths you can take.

You should know that …

We are part of the elite. There are a few places around the world where you would meet the technologies that we are using. Our work environment is custom tailored for your needs, and our colleagues are hand picked from the best of the best. Working with us will most probably change your life for the better. Still interested to apply?

A sneak preview of some of our benefits:

• Interesting and challenging projects

• Private medical insurance

• A whole lot of good times.

This is how we think your career path should look like:
See you soon!

body:
We are looking for:

Experienced Java Developers to join our growing team for one of Fortech’s main clients.

The client: 

Our Client is the corporate customer arm of a large telecom company from Germany, with offices in more than 20 countries and a global delivery capability. Using a global infrastructure of data centers and networks, they are operating information and communication technology (ICT) systems for multinational corporations and public sector institutions. Their offering includes application and infrastructure services and addressing the needs of companies from a wide range of industries – from the automotive industry to telecommunications, the financial sector, retail, services, media, energy and the manufacturing industry all the way to government agencies and the healthcare sector.

Required competencies:

Must: 
•	Java EE & SE
•	EJB
•	JPA 
•	JAX-WS
•	JAX-RS
•	JAXB
•	JSF
•	JTA, 
•	HTML/CSS/JavaScript
•	XML/XSLT/XSD
•	Ant

Nice to have:
•	Spring
•	IBM WebSphere
•	IBM MQ Server
•	IBM DB2
•	Hibernate

We value: 

•	Respect
•	Reliability
•	Strive for Excellence

Notes

•	Only candidates selected after the CV screening phase will be contacted.
•	The position is in Cluj-Napoca, but we also recruit non-Cluj residents willing to relocate

Fortech's Offer

At Fortech we enhance the value of each individual, encourage personal evolution and create an appropriate environment, in order to facilitate know-how transfer and to assure access to the cutting-edge technology.

Working @ Fortech:

•	Yearly training plan ~ designed to suit individual needs, comprising both hard and soft skills development and improvement
•	Career growth opportunities ~ working on international projects with global teams and working on-site at clients’ headquarters in Western Europe and the USA
•	Varying professional activities ~ job rotation, coaching and mentoring activities.
•	Company-sponsored technical certification program ~ Microsoft, Oracle, Sitecore, ISTQB
•	Supportive working environment ~ separate office rooms for up to 10-12 people
•	Company-sponsored events ~ parties, team-buildings and sporting activities and competitions (football, basketball, volleyball, tennis, ping-pong, marathons, biking)
•	Premium subscription to medical services at a private health center
•	Motivating recognition and rewarding salary package (our company policy is to exclude PFA contracts)
