body: Honeywell International is a $37 billion diversified technology and manufacturing global leader, with more than 120,000 employees in 100 countries around the world and has a demonstrated heritage of both innovation and achievement. For our strategic business group TS (Transportation Systems), we are searching for a Senior Finance Analyst to join the Romanian office in Bucharest! If you have:MBA/ University Finance degree Minimum 5 to 7 years financial experience with a large multinational company preferred and previous experience in financial planning in Analysis as a plus Strong finance background Strong Microsoft Excel & PowerPoint skills Ample knowledge of ERP Tools (e.g. SAP, Hyperion) Technical expertise in Finance Planning and Analysis: Income Statement, Balance Sheet and Cash Flow, Consolidation Excellent level of numeracy with high standard of personal integrity and decisiveness Strong problem solving and influencing skills Results driven approach Excellent written and communication skills Pro-active approach and the capability of working on own initiative The ability to synthesize information and proved senior leadership with necessary information to make a strategic decision then join us because you are the senior financial analyst we are searching for!The Senior Financial Analyst supports the global consolidation of TS forecasting process: Annual Operating Plan, 8+4, 5+7. Offers support for monthly closing reporting for TS globally. Responsible for all TS warranty related topics. Responsible for overseeing Worldwide Fixed Costs, for following up and challenging variances explanations Forecast / AOP (annual operating plan) vs. Baseline and Actuals vs. Forecast / AOP. The position also involves driving streamlining and standardization of FP&A (financial planning and analysis) processes in line with HOS (Honeywell operating system) deployment. It reports to Senior FP&A Finance Manager and requires working with Senior Finance Leadership & the Business Analysis & Planning Group in Morris Plains. As your main responsibilities, you will:Be the Leader of forecasting for all forecasts and AOP processes Support on Consolidation of Annual Operating Plan globally for HTT (Honeywell Turbo Technologies), and TS and submission to the HQ in Morris Plains Support Consolidation of forecasts (5+7, 8+4) Be responsible for accurate and timely corporate reporting Be the Leader of Fixed Costs risks and opportunities, responsible for consolidation of data and provision of quarterly estimates for forecasts Be responsible for monitoring and challenging Fixed Costs areas which exceed targets Be the main point of contact for provision of variance explanation versus AOP, latest forecast and previous year for Fixed Costs Be the leader of Closing Deck consolidation to present monthly results to TS Leadership Be the Leader of all TS warranty-related topics including calculation of warranty, provision of explanations for warranty worldwide, allocation per customer and quarterly corporate reporting ($10M yearly spent) Be the Leader to provide Worldwide Fixed costs variances on a monthly basis ($485M yearly spent) Be responsible for provision of month-end variances analysis for Asian and North America sites Team up with other TS Finance members to drive TS towards financial commitment presented in AOP, SRO, forecasts: fixed costs, warranty, free cash flow Maintain and provide extensive and comprehensive business analysis and reporting Be Daily engaged with the TS FP&A Director and Senior Managers to define financial commitments and drive the business towards those targets on FCF (free cash flow), Fixed Costs and Warranty Be daily engaged with the TS FP&A Senior Managers and Director to Lead Forecast / AOP Process and P&L analytics for Monthly Closing Be the Leader to provide AOP and monthly variances basis for Worldwide Fixed Costs ($485M) and warranty ($10M) Be driving streamlining and standardization of FP&A processes Have regular contacts with group to ensure any request at Corporate level on SBG (strategic business group) performance are answered Want to learn more? Visit:Our career website: www.careersathoneywell.comChannel: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CcMf_TFS0kAhttp://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tj8Jr2USl4M

body:
Studio 20 este unul dintre cele mai apreciate si respectate studiouri la nivel mondial. Calitatea muncii noastre a fost rasplatita cu mai multe premii internationale dintre care amintim cele mai recente:

Best Live Cam Studio (YNOT Awards, Praga, septembrie 2015)
Best Emerging Studio (AW Awards, Mamaia, iunie 2015)
Studio of The Year (GFY Awards, Las Vegas, ianuarie 2015 si al doilea an consecutiv in ianuarie 2016). 

Activitatea Studio 20 a fost prezentata de presa de business din Romania, cu cifre reale, ca un exemplu de profesionalism si experienta in acest domeniu. Modele faimoase precum Devious Angel, Emma Wild, Raquelle Diva, Sasha Red sau Zeya Brunette au primit de asemnea premii internationale la Barcelona, Praga si Las Vegas, dovedind ca stim si putem sa crestem modele de succes, care castiga peste 10.000$ lunar.

Dincolo de premii, suntem o echipa extrem de simpatica si atenta, un loc de munca placut, de care te vei atasa. Lucram 100% legal si avem peste 15 ani de experienta in Romania (am inceput in anul 2001). Cele mai mari situri din lume ne mentioneaza oficial ca parteneri preferati si sunt alaturi de modelele care lucreaza la noi pentru a le ajuta sa reuseasca.

Lucram intr-o atmosfera serioasa dar relaxata, oferim ajutor cu machiajul, haine, training, cursuri gratuite de limba engleza, tot ce iti trebuie pentru a face cat mai multi bani. Programul de lucru este flexibil, excelent pentru studente, dar si pentru absolvente. Oferim training si suport pentru primele 2-3 luni si chiat mai mult, salariu, bonusuri si avansuri cand ai nevoie, conditii excelente de lucru, tehnice si estetice. Suntem o firma serioasa, care punem accent pe seriozitate si profesionalism, avand rezultate excelente pentru colegele care isi doresc un job serios, sunt ambitioase si vor sa reuseasca. 

Activitatea de live cam model sau model online sau hostess online consta in discutii prin chat text, audio si video, in limba engleza, cu persoane majoritar de sex masculin din Statele Unite ale Americii. Studio 20 este 100% feminin, pentru a asigura un mediu de lucru relaxat si constructiv. 

In acest moment avem deschise in Bucuresti 2 studiouri, primul langa Gara de Nord si al doilea in Piata Victoriei, cel mai mare studio din Romania ca suprafata ocupata, dotat cu echipamente de ultima generatie, camere cu design variat, spatii de relaxare si make-up, dupa cum puteti vedea aici http://www.studio-20.ro/locatii/studio-videochat-bucuresti-victoriei.html si in Cluj-Napoca primul studio profesional din zona: http://www.studio-20.ro/locatii/studio-cluj-napoca.html (sunt in lucru studiourile din Timisoara, Medellin si Los Angeles).

Cerinte pentru angajare: Seriozitate, varsta 18-35 de ani, limba engleza scris si vorbit de la mediu in sus, placerea de a comunica cu oamenii si mai ales ambitie. 

Beneficii:
- Venitul mediu este de 2.500$ lunar, dar poti castiga si de 3-4 ori mai mult, depinde numai de ambitia ta;
Contract legal, toate platile sunt pe acte (nu lucram absolut deloc la negru sau la gri);
Mediu de lucru placut, bazat pe RESPECT si AJUTOR reciproc;
Ajutor la cazare in Bucuresti, Cluj sau Timisoara pentru modelele care se muta din alte orase;
Corectitudine si sinceritate, atat de rare in mediul de afaceri din Romania si totusi atat de importante pentru o colaborare pe termen lung.

Intra pe pe www.studio-20.ro pentru mai multe informatii sau vino in vizita sa ne cunoastem, fie ca vrei un job de hostess / model / operator / PR sau un job in echipa de suport: asistenta, call center, traducator, secretara, manager, trainer, suport, vanzari, HR, call-center, operator pc, traducator engleza, assistent manager, social media, hostes, videochat adult sau video-chat non-adult, marketing, online marketing, copywriter, etc.  Interviu Online:1.  Intre ce ore doriti sa fiti contactata pentru stabilirea unui interviu?2.  Ce va doriti de la acest job pe termen scurt (3-6 luni) si mediu (2-3 ani)?3.  De ce ati ales Studio 20?

body:
Job Description

Job Description:
	The Verification Engineer is required to work closely with Ceragon VLSI group in designing and developing chips, participating in emerging talented group. The job offers the opportunity to verify complex devices from initial stages of development and design over AISC or FPGA platforms. It also offers exposure to definition of silicon making methodologies from architecture towards release to production, working closely with a dynamic and motivated team. 

Verification Engineer responsibilities:

•	Develop verification Environment for various platforms – FPGA or ASIC. Implementing under top notch methodologies.  
•	Responsible for Various IPs (PHY, Networking IPs etc) and SOC Verification
•	Defining Test plans, coverage plans etc
•	Working closely with Ceragon system team ensuring correct implementation wrt the Ceragon FibAir products requirements

Job Requirements

The ideal candidate has the following:

Must:

•	Preferred university background – Automatics/Computers, Electrical Engineering
•	At least 3 years experience with Specman or System Verilog based verification ( specman is preferred )
•	In depth understanding of overall verification methodologies
•	Background in Networking IPs and SOC architecture
•	Understanding of verification and design practices

Advantage: 

•	Experience with RISC processors 
•	Experience with C coding
•	Verilog

We are looking for candidates capable of self-learning and working in a dynamic environment, with excellent communication skills and team player, capable of grasping an overall view of complex systems.
title: Verification Engineer
locations: 5 Gheorghe Manu Street Floor 2 and 4 District 1, București, Municipiul București, România

body: Java Software EngineeriRewind is looking for a software engineer with Java development experience.At iRewind, we are building a platform designed to let millions of people enjoy and share their personal videos. Our product relies on a scalable Java solution spanning multiple layers going from the automated generation of personalized videos to content delivery. We are using a complex stack bringing together many state-of-the art components from distributed databases to computer vision libraries.  Our new teammate should play a leading role in the development of our content delivery platform. We are looking  for someone with existing experience in developing large scale Java applications, who is passionate about continuous improvement. You should be comfortable working in a very dynamic environment, requiring constant learning of new tools and rapid delivery of new features.  RequirementsGood knowledge of Java the language Good understanding of OOP, design patterns and system architecture;  Experience (min 3 years) with the full Java stack and related technologies: Java, Spring Framework, Hibernate, REST, SQL DBMSs  Working knowledge of front-end technologies Working knowledge of Linux; tuning application server performance Experience working with Continuous Integration concepts and tools;  BSc in Computer Science or related Nice to have:Experience with NoSQL databases (in particular Cassandra) Experience with Solr/Lucene, Kafka  ResponsibilitiesHands-on software development and testing (at least Unit and Integration tests) Integration of tools, components and other systems Explore new, innovative technologies and find solutions to bottleneck problems Provide estimates and benchmarks for different technical solutions  About iRewindWe are a Swiss tech start-up founded in December 2013. We began commercial operations in February 2015 in the sports market, with expansion plans to Leisure and Travel segments such as amusement parks, castles, resorts, museums, cruises, etc.Our technology matches camera meta-data with user positioning information to identify and make you the star of your personalized video memory. We disrupt the memories market by eliminating the need to carry a camera.Accolades received:1st place winner Swiss ICT “Newcomer“ (2014) 1st place winner Grand Prix Geneva International Inventions Salon (2014) “Top 17 Disruptors“ at START Global Web Summit (Oct 2014) “Top 8 Recommended“ promising Swiss start-ups ( Bilan, Feb 2015) 1st place winner “Creative Integration of Technology“ (Axis Communication, 2015)

body: Ericsson Overview:Ericsson is a world-leading provider of telecommunications equipment & services to mobile & fixed network operators. Over 1,000 networks in more than 180 countries use Ericsson equipment, & more than 40 percent of the world's mobile traffic passes through Ericsson networks. Using innovation to empower people, business & society, we are working towards the Networked Society, in which everything that can benefit from a connection will have one. At Ericsson, we apply our innovation to market-based solutions that empower people & society to help shape a more sustainable world.We are truly a global company, working across borders in 175 countries, offering a diverse, performance-driven culture & an innovative & engaging environment where employees enhance their potential every day. Our employees live our vision, core values & guiding principles. They share a passion to win & a high responsiveness to customer needs that in turn makes us a desirable partner to our clients. To ensure professional growth, Ericsson offers a stimulating work experience, continuous learning & growth opportunities that allow you to acquire the knowledge & skills necessary to reach your career goals.Job Summary:The Services Consultant is a development role for business engagements and solution for a given service line; the Consultant is responsible to generate models to implement to meet customer expectations and generate tangible business value.He or she is responsible for driving projects/programs and customer initiatives targeting: process improvement and control, service portfolio expansion, scope development. He or she is accountable to communicate their progress both to the internal and the external community.The Consultant reports to the Head of Analytics & eSourcing and supports GSSO regular operations, non-standard projects and development initiatives.Key Responsibilities:Customer-related ResponsibilitiesUnderstand customer needs, expectations and requirements of services stated and non-stated;Identify process status and determine addressable gaps; Recommend safety nets for risk mitigation; Design solution flows and document proposals.Process-related Responsibilities Identify quality and adherence to process indicators and define controls for the processes; Define templates, work instructions and instruments and ensures they are up-to-date; Plays a driver role in process definition and maintenance: work instructions creation and updates, process documentation management etc.; Drives best practices across the Ericsson Sourcing Community through day-to-day work and  also by contributing to unit communication programs; Drives and executes the GSSO strategy and liaises with other GSSO team to ensure this strategy gets implemented timely; Represents GSSO and respective Team in various forums; Contributes to GSSO growth and development by engaging in cross-functional projects. Performance-related Responsibilities Controls and reposts the customer facing performance parameters and initiates corrective and preventive measures from the identified malfunctions in the process or way of working. Main Interfaces: GSSO Cluster team members and Coordinators; Team Lead/Head; GSSO Teams; GSSO Management.Ericsson Sourcing All Ericsson Sourcing Units members; Non-Sourcing Units.Competence profile: People skills Skilled in coordinating teams and projects; Strong communication and presentation skills; Strong customer orientation and ability to work under pressure; Proficient in facilitating and delivering business solutions. Process skills Strong knowledge in business process management, statistics and business models; Excellent knowledge in Sourcing area and common industry practices.Performance skills Strong analytical and reporting skills, synthetic and documenting skills; Strong level knowledge of MS Office Pack; Proven track record of outstanding performance.Education & Language:Bachelor Degree within Finance / Economics / Mathematics / Computer Science / Computer Engineering or alternate; Fluency in written and spoken English required is essential.Interpersonal skills:Pro-activity towards customer service is essential; Flexible and responsive to changing work patterns and demands; A thorough and methodical approach to work;Well-developed interpersonal communication and people orientation; Willing to share knowledge, experiences and skills to create a learning culture; Excellent ambassador of company culture and values; Good leadership & networking skill; Persuasion and influencing; Coaching and facilitation.

body:
Why join us?

Because you, as a Store Manager, can be the best you can be, everyday.
In JYSK, we believe that good sales & service builds on strong personal values. 
Therefore, our Store Managers always strive to be great tradesmen and good colleagues. 
Through your team, you always look for ways to improve store turnover, daily operations and staff performance and development. 

What can you expect to be doing, day to day?

•Having the full responsibility of your store, you will maximize sales & service.
•Going in front and getting the best out of your team, you will learn new things about leadership, retail and yourself.
•Dealing with operational issues like planning, prioritizing and follow up on staff performance.
•Ensuring that you and your team stick to the JYSK concept to ensure a consistent flow of goods and competent, helpful and available staff.
•Being a consistent role model for our values: tradesman, colleague and corporate spirit.
•Assisting your team in all kind of other tasks like goods receiving, organizing stock room, filling shelves and ordering articles.

How can you make a difference, every day?

•You like rolling up your sleeves to get things done
•You are passionate about optimizing sales through great customer service
•You create results through overview, pro-activeness and decisiveness.
•You spot and use the full potential of your team, and communicate easily with your your colleagues as well as your customers.
•You are efficient in planning, prioritizing and following up on budgets, goals and costs
•You see things in a broad perspective, but still have an eye for detail.
•You nave worked in retail with comparable management experience

Curious?
Would you like to join a company that constantly trains and develops its employees at all levels, and offers attractive bonuses for good performance?
A company that puts honor in developing its own managers?

Then send you CV.
Only the selected candidates will be contacted.

body: Main purpose of the role:Execution of internal Acceptance Tests within given timeframe and allocated budget, in order to grow the product and solutions quality, meeting customer satisfaction.Reporting to: EBO Software ManagerResponsibilities :* Definition and generation of test specification and test documentation* Establish and maintain test environments and configurations* Deploy and execute automated test scripts* Documents clearly and concisely the bugs encountered during testing and communicate test status* Collaborate with the distributed development team in the process of reproducing and analyzing the reported software bugs* Keep in contact with the customers to continuously improve products.Technical skills:Mandatory:* Good knowledge of Windows and Linux/Unix operating systems* Familiarity with software testing concepts and approach* Familiarity with automated testing environments* Familiarity with python and/or perl scripting* Good knowledge of common testing tools* Experience with bug/defects tracking toolsPreferred:* Good knowledge in test & measurements devices* Several years of experience as Testing Engineer position* M.S. degree in Computer Sciences, Telecommunications or equivalent experience* Good knowledge of:    * Scripting Languages: Linux/Unix shells, Windows    * SW and HW administrationPersonal skills:* Good sense for high quality* Structured and systematic approach* Availability to travel at least 90 days per year* Fluent English (spoken and written)* Exposure to multicultural organizations* Experience working across different cultures * Internal and customer focusWe offer:* Permanent working contract* The chance of experiencing a technically advanced environment* The opportunity to grow into an international and dynamic context* Attractive salary* Various benefits
title: EBO Test Engineer
locations: Piata montreal, București, Municipiul București, România

body: We're looking for a young, enthusiast project manager who can keep an eye on our projects. We'd like you to know a little bit about Agile development and we're looking forward to hear about a software project you've previously managed with multiple developers. Our ideal candidate has also used project-tracking tools as Jira, Mantis or other custom products.Software development knowledge is a plus.Job responsibilities include:- Understands basic project management principles:  scope, schedule, budget, quality.- Ensures all project documentation is gathered, organized, maintained, tracked and managed properly.- Provides leadership to ensure that projects are completed on time and within established parameters.- Manages cross functional resource teams on monthly deploys and small to medium size projects.- Assigns tasks to team members.- Manages client deploy schedules, reports, release notes and verifying QA.- Ensures production efficiency on a daily basis through efficient resource planning, resource productivity and allocation.- Ensures the project deliverables are capable of achieving the benefits defined in the business case.- Manages client support requests.- Responds quickly and professionally to client support requests and questions.- Schedules client meetings and internal meetings.- Forecasts changes and communicates current and projected issues.- Monitors team progress against project plans.Company details:• A team of 70+ people in USA and Romania that like to build great software platforms• We enjoyed tremendous success and growth in recent years. MIT, NASA, and some of the biggest companies in the world used the software we created. We want to keep this going and need your help for it.• Centrally located offices at Victoriei Square, flexible hours, creative environment, soccer & beer nights, monthly team-buildings, budget allowances for things you want to learn, unexpected bonuses … and you might have some ideas too.• You can benefit from the tax incentive (no income tax) offered by the Romanian government.• Opportunity to develop a career in project management.• We value the team concept and foster an environment where people can grow together. If you have other people in mind that fit the profile, just send them the link to apply. We might hire your friends too and give you a nice bonus!Not what you're looking for ? Take a look into all our available positions here: https://www.clarisoft.com/about-clarisoft/join-team/.
title: Junior Project Manager
locations: Calea Victoriei 155, București, Municipiul București, România

body:
Veeam Software helps organizations safeguard their investment in VMware virtual infrastructure by providing innovative systems management software designed to reduce costs, increase productivity and mitigate risk. Veeam is rapidly expanding its presence around the world. The company's U.S. headquarters is in Columbus, Ohio and European headquarters in London, UK and APAC headquarters based in Sydney Australia.
Veeam Software is all about the people. The best people drive the best technologies to help IT organizations all over the world. Do you have a passion for new, cutting-edge technologies? We are always looking for talented, creative and motivated people to join our team. Take a look at the available positions below and apply today.

The Inside Sales Representative is responsible for winning deals for Veeam together with our Channel Partners on the territory of Germany. 

This position will be based in Bucharest, Romania.


Responsibilities: 

- Receiving and responding to inbound sales leads and converting them to new business.
- Maximizing coverage within the target region and penetrate organizations with Veeam products
- Coordinating sales activities with partners/consultants/distributors and resellers to identify and close new business
- Initiating telephone and email contact with potential prospects from developed web and lead generation lists; cold calling as needed
- Developing a solid working knowledge of Veeam Software products and the benefits they provide to potential customers
- Providing support to qualified prospects and customers including follow up, product information, quotations and closures
- Providing forecasting and account opportunity as needed
- Updating and maintaining the Veeam CRM system 

Qualifications :

- 2-4 years of experience in B2B sales
- Fluent in English and German 
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills
- Ability to work independently with limited direction in a fast-paced environment; must be a high energy motivated self-starter
- Higher education 


Please visit our career portal for new and exciting roles at Veeam!
http://careers.veeam.com/
http://careers.veeam.com/about/core-values
title: Inside Sales Representative with German
locations: Afi park 1, București, Municipiul București, România

body: Ericsson Overview: Ericsson is a world-leading provider of telecommunications equipment & services to mobile & fixed network operators. Over 1,000 networks in more than 180 countries use Ericsson equipment, & more than 40 percent of the world's mobile traffic passes through Ericsson networks. Using innovation to empower people, business & society, we are working towards the Networked Society, in which everything that can benefit from a connection will have one. At Ericsson, we apply our innovation to market-based solutions that empower people & society to help shape a more sustainable world.We are truly a global company, working across borders in 175 countries, offering a diverse, performance-driven culture & an innovative & engaging environment where employees enhance their potential every day. Our employees live our vision, core values & guiding principles. They share a passion to win & a high responsiveness to customer needs that in turn makes us a desirable partner to our clients. To ensure professional growth, Ericsson offers a stimulating work experience, continuous learning & growth opportunities that allow you to acquire the knowledge & skills necessary to reach your career goals.Job Summary:Drives internal communication activities in order to secure engaged employees who live the brand, secure strategies and targets communication; Ensures consistent communication within Ericsson;Drives the creation and implementation of communication plans; Coaches and advises the development of communicative leadership among managers.Responsibilities & Tasks:Designs communication solutions in support of business needs and strategy;Creates messages with stakeholders;Coaches and advises managers on communication;Develops communication channels;Evaluates and improve internal communications.Main interfaces:Ericsson Sourcing and other units; Unit's Management Team;Other employees within the unit. Position Qualifications:Core CompetencesBrand Knowledge and Skills (Brand platform knowledge);Business Understanding;Excellent communication skills; Market Insight;Project Management Skills; Coaching & Mentoring Skills; Audio/visual Production Skills; Negotiation & Argumentation Skills; Excellent written and spoken English language skills.Preferred Qualifications & Experience Requirements5 years ‘experience within internal communications field in multinational environment;Bachelor’s Degree from University required, preferably within Communications, Business Administration, Finance, Economics, or Education;High level of expertise in relevant communications tools and practices.Behavioural CompetencesCreating & Innovating;Writing & Reporting;Working with people; Relating & Networking;Adapting & Responding to Change;Planning & Organizing.
title: Internal Communication Specialist
locations: West Gate Park, București, Municipiul București, România

body: Société Générale European Business Services délivre de la valeur ajoutée pour le Groupe Société Générale au niveau des services de finance, comptabilité, ressources humaines et IT por toutes les entités de l'Europe.La Direction des Ressources Groupe Société générale est dotée d'un département Business Solutions Center – BSC – qui a pour vocation d’être le partenaire des directions centrales et des branches pour les accompagner dans le déploiement des solutions informatiques mutualisées au sein des Filières, Finance, Risques, RH.Au sein du BSC, le Centre de Solutions Finance assure en particulier les évolutions et le bon fonctionnement des applications de production des états réglementaires de SG Métropole, du Groupe et des filiales.Votre environnementAu sein du groupe Société Générale, vous rejoindrez le Business Solution Center, qui est un centre de services partagés, intégré à la Direction des Ressources et de l'Innovation du Groupe.Sa mission : doter les Filières et Pôles du groupe de solutions informatiques performantes et innovantes.Comme éditeur et fournisseur de solutions, le Business Solution Center accompagne aussi les grands projets Groupe et la transformation de la Filière IT.Votre rôleAu sein de la Direction des Ressources du Groupe, et plus particulièrement du Business Solutions Center, le Gestionnaire d’Applications Sogefilia a pour mission de prendre en charge l’assistance de premier et second niveaux aux utilisateurs sur les progiciels et développements in-house servant les processus de Comptabilité Générale et de Déclarations Réglementaires des filiales françaises du Groupe Société Générale (Sogefilia – environ 400 entités) en réalisant les activités de support aux utilisateurs  Vous interviendrez sur des activités comme :•	Suivi et gestion applicative quotidiens de production•	Exécution des demandes utilisateurs procédurées et/ou programmées•	Gestion des habilitations et surveillance permanente•	Remonter les alertes adéquates en cas d’incident non répertorié aux équipes MOE & MOA et l’équipe de développement in-house •	Proposer des corrections/évolutions suite aux incidents récurrents et/ou à votre retour d’expérienceVotre profil technique :•	Niveau BAC+3, avec une spécialisation en Informatique•	Première expérience dans le domaine de l’informatique•	Ce poste est un bon tremplin vers le rôle de Maîtrise d’œuvre SINous portons attention également à :•	Une attitude responsable et un fort engagement dans la réalisation de votre mission•	Une forte autonomie et réactivité compte tenu des délais courts du cycle de production•	Rigueur et communication sont nécessaires à la réussite de cette mission•	Aisance relationnelle et capacités de discussion indispensables pour faciliter les nombreux contacts internes •	La connaissance du français est obligatoire : certains utilisateurs clés (superviseurs) sont français et pas forcément anglophones.Bénéfices :• Rémunération compétitive et paquet de bénéfices basé sur les compétences et sur l'expérience;• Possibilités de promotion et de développement de carrière ;• Environnement de travail professionnel, ouvert, agrèable ;• Tickets restaurant ;• Assurance médicale privée ;• Bonus annuel de performance ;• Contrat à durée indétéerminée.
title: Gestionnaire d’applications IT avec Français

body: LUXOFT Global presenceThe Company develops its solutions and delivers its services from 24 dedicated delivery centers worldwide. It has over 9,500 employees across 27 offices in 15 countries in North America, Mexico, Western and Eastern Europe, Asia Pacific, and South Africa. Luxoft is incorporated in Tortola, British Virgin Islands, has its operating headquarters office in Zug, Switzerland and is listed on the New York Stock Exchange.LUXOFT Romania With 1500 employees on board, Luxoft Romania works on delivering high quality product engineering and application development services. Luxoft Romania focuses on three main technology verticals: Automotive, Financial and Telecom. Project Description:Providing Software Quality Assurance services for Layer 4-7 Security and Testing solution:      - Manual testing      - Test case automation      - Regression testing Tools used for test case automation: TCL, Spirent iTest.Responsibilities:You will be part of the Product Verification team and you are expected to:      - Provide input for Functional Specifications      - Design and create Test Cases and Test Plans for different Features      - Execute manual test cases for New Feature and Regression      - Maintain Test documentation      - Configure test setup and perform troubleshooting activities      - Root cause isolation. Bugs / Problems reporting with accurate description, steps to reproduce, associated logs.      - Develop and maintain automation infrastructure and automated scripts      - Run and debug automated regression      - Test data review and script code review      - Report progress and results of the tasks performed periodically (to team and management) Skills Required:The best candidate would be a networking tester (qa) engineer - preferably with experience in running and creating automated scripts. - Good networking skills: TCP / IP, Layer 4-7 protocols, Switching, Routing (Cisco Certifications are a plus) - Good understanding of testing principles and QA skills. Experience with designing, creating and executing Test Plans and Test Cases, bug isolation and reporting. - Load / performance testing knowledge. - Basic Linux knowledge - Experience with building and maintaining a test setup. - Scripting skills are a plus; any programming / scripting language experience is good; TCL / Spirent - Experience with network traffic generators is a plus. - Good communication in English, both speaking and writing What we offer:- An interesting job in one of the largest IT companies- Challenging & professional work environment- Pleasant working atmosphere within an international team- Competitive salary and opportunities for professional development- Various in house training & webinars- Atractive relocation package
title: QA with networking and preferably scripting
locations: Dimitrie pompeiu, București, Municipiul București, România

body:
Softing is a successful, independent provider of hardware and software for industrial automation and automotive electronics. SoftingRom has been founded early in 2005 as an R&D center of Softing AG Munich, with offices both in Cluj-Napoca and Miercurea-Ciuc. 
We’re hiring C++ Developers for our Industrial Automation department in Cluj-Napoca.   As part of most modern industrial control solution, the central part (middleware) consists on architectures based on the OPC standards (see OPC Foundation - www.opcfoundation.org) which offer secure and reliable connectivity between different layers of the control solution (like the real time protocols and control processors) respectively other enterprise resources (Management Information systems, ERP, various databases, SCADA systems, other).
Based on more than 20 years of experience, Softing is the most complete worldwide provider of OPC expertise (see http://industrial.softing.com/en/expertise/opc.html). Our R&D center in Cluj-Napoca is proud to contribute in a determinant way to the success ofthe OPC middleware and servers product ranges.
We have exciting plans to enhance our products for cloud computing, wide inter-connectivity, IoT and other modern technologies and therefore we are eager to get active contributions from good professionals like you.
Required skills/Experience
OOP, C++Qt (optional)Technical background and experience in software design and development (architecture, design patterns, best practices)Communication abilitiesPassion for software applied in engineeringEnglish language (both reading and writing)
 What you could benefit of
Attractive salary, medical services, fidelity bonus, lunch ticketsHighly qualified teamComprehensive technical trainings on our expertise areaPositive and informal working environmentChallenging projects for well-known customers in the industryThe opportunity to actively contribute at the design and success of our solutions 
If this sounds interesting for you, please send your CV (in English/ Romanian language) at jobs_ro@softing.com and let's talk more about this role, about the projects and about our great team.

body: Come work with the top 1% of global talent to manage the delivery of WOW Support to our customers for 25+ software products.  We offer a fast-paced environment where inventiveness and entrepreneurial drive are rewarded. We’re also one of the few IT companies offering high-paying, 100% remote, work-from-home positions. You never have to fight traffic to office again. What do we need from you?We’re looking for Customer Support Managers (CSMs) and Technical Customer Support Managers (TCSMs) to manage our Support teams.  We want bright, motivated people who are passionate about delivering outstanding customer service to manage our teams.  Each team has a CSM and a TCSM.  These managers work together to manage the overall team and the support experience we deliver to our customers. CSMs manage the Level 1 support agents who focus more on customer experience, communication and resolving lesser technical issues. TCSMs manage the Level 2 agents who focus on solving the escalated (and more technically challenging) support issues and working with our development team on software bug/ defect resolution.Compensation$2260/month What we need to see in your background:We are looking for CSM and TCSM candidates who have skills and experience in the following areas:Customer Support Skills and Experience: Customer conflict resolution; Ticket handling; Software Troubleshooting; Virtual environments, and; Issue tracking. Management Skills and Experience:Change management skills; Project management skills; Leadership skills, and; Experience leading a team of at least 5 staff. Technical Skills and Experience:CSMs and TCSMs should have a working knowledge of current Windows environments. CSMs and TCSMs should be familiar with common web browsers and basic internet protocols (e.g., HTTP, FTP, RDP). TCSMs should have a strong understanding of technical troubleshooting and issue identification/ resolution. TCSMs should be well-versed in at least one of the following: database development/ administration (SQL Server, Oracle, and/or MySQL); .NET programming; Java programming; another major programming language, and/ or network administration. TCSMs should have a strong understanding of basic networking concepts. Other Skills and Considerations:Communication Skills - All candidates for support positions must have excellent written and verbal communications skills in English, at least. Dynamic Work Environment – Our support organization is a dynamic organization where we change processes, systems and priorities often, so candidates need to be agile and flexible in order to succeed in our continuous improvement model. Working Hours: This job is only offered on a Full Time basis (40 hrs/wk).  CSMs/TCSMs work between 8 am and 6 pm Eastern Time, including breaks, Monday through Friday with occasional flexibility for earlier schedules depending on customers in Europe.  Please note that we do observe US Daylight Savings Time, so Eastern Time is UTC-4 in the summer and UTC-5 in the winter.To qualify, please provide a resume/CV demonstrating the required experience and skills.  From there, to help us find the top 1% of talent, we ask that you first complete some screening tests.  Once you receive testing, you have 7 days to complete all assessments and submit your responses. After you pass our screening tests, there will be a paid trial week where we provide training and ask you to show us your skills. At the end of your trial week, we will either extend an ongoing contract, place you in another position, or release you from the trial. Versata Support is proud to be an equal opportunity employer that provides an exceptional work environment.  All candidates will be required to undergo and pass a rigorous background check to ensure a safe and productive workplace.Are you up for the challenge?
title: Customer Support Manager - $2250/month

body:
The Company:
Misys is at the forefront of the financial software industry, providing the broadest portfolio of banking, treasury, trading and risk solutions available on the market. With 1,800 customers in 120 countries our team of domain experts and partners has an unparalleled ability to address industry requirements at both a global and local level.

The team 

Misys Professional Services (PS) team enables the product implementation and maintenance using the best delivery methodologies and business process workflows across the Product Portfolio. The group is formed of Technical and Business experts who engage early in a project lifecycle to translate the product design into technical and business specifications and assure an on-time/ on-budget delivery. 

Their early stage involvement in pre-sales activities shape opportunities and ensure consistency of how products are sold and delivered.  The Global Professional Services Team is involved in launching, overseeing, and delivering the company’s major projects. 

MSDC is a global team in Professional Services department responsible for developing and delivering the offsite tasks to the clients. The team works closely with the regional Professional Services team and clients for the successful delivery of the projects and tasks.

The Role:

As a Junior Fusion Invest/Fusion Capital Summit technical consultant you will participate to development of new Sophis functionalities based on the product toolkit. The functionalities are based on business requirements that come from the client. Integrated in a team under responsibility of a Team Leader, coached by senior consultant, you will work closely with Quality Assurance Team and Professional Services teams across our different centers around the world. Onsite assignements at client site are also possible based on Sophis knowledge.

Responsibilities:

As a member of the MSDC team your responsibilities will include but are not limited to:

- Develop toolkit extensions based on Fusion Invest product STK or Fusion Capital Summit using C++
- Implement new features as specified in Functional Specification Documents provided by clients
- Respect high level coding and design standards
- Investigate technical and functional defects and propose adequate solutions

Skills, Knowledge & Experience

- A master degree in computer science or equivalent work experience
- Strong C/C++ skills (including OO and STL)
- Good spoken and written English
- Good Unix or Windows skills would be a plus
- Knowlegde for one the following would be a plus: SQL / Java / QT/ UML skills / Design Patterns 
- Minimum experience on a similar position (0-1 year) would be a plus


The role reports into the MSDC Team Lead
title: Junior C++ Consultant
locations: Sema parc Splaiul Independentei 319, București, Municipiul București, România

body: We are Steve Madden's Customer Service Team and have been in Romania for the past 10 years. If you would like to take the opportunity to come work for us, please keep in mind the following requirements: The job is in English, therefore proficient verbal and written communication skills in English are a must. Customer Care orientation and excellent customer service ethic.Conflict resolution skills.Initiative and creativity.Good computer skills.Ability to work in a team and individually with minimal supervision.Previous Customer Service experience would be a strong advantage.The Customer Service Representative's responsibilities are:Answer customer questions via phone, live chat and e-mail regarding product details and availability, prices, current/past promotions, delivery times and the status of orders in general, ensuring that inquiries are dealt promptly and accurately according to the internal company policy and procedures.Assist potential customers that contact us with inquiries regarding our products and are looking to place orders.Our operations are conducted in two shifts: 9am to 5pm US&Canada EST (16pm-00am RO) and 5pm to 10pm US&Canada EST (00am-05am RO). We are also required to work in the weekend however, in that situation employees will benefit 2 consecutive days off during the week. We are working on a weekly rotation between shifts. Shift exchanges with colleagues are allowed as well. Overtime is possible when our work volume requires it and is paid.We offer:Entry level salary is 1600 RON - wired to your debit card once a month, no later than the 25th of each month, for the previous month. Opportunity to receive a salary raise may be taken after 3 months from employment. Opportunity of personal development within an International Company - we only promote from within our company, we do not hire on higher positions.Two weeks paid training package where you are presented the company policy and procedures according to which you will be assisting our customers. At the end of the training session you will be evaluated.Monthly special bonuses based on individual performanceAnnual performance based bonusesDue to working after US time zone, we cover transport expenses. We refund cab money twice a month. You are required to keep the cab invoices and present them back to us. If you own a personal car, we may refund you gas money based on distance traveled from your home to our headquarters.We have a strong relationship with Medlife and provide our employees membership cards that cover basic medical services.

body: With presence in 100 countries and serving over 2,000 clients and over 1 million end-users, Basware is the leading provider of purchase-to-pay automation software and solutions.  Praised by industry analysts such as Gartner, AMR, Forrester, and PayStream, Basware’s products range from procurement and invoice automation to electronic invoicing and billing.  Basware’s clients include global multinationals and prestigious domestic organizations.  Basware’s Romanian operations have grown rapidly over the past few years. Find out more at www.basware.com.Basware is seeking a Presales Demo Master, to be part of the global Basware presales team, and to support Basware global sales to achieve the planned growth. While Basware solution demonstrations are the main sales tool, you will be an integral part of the “Basware Demo Excellence Team” within presales to manage Basware demonstration environment set-ups, version upgrades and environment maintenance. In addition, after a proper learning phase, you will participate in largest opportunities globally, whenever demo set-up and testing support or customization are needed. In addition to working closely with the other members of Demo Excellence Team in Finland, you will join the newly established Romanian presales team and work also closely with Presales Consultants in different countries. You will be located in Iasi, Romania and report to a Global Business Advisor, Presales in Finland.Responsibilities include:•    Basware Purchase-to-Pay (P2P) and Travel and Expense Management (TEM)  online demo environment set-up, version upgrades and environment maintenance•    Virtual Machine environments maintenance•    Demo scenario testing in all demos•    Demo customizations and documentation•    Demo supportTo be successful in this position we would like you to have:•    3-6 years of experience in a position with similar responsibilities•    Bachelor Degree (Business or Computer Science), MSc, or similar•    Good relationship management skills•    Be solution oriented, structured and analytical•    Enjoy learning and becoming an expert in Basware solutions and their technical environments•    Possess good IT skills•    Knowledge of Purchase-to-Pay and ERP processes and integrations is an advantage•    Fluency in English  Basware solution technical environment functions around the following:•    MS SQL DB maintenance (knowledge required)•    Windows 2008/2012 server maintenance (knowledge required)•    Windows workstations 7, 8, 10 (knowledge required)•    SQL, XML, HTML language (knowledge is an advantage)•    Azure (knowledge is an advantage)•    HyperV (knowledge is an advantage)•    Tableau (knowledge is an advantage)Travelling is required for the induction phase to join Basware global training programs and for possible global presales meetings. The main work itself does not require travelling.At Basware you will be part of a profitably growing, dynamic and forward looking company. We have an open working atmosphere and great Basware spirit. We offer you competitive compensation aligned with your competences and performance, a supportive team and an opportunity to build your career in an international environment that drives you to succeed. This position is available immediately. For further information, please send an email to: iasi@basware.com
title: Presales Demo Master

body:
We Are Looking for:

A senior QA Automation Engineer/Lead to join our company for a new Adobe AEM development project team.


Our Partner:

A leading Adobe Solution Partner based in Munich.

Our partner is an integrated marketing and technology services company that develops highly personalized web experiences in order to:
• Help their end-customers make the business grow faster
• Build B2B/B2E platforms to improve the collaboration with business partners or employees using the Adobe Marketing Cloud


The Platform:


The Adobe Experience Manager (formerly known as CQ5) is a 100% Java-based, platform-independent content management software solution.

AEM is currently the worldwide market leader in the field of web experience management.

At present, more than 3,000 companies are using AEM – and the trend continues rapidly upward.

AEM is a combination of the industry’s leading WCM platform Adobe CQ, Digital Asset Management (DAM), Social Communities (SoCo) and AEM Forms. This platform is designed to help you create a specifically tailored customer experience across channels.

AEM’s performance relies especially on its unique architecture, the core of which consists of the Content Bus, which is used to create a virtual repository. The Content Bus allows content from all back-end systems to be standardized and also provides standardized management and access.


Responsibilities:

• Start an automation process for the project from scratch
• Evaluate tools and define an automation strategy for the QA team together with the QA Manager
• Implement a robust QA automation framework
• Create and mentor an automation team
• Work together with the manual testing team to assure successful releases


Required Competencies:

• Experience in software testing web applications
• Basic understanding of software architectures and concepts
• Technical background (databases, client-server architecture, programming skills)
• Knowledge of QA concepts and process
• Experience in QA Automation
• Adobe AEM / WEM foundation concepts (Plus)
• Proficiency in English


We Value:

• Respect
• Reliability
• Strive for excellence



Notes:

• Only candidates selected after the CV screening phase will be contacted.
• The position is in Cluj-Napoca, but we also recruit non-Cluj residents willing to relocate.

 Fortech’s Offer

 At Fortech we enhance the value of each individual, encourage personal evolution and create an appropriate environment, in order to facilitate know-how transfer and to assure access to the cutting-edge technology.

 Working @ Fortech

 # Yearly training plan ~ designed to suit individual needs, comprising both hard and soft skills development and improvement
 # Career growth opportunities ~ working on international projects with global teams and working on-site at clients’ headquarters in Western Europe and the USA
 Varying professional activities ~ job rotation, coaching and mentoring activities
 Company-sponsored technical certification program ~ Microsoft, Oracle, Sitecore, ISTQB
 # Supportive working environment ~ separate office rooms for up to 10-12 people
 # Company-sponsored events ~ parties, team-buildings and sporting activities and competitions (football, basketball, volleyball, tennis, ping-pong, marathons, biking)
 # Premium subscription to medical services at a private health center
 # Motivating recognition and rewarding salary package (our company policy is to exclude PFA contracts)

body:
Honeywell International is a $37 billion diversified technology and manufacturing global leader, with more than 120,000 employees in 100 countries around the world and has a demonstrated heritage of both innovation and achievement. 

Honeywell HPS (Honeywell process solutions) is looking for an experienced Procurement Specialist to join the Romanian office in Bucharest!



If you have:
-Bachelors Degree with a minimum of 2 to 4 years of experience in any industry with specialization in the Procurement / Supply Chain domain
-Proven track of excellent relationship management skills since the job involves interacting with suppliers
-Demonstrated hands on experience in dealing with multiple ERPs, as this role will involve extensive use of Oracle / SAP and other legacy systems. You should also have experience in dealing with web based tools and should be comfortable with working on various reporting tools which are web based
-Knowledge of MRP Systems & procedures (is highly desirable)
-Excellent PC skills and are well versed with Microsoft Products like Excel, Word and Access. ----The job may also require using various applications (Microsoft or others)
-Excellent interpersonal and communication skills with all levels of employees and management
-Exposure to Six Sigma & Project Management (is also desirable)
-Strong inclination towards automation (will be an added advantage)
-English and German fluency, both written and verbal


Then, be our next German speaker procurement specialist!


The main accountability for this role involves supporting the tactical and strategic sourcing activities that are in compliance with Honeywell sub-business groups and Honeywell sourcing processes. 
This position reports to the Site Leader in Bucharest.

Your key responsibilities will be to:
•	Support Commodity Managers / Global Commodity Team Leads on sourcing projects, PO (purchase order) Automation, Vendor Rationalization and new vendor set-ups / maintenance
•	Work with multiple organizational agencies to address & resolve supplier invoices on payment holds by prioritizing on aged holds and high value invoices
•	Small buy negotiations and catalog maintenance
•	Receive supplier acknowledgements and ensure the PO due dates are accurately maintained in the ERP system. Run the Supplier Open PO report for key suppliers as required
•	Push-in and pull-out Purchase Order due dates, as needed, to prevent production disruptions, delays, downtime and excess inventory
•	Resolve Supplier delivery problems (late and early receipts) in an pro-active and timely manner and escalate for assistance as required
•	Assist and support management of Inactive, Obsolete and Excess inventories
•	Maintain data integrity in SAP (Purchase Info records Vendor Master Data etc)
•	Communicate technical specifications to suppliers and manage price and lead-time changes in system
•	Work closely with engineering on issuing Purchase orders
•	Invoice cleansing in System
•	Manage RFQ’s (requests for quotations)
•	Support supplier quality problem resolution
•	Return defective material to suppliers and issue PO’s to replace non-confirming material.


Want to learn more? Visit:
Our career website: www.careersathoneywell.com
Channel: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CcMf_TFS0kA
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tj8Jr2USl4M

Honeywell is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to age, race, creed, color, national origin, ancestry, marital status, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, nationality, sex, or veteran status. - See more at: 
http://www.careersathoneywell.com/en/jobsearch/jobdescription.aspx?languageid=1&jobid=00281661#sthash.O3RzNOF7.dpuf

body: For over 100 years, Steelcase has been bringing human insight to business by studying how people work, wherever they work. Those insights can help organizations achieve a higher level of performance, by creating places that unlock the promise of their people. Our goal is to help organizations create spaces that support how they work. Our passion is to help people love how they work.The new Tech Support team that we are building in Cluj GBC will offer support for our technology products (media: scapes, roomwizards, virtual puck, etc) to our end users and dealers. As part of a global team, you will work with people from different locations in EMEA.In order to be successful in this role, we look for someone with excellent customer orientation, technically sound with an IT Network & A/V troubleshooting experience and a positive attitude. Successful candidate will make use of knowledge in web applications, IIS, Exchange, Cloud calendaring administration, Extron, Crestron and codec installations, while helping customers integrate Steelcase products with their IT/AV environment.Mission:• Offer support to end user and dealer for our technology products• Respond to and resolve technical telephone service calls.• Assist with product training on interactive products via phone.• Respond to and resolve e-mail inquiries and service requests• Approve technical product replacements in SAP work flowTo succeed in this role, we need someone with the following profile:Education / Experience• Bachelor’s degree in IT or Technical / Audio Visual field (preferred)• Minimum of 6 months/1 year of technical support or customer service experience• Technical proficiency of commonly used operating systems• Preferred experience with TCP/IP Networking, AV connections and Exchange• Advanced French or German skillsSkills / Abilities:• Strong interpersonal communication skills required. Ability to effectively communicate in a professional manner.• Pleasant and professional phone etiquette.• Strong organizational skills and ability to effectively prioritize work to meet established deadlines.• Ability to work with minimal supervision and ability to handle non-standard events.• Must be a team player, have a positive attitude and be flexible.• Requires independent analysis and judgment skills in using prior experience and knowledge of Steelcase’s Integrated Technology products to successfully resolve standard and non-standard customer support issues.• Ability and willingness to work extended hours, as necessary, to effectively accomplish assigned tasks.• Ability to travel up to 10%, as needed to successfully perform assigned role.Expect a great work experienceSteelcase Inc., the global leader in the office furniture industry, was founded in 1912 by people with a strong commitment to doing the right thing for their customers, employees, business partners, associates and neighbors. Today we’re a global company with fiscal year 2011 revenue of approximately $2.4 billion USD and about 10,000 employees. Our mission is to help create great experiences – wherever work happens. We study the ways people work, then use that knowledge to develop products and services that help people work more effectively and organizations use space more efficiently. Our brand offers a comprehensive portfolio of workplace products, furnishings and services, inspired by nearly 100 years of insight gained serving the world’s leading organizations. And we design for social, economic and environmental sustainability. Operating in a connected world, Steelcase Inc. reinforce its values: we still strive to provide a work environment that enables employee growth, satisfaction and success.Steelcase in ClujOur Global Business Centers in Monterrey (Mexico), Kuala Lumpur (Malaysia) and Cluj provide a wide range of support services for Steelcase Innovation Centers, Manufacturing and Sales Organizations. Supporting Europe and North America, we look for colleagues with English, French, German and Spanish skills. We offer opportunities in: Information Technology, Marketing & Sales Support, Finance, Administrative Support.We are looking for people who are passionate about finding solutions, who do their best work as part of a team, who share our commitment to quality and doing things right. If you are interested in joining our team please send your CV and letter of intent to HR_GBC-CJ@steelcase.com or you can apply directly to this opening.

body: As the world’s leading Telecommunications Company, we’re proud to help millions of people in every corner of the globe connect, whether through texting, talking, working, swapping pictures, watching movies... Vodafone Shared Services empowers its people to create value for Vodafone by providing the expertise and insight to drive business transformation, deliver high quality and efficient operations, and enable Vodafone to operate with speed, simplicity and trust. We invite you to join us and start building a career with us! WE ARE GROWING! These are NEW ROLES!ROLE PURPOSE:• Responsible for adaptation of problem management on operational level. RESPONSIBILITIES: 1. Impact on the business • Supports the reorganization and modification of problem management process • Initiates measures of improvement towards ITIL Manager • Assists in the continuous improvement of the processes • Trains problem management process handling and interfaces • Documents rules, working instructions and guidelines • Adapts process requirements into ARS problem application 2. Customer, supplier and third parties • Opens, forwards, tracks and close problem tickets according to problem management process • Coordinates and moderates necessary problem meetings in case of difficulties or team overall problems • Ensures execution of cost and benefit evaluation of any problem • Actively involved in the hierarchical escalation processes for Problems • Supports the processing of measures for problem prevention • Participates in on demand meetings with customer and vendors • Checks finally the documentation of root cause, final solution and preventive measures • Plans, tracks and tests ARS problem application adaption’s • Guarantees SOX compliance • Achievement of internal problem management KPI’s • Performs Data analysis regarding Major Incidents and Problems • Ensure that the Problem Management process is implemented and being followed by all involved process members • Maintains, checks and improve the known error and solution database • Analyze reports and statistics in order to derive improvements • Arrange special reports for Management, Local Markets and Partner. 3. Leadership and teamwork • Cooperate in working groups and projects: Internal VT IS interfaces mainly to: Operational teams, Service Desks, VT IS Management,External VT IS interfaces mainly to: Customer Service Desks, Customer Operations, Customer Problem Management, Customer Management REQUIREMENTS: Education: Academic level Typical outputs • Up to date Problem Process model • SOX compliance • KPI compliance • Hierarchical escalation regarding VT IS Management • Internal and external customer satisfaction • Process conformal handling of all Problem Tickets • Problem Reports • Problem process related documentation (guidelines, working instructions, trainings material) Understanding of: • Service and Helpdesk tools and processes practices • Data Centre Products & Services • Infrastructure Services (Office IT) • Web, enterprise. ERP and consumer application services • Key services support processes based on ITIL standards Qualification / Experience: • Experience in ITIL Management in general • Very good knowledge of ITIL Problem Management • Experience in moderation of high business meetings (Management, Local Markets and Partner) • Experience in customer communications • Fluency in English What we offer: • Private medical and dental care insurance; • Life insurance; • Dedicated employee phone subscription; • Special discounts for gyms and retailers; • Project specific training; • A youthful and multicultural working environment with dedicated professionals and great development opportunities. Don’t miss this unique opportunity to enjoy a high challenging profile role, to progress in your career and to develop experience within a world leading and multinational organization. Vodafone Shared Services Center is part of a Global Services Center and will cater for Vodafone operations in different countries, as well as for the Vodafone Group. Our success comes from the outstanding people that make it happen for our customers every day! We’re at our best when you’re at yours! Vodafone Power to you ***NOTE: We thank all those who apply; however, only those selected for further consideration in the selection process will be contacted.Due to current immigration restrictions, we are welcoming applications from the persons who have the legal right to work in Romania (these means the citizens of EU countries).

body:
Société Générale European Business Services is looking for high standard professionals ready to commit on a longterm basis, offering at the same time a wide variety of features such asexpertise, challenging development opportunities in an international environmentand the joy of a strong spirit.
Responsibilities:
La mission générale du « Chef de Projet Processus Liquidité et ALM » est de définir, formaliser et mettre en œuvre un périmètre de processus qui lui est confié, liés aux sujets décrits ci-dessus.
• A la mise en place de nouveaux volets (nouvelles métriques ou nouveaux reportings à produire, augmentation de la fréquence, réduction des délais)• à des travaux de revue, optimisation et amélioration continue des processus existants à l’initiative des sponsors (alimentations « filière gestion »), des utilisateurs (ajustements, restitutions, industrialisations), des régulateurs (évolutions des reportings, recommandations BCE, renforcement des contrôles), voire de projets connexes.
Ce travail doit souvent être réalisé sur la cible mais aussi être décliné pour chaque étape de la trajectoire de déploiement de cette cible, en accompagnement des étapes de mise en œuvre définies par le Programme Liquidité + ALM.
Le Chef de Projet Processus Liquidité et ALM doit donc être un professionnel familier des bonnes pratiques qu’il aura à appliquer en étant en charge des activités suivantes : • Management non hiérarchique de différentes ressources travaillant en équipe et à coordonner et à fédérer• Gestion de projet (organisation des travaux, préparation et animation de réunions, pilotage des délais des coûts et de la qualité, gestion des alertes et les points de blocage, escalades si besoin) et de projets IT en particulier (de l’expression de besoins à l’homologation).• Analyse et conception de processus• Formalisation de processus (cartographies et synoptiques, RACI, délais, outils, points de contrôle, KPIs, procédures modes opératoires et fiches de poste, etc)• Conduite du changement auprès des utilisateurs et partie-prenantes. La qualité de cet accompagnement conditionne souvent l’appropriation effective des processus et donc le succès de sa mission. Il a à cœur d’organiser et réaliser les actions de communication information et formations nécessaires auprès des publics concernés.
Il devra avoir un bon niveau d’autonomie dans l’exercice des responsabilités ci-dessus.
Requirements:
• 3 ans d’expérience en Project Management• 1 an d’experience in Process Management (mapping et optimisation des processus)• Bonne compréhension de la méthodologie des projets IT– compréhension de business et des spécifications fonctionnelles, tester, gestions de , formation des utilisateurs);• Connaissances de IT–  Lycée Informatique or Faculté de Cybernétique -ASE• Bonne connaissances de Français • Etudes financière-banquière – Académie des Etudes  Economiques• Connaissances de reportings de liquidité régulateurs– l’expérience sera un avantage• 6 mois - 1 an de travail en Paris

Please note that only the selected candidates will be contacted for an interview and all the CVs will be kept in our database for future suitable professional opportunities.

Société Générale European BusinessServices is a player in the shared service center market and delivers highadded value services in various fields of activity for worldwide entities ofthe Group (finance/ accounting, procurement, human resources and IT). The company is currently serving over 20countries mostly across Europe for all major business lines of the Société Générale Group.
The Finance Shared Service Center of SociétéGénérale European Business Services, launched in 2011, now counts more than 250staff delivering services for more than 300 client entities.
The team’s activity consists indelivering two important kinds of processes: accounting – namely Groupreporting in IFRS, statutory and regulatory reporting on top of the permanentsupervision activities and related set of control; and Account Payable and Travel& Expenses, with teams specialize in optimizing all procure to pay activities.

body: Honeywell International is a $37 billion diversified technology and manufacturing global leader, with more than 120,000 employees in 100 countries around the world and has a demonstrated heritage of both innovation and achievement. For our strategic business group TS (Transportation Systems), we are searching for a Finance Analyst to join the Romanian office in Bucharest!If you have:Bachelor degree in Finance Minimum 2 to 3 years financial experience with a large multinational company preferred and previous experience in financial planning in Analysis as a plus Strong finance background Strong Microsoft Excel & PowerPoint skills Ample knowledge of ERP Tools (e.g. SAP, Hyperion) Technical expertise in Finance Planning and Analysis: Income Statement, Balance Sheet and Cash Flow, Consolidation Excellent level of numeracy with high standard of personal integrity and decisiveness Strong problem solving and influencing skills Results driven approach Excellent written and communication skills Pro-active approach and the capability of working on own initiative The ability to synthesize information and proved senior leadership with necessary information to make a strategic decision then join us because you are the financial analyst we are searching for!The Financial Analyst supports the global consolidation of TS forecasting process: Annual Operating Plan, 8+4, 5+7. Offers support for monthly closing reporting for TS globally. As your main responsibilities, you will be:Responsible for standard cost accounting, checking, analysing and controlling production costs (actual vs standard); Monitoring variation between actual costs and budget/ forecast; making proposals for improvement of cost control to stay in the budget; Responsible with managing the fixed assets module in SAP; Completing the financial part of PAR (Capital investments process approval) and controlling the investment spending to avoid exceeding the budgets approved; Ensuring support to the Finance Manager in monthly reporting to headquarters; Ensuring support to Chief Accountant for the statutory audit; Responsible for Account Reconciliation for the specific accounts that enter in your responsibility; Actively contributing in the continuous improvement of the plant; constantly identifying opportunities to eliminate waste and proposing solutions to improve your activity as well as for the plant; Proposing Kaizen ideas/month in accordance with plant objectives; Participating and managing department and plant initiatives that will help improving costs;  Responsible for assuring all the internal control standards set by the company; Want to learn more? Visit:Our career website: www.careersathoneywell.com Channel: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CcMf_TFS0kA http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Tj8Jr2USl4M Honeywell is an equal opportunity employer. Qualified applicants will be considered without regard to age, race, creed, color, national origin, ancestry, marital status, affectional or sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability, nationality, sex, or veteran status. - See more at: http://www.careersathoneywell.com/en/jobsearch/jobdescription.aspx?languageid=1&jobid=00281661#sthash.O3RzNOF7.dpuf
title: Finance Analyst
locations: George constantinescu, București, Municipiul București, România

body: Do you have a taste for software quality? Would you like to grow as a leader? If so, there is a unique opportunity - read on!Consumer Website (CW) is a kaleidoscope of startups developing a wide variety of core technologies (rendering, traffic and content optimization, machine learning) that power Amazon.com, the website used by millions of consumers around the globe. This is where Amazon began, and this is where our fun, dynamic culture originates from.The QA team inside CW is uniquely exposed to the entire breadth of CW technologies - we partner with other feature teams to solve Amazon’s biggest challenges in the area of software quality. This provides our engineers plenty of opportunities to enhance and broaden their industry experience.We created a unique role called “Lead SDET” that focuses on leadership and impact. Seriously, who wants to stay in one team tweaking the same test cases for years? Instead you will engage different development teams to identify and solve their top quality problems. You will partner with managers to direct and prioritize testing efforts. You will enable developers to write tests by creating frameworks, tools and samples. You will make technical contributions to “lead by example” and educate teams on QA fundamentals. You will move on to something new as soon as the culture of quality is ingrained, and the team is ready to follow your footsteps and build on your legacy.The role is highly technical, so we are looking for someone with strong analytical skills and a proven track record of developing production-quality code as well as test automation.• Computer Science or similar degree• Computer Science fundamentals in data structures, algorithm design, problem solving, and complexity analysis• Strong object-oriented design and coding skills in Java (or equivalent languages such as C++/C#)• Expert in software quality and test methodologies• At least 2 years of software testing experience and building test automation, ideally for distributed systems in a complex, multi-tiered environment• Knowledge of industry standard test automation tools• Comfortable working in a fast paced, highly collaborative, dynamic work environment• Advanced level of written and spoken English
title: Software Dev Engineer,  Test
locations: Str. Palat 3E, Iași, Județul Iași, România

body:
We Are Looking for:

A Java developer to join our company for a new Adobe AEM development project team.

Our Partner:

A leading Adobe Solution Partner based in Munich.

Our partner is an integrated marketing and technology services company that develops highly personalized web experiences in order to:

# Help their end-customers make the business grow faster
# Build B2B/B2E platforms to improve the collaboration with business partners or employees using the Adobe Marketing Cloud

The Platform:

The Adobe Experience Manager (formerly known as CQ5) is a 100% Java-based, platform-independent content management software solution.

AEM is currently the worldwide market leader in the field of web experience management.

At present, more than 3,000 companies are using AEM – and the trend continues rapidly upward.

AEM is a combination of the industry’s leading WCM platform Adobe CQ, Digital Asset Management (DAM), Social Communities (SoCo) and AEM Forms. This platform is designed to help you create a specifically tailored customer experience across channels.

AEM’s performance relies especially on its unique architecture, the core of which consists of the Content Bus, which is used to create a virtual repository. The Content Bus allows content from all back-end systems to be standardized and also provides standardized management and access.

Responsibilities:

# Develop web-applications part of Adobe Experience Manager (AEM)
# Develop and support AEM components
# Develop OSGi bundles within Apache Felix
# Work with JCR (Java Content Repository)
# Access internal and external web services
# Query external databases outside AEM platform
# Build servlets based on CQSE Servlet Engine
# Build web applications based on Sling Content Delivery

Required Competencies:

# Strong knowledge of Java/JSP
# Maven, GIT experience
# Apache Sling, Apache Felix know-how
# Continuous Integration practices

Nice to have:

# Agile/Scrum methodologies working experience
# Atlassian tools (JIRA, Confluence) know-how
# Adobe AEM / WEM foundation concepts

We Value:
Respect
Reliability
Striving for excellence

Notes
# Only candidates selected after the CV screening phase will be contacted.
# The position is in Cluj-Napoca, but we also recruit non-Cluj residents willing to relocate

Fortech's Offer

At Fortech we enhance the value of each individual, encourage personal evolution and create an appropriate environment, in order to facilitate know-how transfer and to assure access to the cutting-edge technology.

Working @ Fortech:

# Yearly training plan ~ designed to suit individual needs, comprising both hard and soft skills development and improvement
# Career growth opportunities ~ working on international projects with global teams and working on-site at clients’ headquarters in Western Europe and the USA
# Varying professional activities ~ job rotation, coaching and mentoring activities.
# Company-sponsored technical certification program ~ Microsoft, Oracle, Sitecore, ISTQB
# Supportive working environment ~ separate office rooms for up to 10-12 people
#Company-sponsored events ~ parties, team-buildings and sporting activities and competitions (football, basketball, volleyball, tennis, ping-pong, marathons, biking)
# Premium subscription to medical services at a private health center
# Motivating recognition and rewarding salary package (our company policy is to exclude PFA contracts)
